description: Bringing together “self & other” in unique and interesting ways. Come with another, or be prepared to meet one.

name: 1.21 Gigawatts
description: Are you telling me that you built a time machine… out of a DeLorean?

name: 11 Forward
description: 11 Forward: its like 10 Forward, the bar from The USS Enterprise, but this one goes to eleven. We like to mix our cultural references like we mix our cocktails, randomly.

name: 3 Old Men: a ritual troupe
description: 3 Old Men offer a meditative, 4-path labyrinth. As you choose your exit path, the Old Men represent differing agons: to bless, to be blessed, or to struggle.

name: 7 Deadly Gins
description: We are your ultimate sundowner destination! Come enjoy a top-shelf, ice-cold gin & tonics in our lush desert oasis bar, cool down with our new misting system, and get your groove on to quality downtempo, soul, funk, disco & house. You certainly won’t want to miss taking a spin on our rideable giraffe, Special Ed. It’s all happening Monday – Saturday, 3.30pm – 6.30pm.

name: 7 Sins Lounge
description: Come Embrace the Heat as the Playa’s Friendliest Little Slice of Hell returns for the 14th straight year!Daytime brings what Sinners need – shade, chill music and slushy drinks.But NIGHT brings what Sinners want – Flaming Libations and the ever popular WHEEL of SINS!Our highly skilled and dedicated staff will happily deliver absolution & encouragement with a FIRM hand!So come earn your “Get Out of HELL Free” card and remember to Start your SINS at 7!

name: 7 Sirens Cove
description: A pirate bohemia where merrymaking, gypsy lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground.  Beware, it is futile to resist the 7 Siren’s call!

name: 9 Energies
description: Each of us has 9 Energy Centers in our bodies, one of which is more active than the others – called the Active Energy. Knowing your Active Energy or Superpower gives you physical access to your spiritual nature. Sober please!

name: A Camp with No Name (ACWNN)
description: The dead horse is scarce, and we continue to beat it. Come by and sit in the desert in A Camp With No Name, where you will be told that buttered popcorn is a perfectly fantastic snow cone flavor – why would you think otherwise? (Don’t worry – there are “normal” flavors.) Look for us carting around chai or tidying up the playa with our vacuum cleaner.

name: A Cosmic Carnivale
description: Come and visit a Cosmic Carnival and may your body never miss a beat to the rhythm of this world.Here at Camp Cosmic Carnival music and artistic expression is encouraged and during daylight hours our two sides stages will be available to anyone who wishes to play. During dusk and evening hours we will host art, fire dancers, fire performers, live bands and of course carnival rides, games and a laser light show. From 8 a.m. to 12 p.m. and 2 p.m. to 5 p.m. we will be hosting a kids camp for any children, acc

name: a little oasis on the way
description: as the name implies, a simple oasis from the wonderful chaos of black rock city.  a spot to rest and relax as one wanders the art on the playa..short walls, shade covered by day, astroturf on the ground, and soothing water sounds at all hours.  shade, palm trees and water..what is not to like?

name: A Shack of Sit
description: SIT HAPPENS HERE 24×7. Shady chairs & lounges: refresh, rest, meet Burners. Enjoy iced water, healthy snax, lots of activities & WiFi.

name: A-Playa Mask
description: Breathe easy with the Maskman’s quality N95 dust masks with their psychedelic Burning Man logo.

name: A-TickleTrunkTastic Camp
description: Need a tickle? We’ll be bringing our tickle trunk of costumes galore; adorn, choose, trade, and pose! We will take your photo (if u would like) to admire yourself once you leave playa of your amazing outfits. Need a disguise for the day or week? We’ve got ya covered! Come join us from 1pm-5pm every day; relax and get fabulous, and don’t forget to STRIKE THAT POSE!

name: Above The Limit
description: Welcome to Camp Above the Limit’s Crystal Medina! Enter the domed arch to find Turkish coffee, spirits, chill spaces, lights, music, aromas, and conversations that will take you from the shifting sands of the desert to the corridors of your own psyche. Or just kick back in the pillows and have a nap. On the other side of the Medina, come help us rock the casbah with the Afterburner Lounge, its firepit, and the Black Rock Air Force’s own F-15.

name: ABR: Apt But Random
description: ABR is a tight-knit group of weird people whose values stem from a strong foundation of cooperative living, self-reliance, and responsibility. Our camp encourages playfulness, creativity, and exploration, and provides a casual social space for burners old and new alike.

name: AbsoFuckinLution
description: Calling all sinners!  Step into our street-front confessional and tell it to someone who gives a shit- our resident priests and priestesses are standing by to prescribe your personalized atonement regiment.  Stay for holy water at our bar: IPFuckinA is back along with a special new brew!  The dusty, thirsty masses will be served every afternoon until the kegs are blown.

name: Abstininthe
description: Abstininthe is the friendly bar on the playa, providing our special drink to the thirsty of BRC since the last millennium. Come try our many flavors and enjoy the music, ambiance and conversation of our neighborhood bar.

name: Academy of Arts and Sciences
description: Welcome to the Academy of Arts and Sciences. We have interactive classes teaching burners about science that can be used to create art, as well as art that makes science real. We strive to balance the left/right brain dichotomy with a range of activities to meet our fellow Burners’ diverse tastes. Come visit!

name: Adult Playspace
description: Come play with yourself or others, make a new friend or maybe even join in with somebody already playing.  We’ve got toys to share!

name: Airpusher Collective
description: Airships were one of the first crafts built to bring mankind up into the clouds and now Airpusher’s Steampunk Airship is bringing this experience to Burning Man in 2014 with a twist. It’s a place for you to dance, laugh, stargaze, and get a breath of fresh air underneath the illuminated balloons of a classic airship. Airpusher presents a new haven for DJs, musicians, aerialists and performance artists alike to showcase their talent on the playa.

name: Airstreameri and What Not
description: Come join us Wed evening for dusty scientific talks from a Geologist or Botanist or even a guyno talk by our resident Gynecologist. We have the Best Playa Post Card Table to misinform the folks back home where you are.

name: Alien Sanctuary
description: An Alien Sanctuary awaits forbidden alliances.  Intoxicating flowers extract authenticity.  A transformation allows for mutual empathy.  Travelers of the universes merge, mingle and mature.

name: Alien Siege Machine, The
description: The Alien Siege Machine is a ghost ship. It travels through space and time imperiling all it encounters. Appearing throughout the epochs, crews are enslaved and are driven by a mysterious rancor to pilot the Machine into battle, often adding their own technology as they feverishly execute another volley of combat against the very civilization from which they came. The Alien Siege Machine’s immortal and profane war has come to our time and place. Now it sits on the playa, battle wounded, but battle-ready. Go

name: aLittle
description: Stop by for Bloody Marys or Mimosas at sunrise.  Don’t forget your cup!Feeling in a knot-tying mood? Learn how to make paracord bracelets (everyday in the afternoon) or get hitched. Fake (or real) marriages every sunrise with mimosas.On Thursday take a swing at the Alot-of-Sacrifice Piñata!  Warning: this piñata is not full of candy.Cards Against Burning Man! The Massively-Multiplayer-Burning-Man-Themed-Card-Game (MMBMTCG) that you create! (think Apples to Apples/Cards Against Humanity -but Playa style).

name: Aloha Camp
description: Aloha and E Komo Mai! Welcome to Aloha Camp! As the migrating Polynesians did long ago using the stars as their navigational tools, we have used the flame in our pu’uwai (hearts) to migrate and lead us to Black Rock City! Come enjoy our island vibes, Aloha Spirit, and Hawaiian culture

name: Alternative Energy Zone
description: The AEZ is a generator free zone. If you like alternative energy, then welcome, you are invited to join our village of friendly folks. You will see and learn about solar panels, wind generators, solar ovens, solar showers, water cleaning, and meet people who can show YOU how to do this.

name: Altitude Lounge
description: Are you interested in seeing Burning Man from a different perspective?  Visit Altitude Lounge when you can relax on a couch, meet exciting people, and take in the views from the top of our 42 foot tall tower.  At night we will help you find your way home with our brightly lit navigational beacon.  Our tower is open 24 hours a day and when there are high winds, it is a great escape from blowing gravel.

name: AmazeCamp
description: AMAZECAMP offers a wonderland chill space underneath a sparkling pyramid. Stroll by on your peaceful nighttime walk through the neighborhood! Pick up some psychedelic glasses to enhance your burning man experience 🙂

name: Amoral Corral
description: Come wrangle your woes in our hammocks, draw stories on our typewriters, and live to dance about it at the bar. Even amoral stories have morals.

name: Amos
description: Feeling the heat?  Might as well enjoy it.  M/W/F beer pong and bags (plus some Famous Amos delights), 2-4pm.  Come play with us!

name: Anahasana Village
description: Anahasana is a portmanteau of Anahata (Heart Chakra) & Asana (Yogic Body Pose): Heart Embodiment.  We offer classes:  dance, awareness, connection, energy work, meditation, intersubjective meditation, sexual polarity, yoga and acro yoga.  Anahasana Village is a communion of hearts, souls and bodies, holding our light and dark sides in embrace and transparency.

name: Anat's Love Camp
description: Please come and share the energy of love with our wonderful camp community and enjoy each other. We love meeting people from all over. We will be celebrating Anat’s 20th year attending Burning Man!  She will be dancing & performing at the camp & in the fashion show wearing her many wonderful costumes and she will teach Brazilian Samba dance.

name: Ancient Cult of the Alligator
description: Just like religious temples on the Silk Road before us, The Ancient Cult of the Alligator is a resting place for weary travelers before they continue on the Playa Road. The Ancient Cult of the Alligator will offer daily afternoon activities with an open bar providing specialty drinks (Alligator Bites!), music to heal your soul, activities to refresh your mind and body, and a Alligator Deity to unite the community and pay your respects.

name: and then there's only LOVE
description: Love in all its forms is the constant that binds us together. In our 11th year, ATTOL continues to be the place to love and be loved.  Join us in our famous 24 hour air conditioned Orgy Dome, a consensual sex-positive, inclusionary and exploratory space where couples and moresomes come for unadulterated play.  Relax and make friends in our new Aphrodite’s Garden, attend a class, or enjoy our Thursday night Hot Sex Fire Show.

name: ANITA COCKTAIL
description: Join us for Cocktails, Culture and Carousing any day between 11am-6pm. Warning: May contain traces of Aussie nuts.
hometown: New York, LA, Seattle, Sydney, Georgia, Buenos Aires, Honolulu,

name: Annex Camp
description: Breakfast cereals!  3(!) different kinds of milk (soy, almond, rice)!  Bloody Mary shots!  Cheerio shaped seats!  Stickers!  Pendants for the first 20 people!  All under a 28′ parachute!  You’ll never go back to camp hungry after being out all night again.  BYOS (Bring Your Own Sh*t ie:  reusable bowls, utensils)

name: Anonymous Village - AV
description: We are a 12-step community who co-create a clean and sober environment for like-minded burners to have a safe place to camp. There are meetings from many different fellowships, from sunrise to midnight, and chips to mark years and/or burns. There are nightly excursions to check out the city and/or dance all night. We are not a glum lot.

name: Anti M's Home for Wayward Art
description: Anti M’s Home for Wayward Art is a gallery for adopting art; small art, lost art, found art, bad art, original paintings, photography and more.  Come adopt art, take it to a new forever home!

name: AOXOMOXOA
description: AOXOMOXOA invites all travelers/pilgrims/oldies/newbies to pause on their path & drop in to Terrapin Station for a refreshing drink, rest, dance and/or perform on our upgraded Youtopia stage. Dramatists, comedians, poets, ballerinas, musicians: most all are welcome! Climb aboard the Saucerful of Secrets for an enhanced perspective of the curious life forms inhabiting their Spaceship Earth. Dogz ‘n’ Bunz served Man burn night 2:00 a.m. playa time. And don’t miss the Beethoven’s Ninth traditional Sunday sunri

name: APEX
description: An interactive sound and visual performance camp.

name: Après Ski Black Rock City
description: Celebrations and libations and legendary ski themed party on Wednesday night with old skool tunes. Sample the white wine sangria or experience a shot-ski and frolic with the ski bunnies in the only SNOW on the playa! Wear your gear and goggles and come on up to the north to play! Free chair lift rides and rental ski equipment provided so everyone can shred the playa!

name: Aquavansary
description: Kelp Snacks, Mermaids, Monsters.  How many songs do you know about ships?

name: AquaZone
description: Every caravan through the desert seeks the lush oasis, the secret promise of life-giving Water. The added beauty of Water is that the wisdom you gain can be transmitted to the Water and thereby transmuted to your body. Come quench your thirst at AquaZone’s Love Water Bar, once again transmitting Intention to the Water for your body and soul’s pleasure.

name: Arctica Ice Sales
description: Arctica Ice Sales is your center-of-town resource for ice.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3/bag, or a 6-pack of crushed for $15.  During event, ice sales hours are Mon-Sat 9am-6pm, Sun Noon-6pm and 9am-Noon on Labor Day.  Pre-event sales are Thurs-Sun 9am-3pm at this location only.

name: Arctica3 Ice Sales - Ice Cubed
description: Ice Cubed is the ice sales igloo located in the 3 o’clock plaza.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3/bag or a 6-pack of crushed for the discounted price of $15.  Ice3 sales hours are Mon-Sat, 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm.

name: Arctica9 Ice Sales - Ice Nine
description: Ice Nine is the ice sales igloo located in the 9 o’clock plaza.  Crushed and block ice are availalbe for $3 per bag or a 6-pack of crushed at the discounted price of $15.  Ice9 sales hours are Mon-Sat, 9am-6pm, and Sun Noon-6pm.

name: AREOLA51
description: Areola51 is new on the playa this year. Everyone’s favourite nippledome, we’re complete with our “high” ropes course, nets, hammocks and a giant snuggle-tramp. We serve as a haven for weary, curious or cuddly desert dwellers and openly invite you to splay yourselves out on our multi-level lounge areas. Spicy caesars will be served by a couple of attractive weirdos during the late morning hours and then you’ll be ripe for a buffering, a PADDLIN’ and an airplane ride before you’re released.

name: Armagan
description: Armagan is an interactive fire art piece located at Opulent Temple.  Armagan means ‘the gift’ in Turkish. The concept fits in nicely with this year’s theme: a reference to the caravansaries along the Silk Road which ran through Turkey, allowing the exchange of treasures among different cultures.  It’s a tear drop shaped ‘Pod’ from where the music and fire is controlled with steampunk nuances, enhanced flame-effect cannons and special lighting.   An interactive element is “Salome’s Chamber”, a contained “dan

name: Arrakis Spice Market
description: Bringing spice to the playa.  Come visit us for culinary supplies and surprises 11am-2pm M-Th.

name: Arrow Dynamic Camp
description: The Arrow Dynamic camp directs you to the here and now.

name: Art Car Bus Stop
description: Enter the Sacred Circus for dancing, drinking, sharing, learning, gifting and expressing.  Art Car Bus Stop is a spontaneous autonomous faux municipality.

name: Art Car Camp
description: 2014 is Art Car Camp’s 20th year and we’ll be celebrating this milestone with a funky used car lot display. We’ll be exhibiting both daily drivers (permanently altered, street legal vehicles) and mutants. Art Car Camp is where “Daily Driver” licensed and insured full time art cars are displayed. These are vehicles that work their magic back in the communities from where they hail from all year round. Come see the collection and meet the artists!  Also showing films.

name: ART OF SUCH N SUCH
description: The Art of Such n Such will create an amazing interactive performance/fire performance area for the participants of Black Rock City! Please get involved with our honorarium project “The Infinite Infant and The Trail of Toys! Join us for daily parades, nightly fires, workshops, morning calisthenics, side show, infant care tips & paternity testing. Schedules listed daily!  If you want to get down & do this with us, come on over volunteer, sign up, get involved, be alive, live!

name: ARTery
description: Burning Man’s Art Headquarters on Playa

name: ArtScotto-Hidden-ProjectName
description: ArtScotto-Hidden-WebListing

name: Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust
description: The event “Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust” invites participants to strip naked, cover in Playa dust, paint cracks on the body and finalize with red hands to simulate a connection between oneself and the desert environment. The message is to appreciate the naked body as well as the environment we inhabit by becoming ‘one’ with it. The event will be documented with photography.

name: Ashram Galactica
description: The Grand Hotel at Ashram Galactica – Your Home Away From Home Away From Home

name: Asparagus Forest
description: Asparagus Forest is a chill-out oasis in a sea of sound camps. Visit us to hang out and meet a group of young, open minded individuals or stop by for one of our scheduled activities such as Australia Day, a Pig Roast, Fire Spinning, or Karaoke.

name: Astral Headwash
description: Good day dirty dwellers! We will be washing hair in the desert again this year. Come visit us with your happy spirits, your smiling faces and your dirty hair and we’ll do our best to make you feel like you’re in heaven. We’ll see you Monday – Friday noon – 4 PM. Remember to arrive early!

name: Astro Cats
description: We invite all burners to enjoy the night sky with our Star Gazing Pad and experience changing perception with our Box of Perception. Or, you can just chill with us during day and night. On Wednesday and Friday evening, you can join us for hot sake, story telling, and presentation from our residence scientists.

name: AstroPups: Space Station Canis
description: Fun, Frisky, n Fabulous! Exploring the PupVerse one lick at a time!

name: Atlantis
description: Atlantis is once again reborn.  Join us in the lost city for a taste of the life aquatic, wetter and wilder than ever before.

name: Atom Cult
description: The Most Radiant Camp at Burning Man. Come taste our fission ice cream and fusion pancakes. Bounce off the trampoline at the base and enjoy the magnificent view of BRC at the top of our 20’ cooling tower.

name: AudioSpa
description: AudioSpa is a therapeutic sound massage experience.  More at audiospa.org.

name: Automatic Subconscious
description: AutoSub is back for another year of aerials performances,

name: Avant Yard, The
description: The Avant Yard is home for the Diaspora Arts Collective.  The Diaspora is rapidly expanding as we spread across the planet. We encourage each other to look forward, develop our dreams and experience life to the fullest with an open mind. We want experience life and to encourage others to do the same. We offer Reiki, Meditation, Yoga, Tarot Readings and Massage. And then we hold workshops for these same artforms so that we can spread healing and joy even further.

name: Awesome!(ville)
description: We’re Awesome!(ville)… that pretty much sums it up.

name: AWESOMETOWN
description: Awesometown is Nevada’s premier unincorporated municipality filled with lovely vistas, friendly folks, and one unsightly airport. People love us on Yelp!

name: BAAAHS Station
description: BAAAHS Station is the central depot and homo-licious home on the range to BAAAHS, the Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep – part mutant vehicle, part penetrable sculpture and part rolling disco. Weary travelers come set for a spell, kick up your hooves  and dance or begin a new journey as you slide through a pulsing, pink sphincter into the luscious cocoon of his polyphonic peritoneum.

name: Backgammon
description: Big Backgammon Action on the Big Ole’ Playa!

name: Bacon Oasis
description: The Bacon Oasis offers amber jewels of deliciously sticky bacon for early risers and dusty returners.

name: Bad Advice Wanted
description: You’ve done some pretty stupid shit at burning man — we want to hear your fantastically bad advice for virgin burners. Like the worst. Think you got what it takes to impress us with your follies?

name: Bad Idea Theater
description: Once again Bad Idea Theater returns to serve up tasty refreshments for the mind and body. Open early in the afternoon for libations and merriment and tomfoolery. The best worst films you’ve never see starting at sunset and running through the night. Stop by to find out about workshops and events. There’s always something going on.

name: BADLANDS
description: BADLANDS funk jams! Come and join us on the front porch and put a little bit of chicken grease on your ankle bone to get you shaking proper on the playa!

name: Baggage Check
description: Experience Burning Man baggage free!  Check your baggage with us—emotional baggage only!—by writing it in our book, which we will burn at the Temple Burn.

name: BAMBOOZLED!
description: “To be confused or thrown off thoroughly and completely” yeah, that’s about right. We are your dirty dirty bar in the desert striving for radial self stupidity. Come endure our special shots and ride our giant steel rocking horse “Ruckus”. You’ll stop for a minute, but stay for hours.

name: Bandan-Aroma and Bandana Brigade
description: Bandan-Aroma offers  participants the opportunity to infuse aromatic oils onto handcrafted bandanas to keep and  wear as fashionable yet practical accessories as they caravan about the Playa, protecting against dust storms and providing a more pleasant experience when visiting the porta-potties. The Bandana Brigade is a caravanning band of bandana-wearing Bandan-Aroma  campmates on bikes (tongue twister!), who will make surprise visits to randomly selected porta-potty banks, offering bandanas and essential

name: Banya Camp
description: Explore purifying and bonding experience of traditional Russian sauna: dry and steam heat with birch twig lashings

name: Bao Chicka Wow Wow
description: Bao Chicka Wow Wow will be serving steamed pork buns and hot tea.

name: Barber Ella Shop
description: It’s three days into the Burn and you’re already cursing that tangled mess that used to be your hair. Come get it trimmed, cut, or just plain buzzed at Barber Ella Shop, the interplanetary playa salon that wants to give you a mohawk while surrounding you with sexy sci-fi impersonators. Hey, are you a haircutting pro? We always have chairs and equipment open for guest stylists. Bzzzz.

name: Barbie Day Spa
description: Barbie Day Spa…. best damned day spa on the playa… stop by and get pampered.  Massage, body wash, fingernail painting, and wine.

name: Barbie Death Camp
description: Come on in to BDC&WB- enjoy fine fine from a cheap paper cup in our climate controlled Bistro while you tickle the ivories or your neighbor. Marvel at our sick and twisted art displays and make memories to last a lifetime or a at least a few precious moments.

name: Barbie Death Village
description: Back again for another triumphant year on the playa, Barbie Death Village and it’s subcamps (Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Barbie Day Spa, Barbie Boutique, Dye With Dignity, Dread Pirate Barbie, Black Rock City Body & Paint, Clan O’Crash, Meercats, Ohio Boyz, and Loose Nutz) will be there to welcome all burners.  Feel free to drop on by for a nice glass of wine or Otter Pop and get a load of the sickest bastards on the playa.

name: Barbots of Santa Barbarikon
description: Calling all athletes, enginerds, beach bums and kids-at-heart: saunter or stumble over to the Barbot playground, where Cyborg Volterra oversees old-school yard games to get you smiling. Quench your thirst on Tuesday or Thursday afternoon with Moscow Mules at the happiest of Russian-themed happy hours, served by Volterra, our robotic bartender who mixes ‘em up stiff!

name: Barechested Baristas
description: Cold coffee and beautiful baristas. We provide a nice pick-me-up, in more ways than one.

name: Basshenge
description: A deep resonance through your soul draws you towards an immense multitude of beautiful structures so profound & awe inspiring, you can only fathom how such artistic beauty and creation ended up in such a wondrous place. Basshenge is the ultimate enigma & you alone hold the most important key to unlocking its infinite possibilities! Shaded workshops for your soul, body, & mind during the periods of solar illumination. Tribal beats to stomp the dust into its rightful place in the twilight.

name: Bat Carnival
description: The Bat Carnival- We are the spine-tingling fright of the funhouse mixed with the thrill of carnival games of chance. Our camp is one part motley stable of stick ponies and one part ooky-spooky carnival.

name: Battle Born Burners
description: Battle Born Burners where “Welcome Home Means Nevada” is our mantra. Join the freaks from the desert on the desert to get your “Nevadatude” on, with those of us who count the days, till our blessed “burn time”.

name: BC Village
description: The B.C. (British Columbia) Village brings together different camps hailing from various regions of British Columbia, Canada. Come party like a Canuck: enjoy uniquely Canadian drinks, bike and art cars, and a homage to Canadian astronaught Chris Hadfield.

name: Be There Now
description: stop by, you will like us

name: Beach @ the End of the Universe
Bearwhalea
description: Once again the mighty BEARWHALE saunters forth from Kamchatka in search of migratory cucumbers, elk fairy dust, and playa shenanigans.  Stop by to bask in the glow of this evolutionary marvel!

name: Beats Boutique
description: This camp is devoted to turning your energy UP!! We will have Beats Droppin, Booze Flowin and a Boutique to enhance your style on the playa! Our positive and loving vybes will make your stay at our camp EPYK!

name: Beauty through Urban Decay
description: This piece was inspired by the artist’s sweetheart, as the daffodil is her favorite flower. Not only is it an expression of his love for her, but it is proof that monumental achievements can be made through a series of tiny steps. This is represented by the intricate detail of many thousands of individual ceramic pieces that come together to form one magnificent structure.  It also celebrates the strength of Nature over man by showing delicate flowers burst through a concrete sidewalk.

name: Beaver Ranch, The
description: A place to release your inner animal

name: Beaverton
description: Camp Beaverton is an intentional, experimental, and experiential Burning Man community theme camp. Our goal is to provide a safe space for queer women on and off-Playa. We encourage education, participation, inquiry, conversation, and self-reflection on what it means to be “a Beaver” AND extend our goals to the greater Black Rock community by hosting workshops and social events.

name: bEEcHARGE!!!
description: The bEES are cHARGING!!!  We wear the bLACK and yELLOW.  In all kinds of awesome ways.  We bUZZZZZZZZ.   We sWARM!  Once again we will sWARM the mAN! Wednesday at sixish. Before that, at 2, YOU bEE up and come to our camp for lABEETOS:  Honey kISSED Mojitos.  yES and wAGGLE-dANCE oFF!!!  wE lOVE newbEES!!!!  Think aHEAD:  bLACK and yELLOW…  Come bEE with us, find a new way of bEEING:  bEEUTIFUL bEEING!!!! bUZZZZZZZZZZZZZ!!!!!

name: Better Bunny Bureau
description: The Better Bunny Bureau provides refuge for bunnies and future bunnies along the playa road: a swinging bed oasis keeping bunnies comfortable in cool shade and off the hot desert floor; new and wonderous goods to be gifted to weary travelers; refreshing libations to quench their thirst; hoppy bouncy beats for dancing, and bunny iconography abounding! It’s where travelers from all over the playa can come and rest, exchange ideas, “barter”, mingle and rejuvenate their tired minds and weary souls.

name: Big Puffy Yellow
description: There is hope for Mankind. All things Big, Puffy, and Yellow – a collective of artists and techies that enjoy visitors of all walks of life, camp camaraderie, music, communal cooking, drinking morning coffee and ice cold beer – enjoy an overabundance of all things Big, Puffy, and Yellow.

name: Billion Jelly Bloom
description: Our Burning Man-ifested polyp-morphic performance art transforms the night air into a deep ocean inhabited by an undulating, luminous jellyfish bloom. Our mobile, 15 foot tall, 640 lumen bright performer articulated jellies dip and swarm to interact and engage surrounding creatures, sounds and environs.Follow your bloom and join us for one of our BRC performances. Learn more at facebook.com/billionjellybloom.

name: Binary Solace
description: A mythical tree that is both an overlapping geometric shade structure and scintillating interactive lighting installation. Come here to find solace from the day or night and listen to deep, beautiful music and soundscapes.

name: Bioluminati / Pimp Yr Bike
description: Bioluminati has been illuminating BRC for 17 years with art, quests and now PIMP YR BIKE; the bling-ification station where Black Rock Citizens upgrade their rides with that extra get-up-and-glow. Open daily. Donors of non-moopy craft materials get VIP access! And every evening, Micro-Cinema!

name: Bitchin' Braid Camp
description: Out of control hair taking over your life? Come on over to Bitchin’ Braid Camp and K-Bar to enjoy a refreshment, music, conversation while we braid your nappy locks in the shade.

name: BIZARNIVILLE
description: Step right up! Come on down to BIZARNIVILLE, and get ready for the best bad trip you’ll ever have. Dance on our floor, build some mutant toys, and join the “neo-carnie” family and lifestyle.Sword swallowers, fire breathers, burlesque, and more! Misfits, hooligans, and all are welcome.No matter what you’re looking for, a trip to BIZARNIVILLE has you exactly where you need to be headed.

name: black hole, the
description: the official headquarters and residence of the Black Rock City Gate, Perimeter and Exodus Department. If you are looking for someone who works for Gate, or are interested in volunteering – this is the best place to start looking.

name: Black Rock Bakery
description: Fresh breads, pastries, and ice cream prepared in the heart of the Black Rock French Quarter. Last year, we had also gluten free baked goods for the first time. This year we want to expand with your help! If you aren’t able to camp with us, bring your team and supplies and work under the direction of our master bakers – what would Burning Man be without beignets and ice cream?

name: Black Rock Beacon
description: We produce a daily newspaper for Black Rock City with a mix of fun articles and serious news. Our Press Club & News Room provide shade and refreshment for ourselves as well as other members of the press, bacon-bearing volunteers, and interested Burners.

name: Black Rock Boutique
description: Since 1996 we have  provided fabulous & funky fashions to the citizens of BRC. Our  fashionistas will help slip you into something a little more questionable. We’ll even alter your outfit on the spot if needed.  Strut your stuff on our runway to some of BRC’s hottest DJ’s. Volunteer fashionistas always welcome. Playa worthy clothing donations accepted.

name: Black Rock Brewery
description: In eternal devotion to the magic of hop and yeast, the Black Rock Brewery brings together home brewers from around the country, to share their honey ales, lavender meads, ginger beers, bacon porters, and coffee stouts. Join us for daily tastings and learn more about the different styles of brews!

name: Black Rock Cantina
description: Come to the Cantina and join our ranks as a jedi knight, bounty hunter, or caravan raider!

name: Black Rock Center for Unlearning
description: Black Rock Center for Unlearning: Washing that knowledge right out of your head since 2009.

name: Black Rock City Airbrush
description: Black Rock City Airbrush is back! This camp resides within the Sin City Village and offers the finest custom airbrushed T-shirts and body art made just for you! “You-say-it-we-spray-it”We are creating MAXIMUM participation from gifted patrons! Expect to participate, and/or take a guerilla course in airbrushing! You may even find yourself running our booth while we sneak away.Enthusiasm, Curiosity, Compliments, Flirting, Patience, and Cold Beer go a long way at our camp!

name: Black Rock City Bass & Booze
description: Drip drip drop there goes an ear-gazim!! Come one come all and cut some rug and listen to ground rattling beats, wet your whistle with a tasty cocktail or just relax and enjoy yourself with life size games and a mouth watering playa dog.

name: Black Rock City Body & Paint
description: Black Rock City Body & Paint, nestled within Barbie Death Village, has been voted “Best Body Paint Camp” on the playa and is your Critical Tits headquarters.  Whether you want your boobs highlighted or your entire chest and face done by one of our “Playa Picassos”, come by for the finest body painting around.  We’ll be open most days and all day Friday, preparing all of the lovely sirens for the Critical Tits parade.  Wine served too.

name: Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe
description: The name says it all. Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe will be on-site with a variety of tools and supplies to help fix or build things that are broken or need to be built on the playa. We are proud to have spent over 10 years serving Black Rock City in this capacity.

name: Black Rock City Municipal Airport
description: Black Rock City Municpal Airport, FAA 88NV, is the air gate to the city.

name: Black Rock City Post Office BRCPO
description: Send your mail to and through the Black rock City Post Office in Center Camp, on and off the playa, we deliver! Get your Green card and join the SOUP Advisory Board and do your service to apply for your Black Rock city Passport with us at The Embassy!

name: Black Rock City Science Center
description: Come explore the line where science and art merge, as well as play various games of strategy and chance.  We offer many opportunities to explore your inner child, while satisfying your adult minds.

name: Black Rock Disc Golf Club
description: Black Rock Disc Golf Club is back again!  Come play disc/frisbee golf with us!  Need discs?  We brought them!  Newbie or expert, join us for some fun and learning!  Giant mushrooms are built for obstacles on the course and everything is lit 24/7 so come play whenever!

name: Black Rock French Quarter
description: The heart of the Big Easy come to Black Rock City, including cocktails, bakery, fresh roasted coffee, live music and burlesque, wine cellar, vineyard, Mardi Gras, Jazz Funeral for the Man, and a few other surprises. Our French Quarter buildings are based on an open design that your camp can build to join us!

name: Black Rock Kwoon and Dojo
description: An on-playa temple dedicated to the spirit of martial arts and self cultivation.  We host workshops, gatherings, peaceful meditation, and house a crack team of bakery delivery monks!

name: Black Rock Lemonade
description: Ice cold lemonade for dusty humans!

name: Black Rock Power CO-OP
description: Black Rock Power CO-OP is a collection of some of the most unique camps in the City. Everyone will find something that will draw their interest.

name: Black Rock Prep - Road Scholars
description: Black Rock Prep is back, this time welcoming Road Scholars! The Silk Road was well-known for the exchange of knowledge, and we’re taking it on the road. Come play double-dutch, four square, swim in our intramural pillow-“pool” or play on the reactive light see-saw.

name: Black Rock Public Library
description: Black Rock Public Library is back and better than ever! Cool off and relax, read a classic novel, peruse our large comic book collection, pull out a board game, or just hang out with your fellow bookish burners. Join us for a refreshing literary cocktail Mon-Wed 12-1pm. The entire BRPL collection will be available for indefinite checkout starting Wednesday!

name: Black Rock Rockfish
description: With the introduction of Black Rock Rockfish, playa fishing boats will have options other than Sparkle Ponies and sharks.  The Black Rock rockfish is a flashy fish and swims in a school that always points into the wind.  The cd scales flash in the sun and glitter in the night.

name: Black Rock Roller Disco
description: What? A roller disco in the middle of the desert? Yes, that’s exactly what we are.  The Black Rock Roller Disco is the roller skating rink of Black Rock City!!!  We’re open 24/7 and have everything you need to experience playa life on skates.  We get funky with the old school funk and roller disco, but we also have DJ’s playing everything that makes you shake your booty on skates. Stop by and have a funky good time with us.

name: Black Rock Spatial Delivery
description: Playawide bike messengers since 1999. Your missive is our mission!!

name: Black Rock Vineyards
description: Producers of the first and only wine grown, pressed, and aged entirely in Black Rock City! Established in 1999, the vineyards have nurtured a cutting of the nearly extinct carnivorous Cabernet Dionaea for 12 years to yield the acclaimed Vinum Pejorative – vintners and wine lovers, stop by for a sip! We especially need experts and trainees to start our first batch of Dandelion and Lilac wines!

name: Black Rock Wine Cellar
description: The unrelenting heat of the Black Rock Desert is no place for wine! If you have a special bottle in need of tender loving care, we invite you to check your bottle into our refrigerated subterranean facility, where it will await your return under lock and key. And while you’re here, why not join us for a tasting? And if you have construction skills, our excavation crew always needs hand…

name: Black Rock Yearbook
description: Welcome to the Black Rock Yearbook, shooting yearbook photos since 2007.  Every year Burners come to our camp to get their official yearbook photo!   After Burning Man, we put together a downloadable PDF and post it at our website: www.blackrockyearbook.com

name: BLD
description: Bouncing Large Dinosaurs since 1995!

name: BLM and Sheriff Substation
description: The Bureau of Land Management and Pershing County Sheriff will have a substation in Center Camp. Stop by to report a crime, fill out a crime report or just to show your appreciation for the law enforcement professionals who work hard to keep Black Rock City safe.

name: BloAsis Village
description: BloAsis is a community of men and women dedicated to hospitality, creativity and self expression. Come in through our A hole, strut your stuff on our cat walk, dance through the sunset and cuddle around our fire; we of BloAsis welcome you and invite you to our events throughout the week.

name: Block Party
description: Camp Block Party is an interactive camp that believes in the solidifying force of the Block, the unit, the power of one. When many combine and act as one, limitless heights can be reached. However, when units are removed, the unit becomes unstable leading to ultimate collapse.Come by anytime to play with our “Giant Jenga” blocks.

name: Blood Bath & Beyond
description: Feel the need to drink before 10am? Stop by Blood Bath & Beyond for some kickin Bloody Marys!

name: Bloody Mess Oasis
description: Weary traveler, come frolic and replenish what the playa has taken. It’s been a harrowing journey, we are your Bloody Mess Oasis. Let us soothe your weary dust swept eyes with sumptuous art and ?lm from the silk road and beyond, your ears with healing beats from cultures near and far and ?nally refuel your body, with vegetable infused Bloody Mary’s. Come play with us.
hometown: We are a mutt... SF, Nola, NY, Miami

name: Bloom Room
description: Once a year, the Sh?gun of the 15th century Japan would request the surrounding towns to dedicate a gift reflecting their talents and skills to the city of Tokyo for the public to enjoy. Many of these contributions can still be found throughout the city today in expressions of art forms, statues, and shrines.

name: Bloop / DeOxidized
description: dEOxidized Bloop camp is dedicated to recharging the batteries of hard working business people everywhere. The camp is comprised of members of Entrepreneurs Organization (EO) along with guests from all over the world.  The theme “Imagination” embodies the spirit of entrepreneurship and interpersonal outreach.  The camp will feature a welcome arch water fountain, Infrared photo booth, kissing booth, bar, and large shade protected lounging areas with great music.

name: Blue Oasis
description: Enjoy movies at the Blue Oasis Theater on a big screen under the stars with full stereo sound.  Our film collection includes big name feature films, cult movies and true art collectables..  Or, bring your own (DVD format only) and arrange for special shows.

name: BMIR
description: Burning Man Information RadioBroadcasting over the air on the playa at 94.5 FM and streaming live from Burning Man and year round at http://www.bmir.org

name: Bojon Balance Camp
description: Test your balance skills at our playground whilst sipping late afternoon cocktails cooling off in the shade.

name: Boonville Cabaret
description: The Boonville Cabaret is a small and intimate venue designed for spontaneous theatre performance. Come anytime during the day or join us on Thursday dusk to show off your fabulous talents in music, story telling, making faces, or just surprise us.

name: Boosh Camp
description: Come for the Blender Bike Smoothie Parties but stay for the Love Bus Ball Pit !!! It’ll be all like BOOSH in yo’ face !!! (It’s actually a compliment…)

name: Booth, The
description: Relationship Crisis/Celebration Center. Come work it out at The Booth.

name: Booty Hunters
description: Hunters of the golden bubblebutt, unite! Whether your bum is flat, bouncy, perky or juicy, saunter over to the Booty Hunters Saloon for some quality boozy booty appreciation. Share a drink, pick out a pair of fabulous new booty shorts, play a game, and shake your tail to some groovy booty beats!!

name: Booty Shack, The
description: Stop by LNS at the Booty Shack Late Nite to warm your heart and fill your stomachs.  Food, drink, entertainment and you’ll find out what the S in LNS means!  Sorry no clowns.  Open late.

name: Border Crossing
description: A lonely, desolate outpost, the border marks the place between where you have been and where you are going. Crossing the border leaves one world behind, a new world ahead—if only they will let you through. Do you have your papers ready? Are you smuggling contraband? Perhaps you are an alien, perhaps you are a citizen. Like a coin, every border has two sides, and you must choose. Which side are you on?

name: Botanica Bodhi Manman Bejeezus
description: Tarot and palm readings, candle magic, essential oils and infusions, talismans and other expressions of the mystical arts find their home behind our unassuming storefront. Join us in crafting spirit masks, and helping visitors to customize voodoo dolls with trinkets from the object of their desire or ire. Offerings of the sacred and the profane are encouraged to keep our little Botanica and Voodoo Shop stocked.

name: Brain Freeze / Got Stickers Camp
description: Brain Freeze / Got Stickers Camp is back again bringing you all the “must have” stickers and frozen margaritas along with scorching entertainment.

name: Brand-UR-Ass N' More
description: Brand-UR-Ass ‘N More will stimulate your entire being, from your mind to your ass. Bare your butt at the hitchin post and get a temporary brand. Bathe in gong vibrations, do some cock ropin’, enjoy tunes, belly up to the saloon, enjoy the giving tree, visit the Pink Fuzzy Monkeys and hitch a ride on a Viking ship. Y’all come N play!

name: BrassTax Radio Malibu
description: Tune in to our 24-hour coverage of Brass Tax shenanigans on Radio Malibu (or stop by the on-playa studio): music, sing-a-longs, live interviews, morning calisthenics, and intraplaya sunrise traffic cone sports reportage. A winner could be you!

name: BRC Animal Control
description: Since 2001, Black Rock City Animal Control (BRCAC) has tagged and inoculated countless playa “animals,” keeping the streets of Black Rock City safe and secure for all residents. BRCAC also continues its commitment to interactivity on playa with playful schticks residents have come to love such as Tequila Pit Crew, Chapstick Commandos, Bad Idea Camp, and BRCAC’s quest to find the “Winner” of Burning Man with Trophy Camp.

name: BRC Hash House Harriers (BRCH3)
description: On On! The BRC Hash House Harriers (BRCH3) is drinking group with a running problem on the playa. The BRCH3 hosts daily runs called hashes followed by an adult beverage, singing and fun. We welcome all hashers and those that are new to the Hash House Harriers. Come by and join us for a run or a beer and….we can also fix your bike. If you need a repair, come see us.

name: BRC HOA
description: The BRC HOA is a gathering of camps who, through great feats of legal acrobatics and savy manipulation of real estate regulations, have joined together to create a village that excels at illumination, caffeination, rehabilitation, inebriation, gamification and dabbles in the fine art of heckling.

name: BRC Weekly newspaper
description: BRC WEEKLY is Black Rock City’s most popular independent newspaper. As BRC’s premiere lifestyle & culture rag, the BRC Weekly features insightful articles, colorful commentary, and of course, its infamous Out/In List, providing the citizens of BRC a lively, entertaining read for their trips to the ports-potty.

name: BRC3PO
description: Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office returns in 2014 in our giant postbox on the 3:00 Plaza for another year of creative interaction through postal services. We provide postcards and stamps, make deliveries to camps, create music and dance, have spontaneous rants. Warning: you may be encouraged to express yourself in new and unexpected ways. Open most hours.?

name: Brokedown Palace
description: A collection of souls, some damaged, some pristine, gathered upon the Playa for healing and celebration. “Fare you well, fare you well, I love you more than words can tell, Listen to the river sing sweet songs, to rock my soul”

name: Brouhaha
description: Our primary website is brouhahasf.com, which is currently under construction, but leads to our Facebook page where members of the community can connect with our events and get to know us before the burn.For those interested in the music our resident DJs and guests have played, check out soundcloud.com/brouhahasf

name: Brulee, A Kinky Circus
description: Brûlée brings kinky circus excitement and exploration to the Burning Man Esplanade.  Come run away with the kinkiest circus!

name: Bubble Camp
description: Come by bubble camp for the classiest time on the playa!Stop in the dome for some Thai iced tea between 10am and 3pm. And visit the Bubble Babble Service to send a receive letters from burners you don’t know. And then relax in our country club with putt putt and badminton

name: Bubble Lounge
description: Tie up your camel and stop in at the Bubble Lounge for refreshments, relaxation, music and BUBBLES.  Dip your wand into the silky, slippery, soapy solution, purse your lips, blow away your fatigue and create a whirling orb of magical swirling colors.  Watch it drift away along with your fears and cares.  And remember, the softer you blow, the bigger the bubble….

name: Bubbles and Bass
description: BUBBLY WITH LOTS OF BASS!We will be rockin’ you out during the AM hours with bubbly bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa, dance the morning away, and cheers with a glass of bubbly! Come visit us during the afternoon hours for workshops or hang with us in the evenings to relax your weary feet and connect with a new friend.
hometown: NYC  w/ campers from Philly, DC, LA, SF, London, Hong Kong

name: Buddha Lounge
description: The “Buddha Lounge” Sound Camp, Art Installation & Outdoor Chill Space at Burning Man, Gem & Jam, Sonic Bloom, Serenity & LIB. Buddha Lounge offers indoor & outdoor experiences of electronic music, art & meditation providing a chill, lounge down-tempo groove during day & moves into temple-bass, glitch, dub, tech producers & performers after sunset. Performers Include: Emancipator, Kalya Scintilla, Kaminanda, Buddha Bass, Govinda, Desert Dwellers, Pumpkin, Porkchop, Idiot Savant, Sammy Bliss, Luxx Moderna, M

name: BuddhaCamp at the Lotus Dome
description: Every human being can manifest their ultimate potential and live a life of true happiness through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo. Come learn and play with us at the Lotus Dome.

name: Buddy System
description: BUDDY SYSTEM! Kickball, Art, Observation Tower, Bar, Chilling Buddy!

name: Bumblepuss
description: Bumblepuss brings a spa theme to the playa. With the addition of the aromatherapy focused Lavender Lounge. Visit and soak in the aromas as you relax in the shade.

name: Bureau of Misinformation
description: The Bureau of Misinformation is your leading source of radical ridiculousity in an increasingly homogeneous world. We’ll challenge your sense of reason with dubious facts, and then we’ll pour you a whiskey, spin you around a couple times, and send you off in the wrong direction.

name: BURNERKALIFRACTALISHUS
description: Stop by for a yoga or acro yoga tune up, try our our slack line or just give a rousing laugh at our Maniacal Laughter Megaphone stand! you can also sign up for a thai or regular massage from one of our excellent therapists!

name: Burners Without Borders
description: You are invited to BWB camp to find out how you can get involved year round making a difference in your local community. Changing the world should be fun, so we offer live music and a screen printing booth with art from the playa. Join us in making history!

name: Burning Band Camp
description: The Burning Band! We’re here to play for you.

name: Burning Man Bike Course
description: Come on by the Burning Man Bike Course and try out our thrilling bike features. Test your skills on the whoop-d-doos, rhythm course, jumps, The Wave, wobble totters and The Knife. We have something to thrill and challenge riders of all abilities. Fabulous gifts for spectacular riders!

name: Burning Man Studios
description: Burning Man Studios is a diverse group of crazies from across the country and across space and time that love movies, bad writing, and self-expression in all its forms.  Come by for a drink, some shade, or just to tell us a story.

name: Burning Man T-Shirt Factory
description: Paint a BM design on your clothes, body, or whatever fits. Fun, quick, and easy. We provide the stencils, spray paint, and bad advice.  Open 24/7.

name: Burning Sky
description: Come see Black Rock City from 11,000 feet and watch our skydivers depart the plane before returning you safely to the playa. Visit our web site or stop by the camp for more info!

name: * Cats
description: Come chill in our hammock dome. Take a nap or medidate in the shade and escape from the heightened energy of the burn.

name: Cabana Club
description: Come and enjoy The Favorite Vacation Destination for the hard working citizens of Black Rock City!  The Cabana Club is an oasis of hospitality and friendship. We serve up a refreshing array of nosh and cocktails for your Afternoon Delight and a variety of late-night themed events.

name: Cacao Camp
description: bringing the culture of the food of the gods to the playa.

name: Cafe Negro
description: Cafe Nëgrø provides aural and oral transformative rituals for your morning, featuring the finest in black coffee and black metal. Come for our 1 PM hour of darkness and ready yourself for the new day.

name: Cafe Surprise
description: The fine patrons of Cafe Surprise invite you to dine with us at our very own Cafe Surpise. Come daily at 1:30pm to enjoy French Fries and nightly from 5:30-7:30pm to enjoy dinner in our French Bistro.

name: Cafe Village
description: Cafe Village is a ‘Work/Staff Camp’.  We are not a ‘Theme Camp’ and although we like to have fun and definitely create community, we have also worked to make sure Cafe Village is a respectful environment for those of us who need solace from the masses after a long days work!

name: Caja Pedo
description: No, it’s not a mirage; Caja Pedo is a refuge for all those who wander.Escape the heat and join us for daily rejuvination. Unlock answers that only bananas and pendulums can reveal.Daily creations will appear from this international crew of burners. Come decorate yourself. Join us for some home made games, yoga, meditation or simply relaxation.The playa is full of dust, so bring your dusty Caja Pedo our way.

name: Camp (!)
description: Our camp is meant to ignite creativity and to build community through healing, light, education, dance, art, expression and healthy, mindful practices. Our aim is to invoke a sense of wonder and play, to offer workshops to aid in your quest for growth and personal development, and inspire you to create meaningful experiences with our vibrant community of artists, musicians and healers.

name: Camp 11:11
description: 11:11 is a catalyst to unite people. It’s a totally vertical moment in time. Make a wish at 11:11. Have a shot, give a kiss, or smoke a smoke at 11:11. Flame on at 11:11. Orgasm at precisely 11:11. Does anyone know what time is it? Its 11:11. Come help us discover 11:11 at Camp 11:11

name: Camp 451
description: Free library – come by browse, sit, visit, chill

name: Camp A-Bunn-Dance
description: The members of Camp A-Bunn-Dance will be riding around on bikes with radios and speakers. When the music is right we will form a circle for a spontaneous inclusive dance floor. Come Dance your Bunns off with us.

name: Camp Afterglow
description: Afterglow, that wonderful feeling that lingers long after the experience has elapsed—a feeling that only occurs when the mind, body, and soul has been ever so stimulated. Our gift to the Playa and to its dear citizens is Afterglow!

name: Camp Armageddon
description: Armageddon – it’s not the end of the world, it’s the Safe Word! Come here for bike repair, yoga, music or just ‘set a spell’ in our living room dome!

name: Camp Awesomeness
description: Camp Awesomeness is a transformational camp that brings together people who are driven to change the world-  entrepreneurs, authors, technophiles, mavericks, artists and visionaries alike. At the Camp, you receive powerful training, profound mind shifts, groundbreaking ideas, deep connections, incredible adventures and unique opportunities to give back and be awesome, so you can play an even bigger game and significantly expand your ability to accomplish bold things. The Camp will attract amazing men and wo

name: Camp Bang Bang
description: Come and play with us! Yoga, meditation, ceremony and our annual Wild Animal party on Wednesday night.

name: Camp Bitcoin
description: Camp Bitcoin explores and demonstrates the promise of Decommodified Transactions to the Playa. We offer workshops and conversation around the possibilities of cryptocurrency, taking the discussion far beyond its stereotype as just a new form of money. Join us to discuss smart property, decentralized autonomous corporations, and much, much more!

name: Camp Caribbean
description: The soul warriors of Camp Caribbean are back with the absolute best riddims of the Caribbean, including salsa, roots reggae, soca, dancehall, reggaeton, zouk and more! Stop by to dance, chill in a hammock or have a mojito at our annual Thursday afternoon fete at 2pm.

name: Camp Charlie
description: Charlie The Unicorn Art Car is an homage to the most infamous unicorn in the history of popular culture.Inspired by great balls of fire, candy cane stripper poles and rainbow glitter, this one of a kind land-yacht is as unique as the phenomenon that inspired it.On the playa, Charlie The Unicorn Art Car is known for epic DJ sets, mesmerizing laser light shows and massive fire balls that shoot from his horn.

name: CAMP COMBOBULATED
description: While every person’s first Burn is unique, most everyone at some point is confused, disoriented, and unnerved by the intensity of the experience… discombobulated. Working through this is a part of the journey, but it helps to connect with people who have gone through it before and respect and honor the transformation. Our camp contribution is to help people through this metamorphosis – to combobulate the discombobulated.

name: Camp Conduit
description: Gifting sun hats, hemp bondage rope, suspension bondage rides, and knot instruction to the masses.  Returning in 2014 with more hats, more rope, and more fabulous belts and scarves!

name: Camp Contact
description: Camp Contact’s motto is “Explore Connection” which we do through workshops in Contact Improvisation Dance, Ecstatic Dance, Acro Yoga, Intersubjective Meditation, Interchange and many other forms of embodiment and awareness generating practices.  Come play with us!

name: Camp Cuddle Cult
description: Camp Cuddle Cult aims to foster a stronger Burning Man community through cuddling.  Drop by and immerse yourself in one of our famous (platonic) Cuddle Puddles filled with soft pillows, fuzzy blankets and warm bodies.  If you want to make some new friends on the playa this is the camp for you!

name: Camp Cul-de-Sac
description: since 1997, a collection of friends, bringing fine cinema and video experiments.

name: Camp Cut! Cut!
description: Camp Cut! Cut! for those who know and those who want to know.

name: Camp D.O.A.
description: Camp D.O.A is a Burning Man theme camp, hosted by an exciting, fun-loving group of rock climbers, mountaineers, canyoneers, backpackers, skiers, kayakers and, of course, Burners! We offer music, conversation, dancing, hooping, and a shady spot to relax with a glass of wine, champagne, or cocktail. So come in, have a seat, and share with us the decadent outdoor adventures you like to do while you enjoy the best decadence in Black Rock City!

name: Camp Disco Nap
description: Because the best type of nap is one with a party at the end!  Dedicated to the art of getting ready– Camp Disco Nap is about bonding over creative frenzied makeovers, dancing in hot pants, and all things shiny and distracting.

name: Camp Do It All
description: We are a group of doers and performers based mainly out of Portland Oregon.  We will be providing a chill space, with classy music, and providing food, hookah, tea, along with flow and yoga workshops!

name: camp do nothing
description: Ride the 360 Swing, play on the Foam Domewe have been described as the funniest camp for yards in any direction 4 years running

name: Camp Dusty Sanchez
description: Come get your Dusty Sanchez on!

name: Camp Fingerbang!
description: Camp Fingerbang features the Go Fuck Yourself Saloon and is dedicated to raising the level of inappropriateness on the playa. We are a group of delightfully ridiculous long time playa friends who are yet again banding together for another year of fun and mayhem. We do not take ourselves seriously at all and neither will you when you come to visit.

name: Camp Gallavant
description: Ahoy from the Pirates of the Playa (infamous creators of the Mutant Vehicle, USS Nevada). We have the “gall” to “Gallavant” around the playa spreading fun and adventure throughout the City, so, visit us, enjoy the Arrgh Bar, as well as our Chill Lounge and hop a ride on a Mutant Vehicle at the #1 loading station for the Un-Official Public Transit System of Black Rock City!

name: Camp Hot Cheeks
description: Stop by for body-painting by Latte, drinks, and the Chinese Swear Word of the Day.

name: Camp Hot Mayo
description: Camp Hot Mayo is excited to be back and as usual we welcome all!  Please come visit anytime and join us on Thursday @ 4:20pm for our Irish Car Bomb party. On Saturday @ noon for Sangria. We will have daily yoga and meditation in the morning to revive your soul for another amazing day on the playa. We will have a board w/ all of our scheduled events. We always try and stay at 9ish and H!

name: Camp Hotel Rug
description: Chill with an eclectic group spanning the whole globe, at the hotel rug nothing is left unturned. Take workshops to improve your flow, creativity, and perception or some time with our counselors to delve into the depths of the psyche and the mind and the effect the playa has on it!

name: Camp Illuminaughty!
description: Welcome to Camp Illuminaughty! Come by at dusk for our music and light-filled activities, then follow us and the Wall of Light out into the night to dance ‘til dawn!

name: Camp IMAGINEnation
description: A camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty. Hosted by The Handel Group and in partnership with Global Glue Project. Our coaches provide daily life coaching workshops and one-on-one coaching to the people of the playa. Global Glue Project will be interviewing couples willing to share their secrets of how they stick together! Open M-F 10-4pm to help you sort out your life. A conversation with one of our coaches will change YOU forever.

name: CAMP JUICY/FREQUENCY
description: FRUIT ! ICE! MIX@! Beats and smoothies Noon-5 daily.

name: Camp Kegel Kommandos
description: Camp Kegel Kommando………….I’m doing it Now!

name: Camp LaLa
description: This year Camp Lala will seek out entertainment deprived locations on the playa, and target them with sublime, surprising and baffling interactive Flash Mob performances. If you would like to give the gift of booty-shaking, twerking, or general silliness, come by to participate! Otherwise, see you when you least expect us!

name: Camp Lamp
description: Camp Lamp brings Light, Art, and Music to the Playa, with a fire-spinning circle that is open to any skilled fire spinners.

name: Camp Little Bitty
description: Smile like a child again! Come play with our grown-up sized version of popular children’s toys, and get your face painted by a professional face painter before you go!

name: Camp Luminous
description: Camp Luminous is an interactive theme camp offering a Tea Lounge and geodesic shade structures.

name: Camp Make Good Choices
description: At burning man one must make good choices! Let us offer you sound advice about how to make the most of your burn! Participation, spanking and games are all good choices! Come play with us and see if your interaction produces gifts.

name: Camp Manifestation
description: At Camp Manifestation we encourage and explore the process of creation, acknowledging that power within each of us, in order to manifest whatever is in one’s heart and to experience life as one desires. By discovering our innate ability, we put intention toward the coupling of the power of thought with the moving force of action. We then begin to ignite and catalyze these forces which allows us to create magical results in the world. Come explore with us!

name: Camp Mind Eraser
description: Arrrrrrr ye tired of all the electronic wub wub? Sail on over to Camp Mind Eraser for rum drinks, cool mist, fried plantains, and booty shakin live rock ‘n roll.

name: Camp Mystic
description: Inspired by a sense of mystery & wonder, we perceive the consciousness of “We Are All One”. Mystics encourage the enigmatic spirit to explore a deeper connection not only on this planet and all that exists within, but the realm of the entire Universe. Camp Mystic is an ongoing experiment in the power of friendship, love, artistic expression, commitment, and exploration into the farthest reaches of human development and beyond.
hometown: All over! SF, LA, NY, Canada

name: Camp New Year
description: Camp New Year is a community dedicated to ritual celebration, renewal and intention setting.

name: Camp Nice Nice
description: We are an international group of artists, musicians, yogis, dancers, scientists and creators. Join us anytime or Wednesday at sunset for a flute music and white wine soiree.

name: Camp Not For Prophets
description: Relax in the morning shade and join us for coffee and the freshest donut holes on the playa.  Add a variety of icing to your freshly made hot hole.

name: Camp of Bokonon, The
description: “If you find your life tangled up with somebody else’s life for no very logical reasons,” writes Bokonon, “that person may be a member of your karass.” At another point in The Books of Bokonon he tells us, “Man created the checkerboard; God created the karass.” By that he means that a karass ignores national, institutional, occupational, familial, and class boundaries. It is as free-form as an amoeba.”

name: Camp of Misfit Toys
description: Camp of Misfit Toys, a camp where all Misfits are welcome. Come visit and meet Santa, and sing some misfit carols, come back and see if Santa left a present for you.

name: Camp Of N!nja Consciousness
description: Lift your spirits. Find your way. Let your new spirit guides show you the path. Dance. Meditate. Heal and realign those chakras!

name: Camp Orange
description: Fruit lovers rejoice for Camp Orange (you glad we didn’t say banana) is here!  Cool off with a refreshing treat from our enormous banana, confess your playa sins to our ordained ministers and monkey around in one of our  banana hammocks while hearing every fruit pun imaginable!

name: Camp Peace of Ass
description: Camp Peace of Ass supports the vulnerable, sumptuous, cheeks of biking Burners as they travel the vast, course playa environment. The repetitive motion propelling your steed, up and down, fast or slow, hard or soft over and over again demands the protection and shield available only from Camp Peace of Ass; colorful, hand-crafted fleece bicycle seat covers that are guaranteed to soothe and caress your precious assets all day and all night long.

name: Camp Pickled Monkey
description: Forget the pandemonium,Come unwind your mind.Follow the eye inside,Mutt and Jeff’s Piano Oasis you shall find.

name: Camp PlayApology
description: After a successful bow in 2013, Black Rock City’s first “Custom Apology Delivery Service” returns to offer Playa-friendly flowers, cards, and singing “SorryGrams” to anyone seeking to make “playAmends” to a fellow BRC resident.

name: Camp Pot Luck
description: Camp Pot Luck creates community through the facilitation of food sharing. While we’re open pretty much non stop for sitting around some tables and noshing on things, we host several Pot Luck events throughout the week where people can gather together a group of new friends and share food with each other.
hometown: Seattle, Palo Alto, San Diego, Melbourne and Dallas

name: Camp Pucker Love
description: Camp Pucker Love will perform tarot readings and capture your playa essence with palm or other body castings. While you await your reading take a spin on the corn hole of death.

name: CAMP QUESTIONMARK
description: “A questioning mind does not always accept what is readily & easily available… it seeks out what it needs to be satisfied” ~?)?(There are a lot of people claiming they have all the answers… you should question that. Question yourself… & in doing so, find what’s right for you… and enjoy it to the fullest!Come by Camp Questionmark to experience music & creativity born from the inspiration of the playa… desert music, from questioning minds that have found their fulfillment)?(

name: Camp Red or Green
description: Red or Green? New Mexico brings its state question back again in 2014 with its premier theme camp, Camp Red or Green. Though usually referring to chile preference, we are experts on all matters of red or green decisions, whether it be attire, to stop or to go, or how our camp will fare on the MOOP map. So the question is: Red or Green?

name: Camp Samovar
description: Camp Samovar will bring a taste of Middle East to the Playa.  We will be serving Persian tea and dates during sunset.

name: Camp Short Bus XOXO
description: No gifted kids here.  We ride in a short bus because we’re all a little special.

name: Camp Shrunken Heads
description: Camp Shrunken Heads invites you to come by and make a shrunken head. Takes 20 – 30 minutes but is a lot of fun. We will also be stenciling anything you bring by with dancing dinosaurs, b-men, and such.

name: Camp Soft Landing
description: Camp Soft Landing offers a comfortable space to drink tea, tell stories and participate in workshops. Soft Landing presents the Palenque Norte speaker series featuring 40 visionary talks and stories in diverse concepts such as technology, medicine, art, science, design and entheobotany.   Open 24 hours, the Tea House hosts acoustic and spoken word poetry performances. Servers provide tea and empathy and comfortable spaces for rest, rehydration and quiet conversation.

name: Camp Stella
description: A clean and sober space for all Burners.

name: Camp Suburbia
description: Ever wish you could feel more at home on the playa? Camp Suburbia brings the class and sophistication we all deserve to the playa.

name: Camp Upsie Dasium
description: Rising Up out of the Chaos of the Default World comes your Beacon of Hope:  Camp Upsie Dasium!  Featuring a 45 foot high climbable Tower, Silhouette Theater, over 900 sq ft of Shade, Live Music and Tastings. Come Climb the Tower and Enjoy the View of BRC on Platform Level 3. We are open to Burners who want to use our camp for small events.

name: Camp Walter
description: Walter the World’s largest VW Bus and his giant friends Big Red, Heathen and Kalliope are often seen cruising the playa, but love to welcome guests home to play, party, and peace out with our tribe.  We hope to inspire everyone to let loose and look beyond what is to what might be…

name: Camp Wi Chi Chi
description: A place of refuge, to wind down, or wind up, Camp Wi Chi Chi will fill your bellies with tasty treats and good booze. Radio Wi Chi Chi will give the visiting burner the chance to chose the music, in exchange for a drink, of course. Volleyball games by day – hedonism into the night… come pay us a visit!

name: Camp Yes Please
description: Yes: adv – Used to express affirmation, agreement, positive affirmation, or consent. Please: adv – Give pleasure to or to be pleasing to; give satisfaction. Yes Please is the answer to every question.  Come meet sexy, open-minded, international, friendly, dancing, writhing people.  And be sure to visit our infamous Non-Monogamy Advice Booth, occasionally staffed by real doctors!

name: Camp Zazen
description: We know the playa can be overwhelming, so let us be your sanctuary. Come “Zen” out in our Om Dome or Chill in Siddhartha’s Lounge. Your sure to see a friendly face around Camp ZaZen.

name: Camp-O-Leeen!
description: Bouncing, Booze, Bacon, Banana Hammocks, and Fine Art. Show Tunes, Sea Shanties, and Inappropriate Touching.

name: Camp...In Bed
description: Camp…In Bed enters its tenth year of feeding hungry revelers the famous salsa, Philthy Sanchez.  Philthy Sanchez: the spicy brown that never lets you down, try it on a chip, smear it on your lip.

name: Campania
description: Campania: Ancient Ruins of the Playa. Two thousand years ago, the world was ruled by Rome. Step inside for a glimpse into the sophistication and brutality of an empire.

name: CampDIY
description: CampDIY fosters self-reliance and seeks to share our knowledge and experience with the greater community. We host a number of DIY workshops though out the week, and all members should support that effort to some degree. Our camp is a low key retreat from the intense energy of the Burning Man environment.  While “enhanced” social activities are not discouraged in camp, we rely on a availability of other camps for our party experiences.  Camp DIY is a sanctuary to relax.

name: Camposanto
description: We are from all corners of the World but we are mostly Latinos. We love to dance and celebrate friendship. We contribute to the playa experience a latin SABOR. SALSA. Come and play Beer-in-hand soccer. We have a stadium. Look for the Boa.

name: Can I Show You Mine?
description: Can I Show You Mine? is an awesome little camp that provides custom designed luggage tags to be filled out and laminated on playa so you can attach it to your bike, bag or body. If that item gets misplaced – you have a chance to get it back if they know where you camp.

name: Canadianderthal
description: PHISH phrenzy! We’re back with an all new set list. Bring your bongos to our piano lounge on Thursday at 11:00 a.m. for an epic live Phish jam. Pound your Northern neighbors in our life-size Whack-Ca-Nuck game (you know you always wanted to).   Liqour yourself up at our Maple Liquer open bar open every day.  Contribute to the Tattletale Project – tell us when “telling” is responsible and when it’s just straight-up tattling.

name: Captain Pump's Raiders
description: Captain Pump’s Raiders is Black Rock City’s finest mercenary company. By which we mean we are a collection of geeks, gamers, musicians, artists and storytellers committed to adding to the fantastical nature of Burningman through song, story, and roleplaying games.

name: Cara-Hands-ia!
description: We connect with a hand shake, a pat on the back, a wave. The concept for this interactive art installation is not revolutionary but rides on the tails of artists Tony Plant, Andres Amador and the creators of The Fallen Project, Andy Moss and Jamie Wardley. Unlike the ocean tide washing away the patterns created, the Playa’s dust storms, bicycle tracks and footprints will be our erasure. each day there will be an opportunity for passers by to play and be a part of our art by etching and raking hands into the

name: Career Ending Footage
description: Sick and tired of your crummy job. Come to Career Ending Footage and we’ll have you fired in no time.

name: Carnival of Bad Decisions
description: Come try your luck at getting fucked up with games, rides, and a big-top fit for a king.

name: Cartoon Commune
description: If you’re an aspiring cartoonist, artist, singer, comic, or game enthusiast, on-stage model, dancer, or ‘60s rock&roller, there is much for you at Cartoon Commune on the BRC Silk Road. If you need a massage or something to drink, we’re here to serve your preference, and with Laughter Yoga as of yore, plus revered Longevity Stick exercises to get your Xi flowing like the Playa wind blows — and so much more, in our eighth anniversary year.

name: Catch and Release
description: We catch the wandering burner and share without being asked. We feed those who don’t expect to be fed. We provide shade and water to those who pass. We give friendship, company, and safe space to those who are lonely or overwhelmed. We laugh and play with those who join. We welcome all in to our family for a minute, an hour, or a day, and then release them back out to the playa to have a spectacular burn.

name: Catharsis
description: Catharsis YOUR NEGATIVE” is an arrangement of 6 installations representing negative emotions such as Hate, Fear, Self-Pity, Resentment, Rejection and Greed designed and built by a team of aspiring artists/architects – Anastasia Podolskaya, Donn Angel Perez and Tobey Toney . Each installation is an interactive experience which is planned to bring a certain emotions into its viewer. The overall design solution and character of each installation is developed after a careful study of the common expressions of t

name: Cats!Cats!Cats!
description: Cats!Cats!Cats! is a playful camp inspired by the feline inside all of us, and a member of FurBallz Village. Cat lovers, furry types and those who just like to MEOW are invited to stop by for a spin on our stripper pole, a climb up our cat condo or a rub against our scratching post. We’ll be hosting the Critical Cats parade and party on Thursday, “Kitty Porn” on Wednesday night and much more. Come purrrrr with us.

name: Celestial Bodies
description: a straight-friendly lounge in the gayborhood featuring daily events and activities, music, massage, and serving our refreshingly delicious Playa Cosmo.

name: Cell-Abrate
description: This art piece is called Cell-Abrate to express the belief that the purpose of cell phone covers is the same as the purpose of life: “Protect yourself but look fabulous doing it.  Be safe but be gorgeous.  Live long but be beautiful while doing it.”  Come view this spectacular creation if only to discover how limited your life has been until now.  You are invited to “cell-abrate” this theory and learn about the safety and beautification of what cell phone covers can mean to you.  This experience is guarante

name: Celtic Chaos
description: Bringing a little more mayhem to the universe. We are bringing the Castle back to the playa for 2014 and it will be bigger, better and fiery!

name: Census Lab
description: Visit Census Lab to learn about the Black Rock City Census, check out survey data on participants from prior year Burns, and make an entry in the Analog Census.

name: Cereal Thrillers
description: Cereal Thrillers Breakfast Cereal Bar: We serve sugary breakfast cereal your mom would not let you eat as a kid.

name: Chainsawmargaritaguys Camp
description: It’s the 11th anniversary for the ChainsawMargaritaGuys. Stop by for our happy hour. Daily from 2-3PM Mon-Fri. At 11,000 rpm, it’s the frothiest margarita on the playa. This year we will be serving our 11,000 drink. 11th year,,,11k rpm,,, 11k drink,,, 11 million year old ice,, Coincidence? As in the past years, we will be using our Northern Canada glacial ice that is over 11 million years old. 21 and over please. check this site out. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LngEInjk8HI

name: Chakralicious Camp
description: Chakralicious Camp is a camp dedicated to all levels of colorful diversity, with yoga, workshops, music, art, performances, spirituality, community, and more. This will be a 24 hour interactive camp with beautiful altars, chill spaces, visionary art, and colorful decor representing the rainbow colors of the chakras. Come take a class in Kundalini Yoga, Tantra, Thai Massage, or Non-Violent Communication, and at night, dance at our chakra themed parties with djs, live music, and fun interactive ceremonies.

name: Chameleon Camp
description: Chameleon Camp is a camp full of awesome people with amazing a varied interests. Our camp can be many different things and like a chameleon changes based on where it is and who is in it!

name: Champagne Lounge
