description: Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun! The Champagne Lounge will be quenching your midday thirst with happy hours featuring ice-cold champagne. Not in the mood for bubbles?  Grab some friends and take a shotski! Bring your own cup, and be ready for booze, live music, and fun! Also check out Champagne Lounge Audio Programing, or the C.L.A.P, on your radio at 99.9 fm!

name: Chances
description: Chances is a simple piece exhibiting the sound and visual art of Chances R Good.  The space is open to Citizens of BRC to access the multi-dimensional conscious expression of Chances as well as being a safe space to exercise ones intention, prayers and meditation practices.  The site will be a convergence point for yet undisclosed activities perpetrated by the theme camp Hippocampus.  Enjoy!

name: Children of Chaos
description: Chaos, joy, good conversation, parades and motherly advice.  Gold parade Wednesday, assemble at 5:30, parade at 6:00 pm, cocktails after the parade.  Illuminated Specters Thursday, assemble at 8:30, parade at 9:00 pm.  Also, meet the Jewish mother you never had – mothering in your choice of English, Yiddish, or Hebrew.  For good conversation, try our bar.

name: Chomp and Stomp
description: A team of makers and shakers. Find us and our late night mobile chili cart deep playa. Or join us at our camp for bloody mary’s, and merry making.

name: Chop Shop
description: Chop Shop is the best small Playa neighborhood repair garage in BRC! We are ready to repair a wide variety of Playa transportation with parts, repairs and advice. Daily specials such as scissors and tweezers.

name: Chrono-Synclastic Infundibula, The
description: Camp of the Space Wanderers and Home of the 54th Portal of the Soul is where all the different kinds of truths fit together. We invite you to share your stories, your celebrations, your music, your poetry, and your art in our caravansary! Play chess or see/be what’s on the Big TV. Check out our spacecraft powered by the Universal Will to Become (UWTB), and harness some transformational energy for yourself.

name: Circus Boot Camp
description: Come earn your clown nose by participating in Circus Boot Camp!  We’ll teach you to juggle, unicycle, hoop, slack line, trapeze, crack a whip and other circus-inspired arts

name: Circus Combustus
description: We are a fire circus performance group. We will be performing an abundance of circus arts for the beautiful people of Black Rock City including stiltwalking, juggling, acrobatics, trapeze, silks, lyra,  fire arts of all devices, belly dancing, clowns and more!  We will also provide dazzling fire structures for our crowd’s pleasure including our newest Jack in the Fire Box!  Everything will be on fire!  We have fire cannons on our aerial

name: Cirque de Moop
description: Come get trashy with us to make the world a little less scummy.

name: Cirque du Cliche
description: Cirque du Cliche, part of Jankytown, live music and circus arts.  Musical improv comedy.  This year Cirque will be producing the Jankytown Orquestra –  group flow music and performance art happening all week and  featuring a wicked cast of musicians and performing artists (clowns, stilters, fire dancers).

name: Cirque du Formage
description: Come visit Cirque du Formage for some great wine, cheese and sunrise Bloody Marys provided by Big Cheese and our Family Formage!

name: Cla$$y Village
description: The Cla$$y Village is an ensemble of surly pirates from Camp Hot Mess and artisanal chefs from Camp Enchanted Charcuterie. We are an eclectic group of artists, frisbee players, and teachers from the Bay Area excited to provide fun, entertainment and love to all inhabitants of Black Rock City. Stop by for a mythical meal and learn how to swear like a bloody sailor (ESL Friendly)!

name: Club Neu Verboten
description: Club Neu Verboten provides our usual retro avant garde parties inside the old tent and under the star tent. Look for all new flash dances.

name: Clusterf*ck United
description: As Clusterf*ckers, we are United in our goal to provide a welcoming stop with refreshing drinks for fellow travelers and new friends along the dusty road. We’ll have exotic attractions this year, such as our Sphere of Illumination, Perpetual Wave, Sedan Chair, and a new Camp Beacon.

name: Clutch Village
description: The word Clutch means “Exactly what you need, exactly when you need it”.We are a Village which aims to direct citizens of Black Rock City towards more sustainable, environmentally friendly ways of living, both on the playa and in the default world. Furthermore, Clutch Village wants to encourage Black Rock’s citizens to take action by providing the tools and connections needed to both start and continue entrepreneurial projects which are considerate towards sustainable living and the environment.

name: CockTail Weenie Camp
description: Come to the CockTail Weenie Camp and enjoy some on-the-Playa cold brewed coffee or lemonade, join us for one of our weenie roasts and take your Christmas card picture with our Photo Boards!

name: COHESION
description: COHESION! Come jump onto our velcro wall, have a spicy margarita, and swing in a hammock in our cool dome! You’ll be sure to smile, make new friends, and leave with a blacktooth grin! 😉

name: Comfort and Joy
description: Restore your body and lift your spirits at Comfort & Joy, a gay community oasis offering a fully functioning Gym, colorful art installations and daily events including yoga classes,  inspiring performances, & quite queer nightlife.

name: Commie Camp
description: Commie Camp brings together the best of all known communist cultures … vodka, cigars, salsa, chow mein … all in one place!

name: Compass Dome
description: Come relax on a hammock while pondering the travels of our world with compass directions to your home away from home.

name: Conception
description: Camp Conception is the womb of small ideas and experiments that grow bigger than expected. We provide fertile ground for birthing art, ideas, and self-expression as a product of exploring the deep insides of the creative act. See us for loincloth workshops, our beard spa, our women’s T-dance, open canvas painting, our Ultrasound dance event, the Conception Pleasure Palace, and various art installations.

name: Confessions Of A Burner
description: Are you dying to tell someone your secrets? Come by any day and play games, relax, and confess.

name: Contradance Community Camp
description: Contradancing all levels every night (and most days) to live music -looped/traditional/celtic/fusion/techno; fast-paced yet easy to learn with a caller who instructs (but with room for dancers to improvise).Half the moves are with your partner, half with everyone else, resulting in a tribal vibe, where the Zen is flow, synchrony,and bonding (not footwork, not competition).

name: Contraptionists
description: Join us for SnowCones and enjoy some cooling shade each afternoon from 1-3 Each Afternoon Monday through Saturday. Ask about Twister and Talks While in line.

name: Corn Waves
description: Corn Waves, a visual tone generating exhibit, is a marvel of engineering craftsmanship and sound amplification. Feel free to watch as playa dust and sand sweep across the foreground in a sacred geometrical dance. This exhibit visually displays the connections between sound waves, matter, energy and light. It serves as a reminder that voices, vibrations, sounds of any kinds (and even words left unsaid) reverberate through the universe and trace patterns, even when we’re not seeking them out.

name: Cosmic Casbah
description: Stop your caravan at our Spacious Oasis, and take refuge in the shade, sip some tea or coffee and have your fortune, future, or present told. We are an open meeting of the minds, offering space for meditation and writing sessions.

name: Cosmic Condom
description: The Cosmic Condom is a shrine celebrating geometry and color.

name: Cosmic Giggle
description: Like fire?  Like mini-golf?  Like muscles and sweat?  For a good time, call 1-800-Cosmic-Giggle.

name: Cosmic Recess
description: Cosmic Recess is a Playground with a Space theme.  We believe that interactivity, creativity and play are all neccesary components of joy and happiness!  All of our playground elements are original and homemade, most with recycled/reused materials. Please come play with us at the new Cosmiquarium Village this year!  We will also host kickball tournaments between camps and villages as well as parties and events throughout the week!

name: Cosmicopia
description: Cosmicopians are inspired by the deep connections between psyche and cosmos. Visit our camp for archetypal astrology consultations, transpersonal healing, and philosophical inquiry.

name: Cosmiquarium Village
description: Cosmiquarium Village is where the mysteries of the deep intermingle with the wonder of the stars.  Combining the galactic playground of Cosmic Recess and the aquatic antics of the 4 fabulous mutant vessels: the Amazing Jelly Fish from the year 12000, Spider Jelly, the Pilot Fish and Jelly Roll.  Join us for adventures of sea and space…at our home sphere or on voyages into the deep Playa!

name: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet
description: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet is Black Rock City’s leading supplier of high-quality, low-cost soulmates since 1998. We offer quality name brand and private-label soulmates at substantially lower prices than can be found through conventional wholesale sources.

name: Cotton Swab Fencing
description: Challenge the strongest Cotton Swab Fencers of the Caravansary and become a burning legend! Come fencing, and share some infused watermelon watching fencers cotton-swab-fencing.

name: CouchBurners Camp
description: Couch Burners, a cross section of CouchSurfers and BRC inhabitants, welcome weary, wild, and wondrous travelers alike to chat, relax, perform, interact, play some international games and sports, and surf the Mutant Sofa. Come learn tips and suggestions on succesful international travel, converse in your original language, or relax in our cafe & lounge to watch some bocci, croquet, horshoes, or fire dancing with a slew of likeminded individuals participating to create a better world… one couch at a time.

name: Covered in Bees
description: Covered in Bees Bar & Lounge
hometown: Boston, San Fran, and Los Angeles

name: Crackwhore Camp
description: Come break out your inner whore. Let us show you the way to the Lemon Lounge..

name: Cranky and Sons Bike Repair
description: Come to Cranky and Sons for assistance, education and advice for those “Oh shit!” cycling needs, from a flat tire to exploded derailleur, and we’ll help you get back out onto the playa.  If you’ve got some free time and can lend a hand, grab a beer and a wrench and help us help those in need!  Mechanics on duty mornings until 1pm – DIY tools available any time.

name: Crossroads
description: The Crossroads Collective is bringing live R&B, funk, soul, groove, rock and randomness to the playa! We feature a 20+ piece band of professional musicians and performers from The Bay Area, LA, Chicago and abroad, serving up a tasty funk where there was none!

name: Crossroads & the MoonCheese Grill
description: The thematic elements focus around an impromptu interstellar party in a backcountry clearing. We offer a blockbuster party with live music featuring a 20+ piece band of professional musicians and performers. While enjoying the music, you’ll be able to grab a grilled cheese sandwich right off the grill. Don’t look away or it’ll all disappear into the dust without a trace. You may never know if it was really there or if it was all a dream.www.tastethemoon.comhttps://www.facebook.com/pages/Moon-Cheese-Burnin
hometown: SF, Palo Alto, LA, Denver & Chicago

name: Crunklantis & (sea) Monkey Bar
description: Splash on into a deep sea oasis of crunk vibes and hydrating times. Blurring the line of recharge and party.  Swing into the (sea) monkey bar for a chimply marvelous time. Peel back your layers with our specialty (sea) monkey cock-tails. Hangout and dance while our crunk DJ’s serenade you from our underwater bambooth. Come beat your chest while guerrllian up some hotdogs.  Bring out your inner crunk primate on our slack line and monkey bars.  A group of crunk monkey souls that were brought together by a por

name: Cube, The
description: The Cube is excited about being an elemental shape, but solidly and surprisingly perched on its point.  Completely composed of the detritus of society, The Cube is a collection of scrounged scraps and industrial junk  consciously collected by the Artist for both aesthetic and tactile exploration.  As well as being seen, The Cube wants to be touched, climbed on and climbed into. Stacey Beamer, sculptor, resides on Bowne island in British Columbia.

name: Cubhouse, The
description: Come play at the Cubhouse!  We have games like Kubb and Cornhole, Nail Tattoos, Tarot readings and even some  dancing bears to make your day more playful.

name: Cult of BOB
description: And so did the holy army of BOB (the Buhpartment of Buhfense) did prepare a desert orderly and suitable for our lord BOB to substantiate and deliver his WORD unto the wretched.  We are the humble vessel of this WORD, given so that all may bask in the warm seminal light of BOBness, calling you to glorious prayer.  get the BOB in you.

name: Cult of Heroes
description: Cult Of Heroes is a place to get in touch with and develop your inner hero. We all have special powers – observation, intuition, love, dance, ego, math, connection. Cult of Heroes is where we foster those powers.

name: Curiouser and Curiouser
description: Follow Alice in size changing games – giant board games, murder mystery tea party, ping pong and pool. Come hang out for an afternoon, a morning or take a lesson in aerial with our teachers and camp mates.

name: Cyberia
description: Cyberia is the coolest place on the playa, with a white 30 foot dome to chillax and an industrial strength snow cone machine churning out frozen treats to help beat the heat!

name: Daily Playa
description: Daily Playa is a newspaper reported, edited and printed on the Playa. Stop by our camp for a copy with the latest BRC news we managed to report and print in the sweatshop and printer purgatory that is our print room.

name: Dark Carnival Community Cafe
description: Darkroast for those dark of heart, the Circus is in town, Gothic performers lurking in the night. Come one, come all!! Coffee for everyone at all hours of the day and night. Bring your mug as we have no cups, embrace your inner expressionist but leave your drama at the door.

name: Dark Sparkle
description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive, the unexplainable quality that pulls us all to the dark side. We bring interactive workshops and burlesque performances that challenge citizens to find mystery and beauty in themselves and others, and celebrate the unique Dark Sparkle in all of us.

name: Darwin Fish Tank
description: Dive into the Darwin Fish Tank! When you are ready to grow a pair (of legs that is!) climb out of the primordial ooze and beat the heat with our misting system for a genuine adventure in the belly of the beast. Come for the flowing beats, stay and chill amongst the waves with some liquid joy.

name: Dawdle
description: Taking life at light speed and reducing it to a dawdle, we are a party of fun lovin relaxers.

name: Dawn Patrol Project
description: The sun’s coming up! Wake up and get the first chair with us. We have big things planned…Dawn Patrol Project is alive.

name: De-Nile
description: Enjoying a cool day in the desert? You must be in De-Nile. Come sit in the cooling mist and be fanned by palm fronds during the day. Cozy up inside our pyramid huts at night. We welcome all weary travelers to sit awhile and discuss or ponder all things ancient and present. If you receive a piece of our puzzle, bring it over to complete De-Nile.

name: Death Guild Thunderdome
description: The dark beating heart of the playa since 1999.

name: Debocceri
description: Come play with our balls! Join the crew at DeBocceri, aka  International Bocce Ball Camp, for bocce ball tournaments and happy hour! Public tournament events on Tuesday and Thursday 2-6pm. The courts feature LED balls for playing at night. We also offer a 24/7 costume-exchange rack and live guerrilla bluegrass attacks.

name: Decadent Oasis
description: A glowing multicolored oasis in the dark of night, a windswept grove of white palm trees by day–our magical oasis and sheltered lounge welcome you to dance, play, perform, and chill. Slack lines, games, DJ’s, hoops, stage, and friendly folks all around–in an eco-conscious camp made from mostly reclaimed/reused materials.

name: Declusterfuqerization
description: Join us in the stellar collaboration of rock climbing walls and slacklines, refined adult beverages and slides, fiery ruben’s tubes and beats. Be our friends and we will welcome you with monkey hugs!

name: Deep Heaven
description: We share our hearts with the Playa through a commitment to authenticity and honesty and by having one of the most popular chill spaces going! Come connect with our Interactive Heart Beacon that pulses to your own heartbeat and take a  multidimensional journey to your higher self with our visual art, light and sound meditation experience that called the HOLYtope. Come find solace and laughter in our sanctuary, attend a HOLYtope journey or stop by for a full heart hug!

name: DeMaTerial
description: Join DeMaTerial for the shenanigans of the Licensing Bureau and the entertainment of Dinner and a Show. Hang out in the shade, or come enjoy the fire.

name: DeMentha
description: Come join in the minty fun at DeMentha. You’ll find music from our DJ line-up, enthusiastically prepared fresh mojitos, aromatherapy, ample shade and plenty of cooling mist. Combined with a hearty welcome you’ve got the perfect recipe for a awesome time. 1-6pm daily.

name: Desert Chai-Wallah
description: Desert Chai-Wallah serves hot, homemade, Indian chai every evening at sunset from 7:00-9:00pm. Come recharge before the night’s adventures with a cup of tasty masala chai in our Indian lounge dome.

name: Desert Morning
description: Home of the Lovin’ Oven – greet the morning, and let the smell of our freshly baked bread draw you in to our oasis, where mint tea, joy, music and performance will soothe your soul and nourish your body. Performers needing a space or those wanting to use the oven, please drop by and see us.

name: DESERT PEARL CANTINA
description: THE DESERT PEARL CANTINA AND SCULPTURE GARDEN IS A CHILL CAMP WHERE FOLKS GATHER TO ENJOY THE PLAYA’S BEST COFFEE & TEA IN A SERENE SCENE.MUSIC, DANCING, STORYTELLING, ART MAKING DEMONSTRATIONS, AND QUIET CAN ALL BE FOUND HERE.WE ARE AN INT’L CAMP HAILING FROM BRITISH COLUMBIA, RUSSIA, FRANCE, THE NETHERLANDS, BROOKLYN AND THE BAY AREA.WE LOVE CREATING A SPARE, SPACIOUS DESERT HOME WHERE FOLKS CAN COME AND CHILL AND EXPERIENCE AN ART FILLED PIECE OF THE PLAYA.

name: Deus Ex Detective Agency
description: Stop by the Deus Ex Detective Agency to help crack a case, bask in the gritty noir ambience, and maybe learn the password to our exclusive speakeasy. Detective gear provided.

name: Devachan Lounge
description: The “dwelling of the gods” of theosophical lore. After exploring all the playaverse has to offer, even deities need a place to reflect and rejuvenate. Through healing arts, provocative conversation, and unbridled play – including anointing, massage, theta, aromatherapy, yoga, Reiki, dialectics, historical materialism, the political ecology of permaculture, hooping, acroyoga, slacklining, authentic movement, decadent delectables, and the building of energy-efficient temporary structures for those displaced b

name: Devils Playground
description: No Description

name: Dia De Los Muertos
description: Dia De Los Muertos a fun and friendly camp to don candy skull makeup, drink margaritas, break pinatas and dance.

name: Dickstracted Camp
description: The Dickstracted Camp is and adult-gay oriented camp emphasized on bringing exhibitionism and voyeurism to the playa.

name: Dilated Peoples Eye Spa
description: Expand your inner-vision while indulging your senses. A soothing treatment of refreshing eye drops, cucumber slices and a cooling facial gel-pack awaits you…followed by a meditative lavender-scented eye pillow surrounded by the enchanting healing powers of the Dilated Peoples Eye Spa.

name: Dionaea
description: The playa can be a treacherous place. Be careful what temptations allure you — they might just be a trap.

name: Disco Chateau
description: Disco Chateau is a haven for artistic expression, authentic connection and a refuge for rejuvenation.  Our camp’s core focus is to create a communal space to serve the Burning Man Community by hosting events and programing that will foster authentic connection.

name: Disco Dokie
description: Chill vibes, greasy tunes and bacon – We are a collective of open hearted human beings who dance a lot, build cool stuff, hug, play games, practice gratitude and love sparkly things! We welcome all citizens of Black Rock City to join us for our Sunrise Bacon Socials – everyone loves bacon.

name: Disco Knights
description: Your groovy outpost for intimate vibes.  World class DJs in an intimate setting!
hometown: San Francisco (and London, but mostly SF)

name: Disco Space Shuttle
description: Join us in the late mornings and early afternoons to confess your sins and rejuvenate your body with a tasty Bloody Mary and join us at night to do it all again and fly across the Playa on the Disco Space Shuttle.

name: DiscoFish Landing Strip
description: Home of the best mobile Disco party on The Playa!!

name: DiscoFist & BurningVelvet
description: Breaking the boundary between costuming and interactive nightlife decor, DiscoFist strives to dance the world into a mirror-tiled utopia one sparkling fist pump at a time.

name: DISORIENT
description: Approach the DISORIENT SIGNCenter yourself in the DOME of GLAMTECHFind friends by the URNHop on the DEXDOMESpeak easily at THE DUKE’SWelcome to DISORIENT’s 14th year on the Playa!

name: DISTRIKT
description: Bringing music to the daytime.  A rambunctious playa day party of vociferous beats from live DJ’s, original art, and luscious blended libations from a shaded bar.  Your daytime dancing & dutifully disorderly DISTRIKT.

name: Divine Masculine, The
description: The Divine Masculine in a large sculpture of a Penis. It is 22 feet high. It is covered in a sparkling purple and psychedelic fabric.  Phallic art is ancient and has been found in diverse cultures around the world. This year of the Caravansary it seems fitting that a place to celebrate one of the most enduring and personal symbols of the masculine be in Black Rock City. Devotees and worshipers are invited to enter the phallus and after admiring examples of phallic art, ascend the two ladders inside and emer

name: DMV
description: Department of Mutant Vehicles

name: Do More Now
description: Stop by the five story Firehouse for 24 hour painting, Cool your jets in our second story chill out lounge (with some of the coolest day time temps on the playa) or catch a glass blowing show from our in house studio.

name: Doctors Without Boundaries
description: Doctors Without Boundaries offers meditation, yoga, and pilates to the greater Burning Man community.

name: Dodgeball Addiction
description: Nightly dodgeball games with music & sarcastic announcer.

name: DodgeyPortrait ,Turkey CiderHeads
description: Stop by our  Moroccan Cool shade  tent in the hot afternoon , Enjoy a cup of ice cold cider and have your Photo taken in your best Garb / Pose  .

name: Dome on the Range, The
description: The Dome is back and better than ever. This year we combine the spices and silks of eastern caravans with the spurs and saloons of the wagon trains of the west. Cowboy hats meet Saris. Tea ceremonies meets tumbleweeds.  The Apothodome, our primary sturcture, is a saloon-of-sorts which hosts an array of patented old tyme remedies for all the ailments of the playa.

name: Don't Panic Djedi Outpost #42
description: Here at Djedi Outpost #42 we believe that calmly flowing through life is the way to all things great and wonderful. We can help you find your inner peace through object and fire manipulation, learning new playa skills, or just chilling in our dome – but whatever you choose to do, just remember – DON’T PANIC (and bring a towel).

name: Donde Jugaran Los Niños? Where Will The Children Play?
description: This series was created to address the issues that affect children all over the world regardless of race, age, class or gender. Issues like the degradation of the environment, exploitation for labor and sex, and the early age in which many are turned into consumers in effect losing their innocence and the opportunity to have a healthy and balanced childhood. As with many tragic events many people quickly forgot the suffering that continued to unfold in particular to the plight of children, that is why I cre

name: Down Low Club
description: Down Low Club is a discreet, enclosed and air conditioned tent serving adult men of the Playa.  Adhering to the tenet of “what happens at Burning Man stays at Burning Man” since 2009, Down Low Club is fully outfitted to facilitate tactile interaction, exploration and erotic man-to-man play. Regardless of sexual orientation, men will find Down Low Club to be a chill space set in a relaxed, non-judgmental atmosphere far away from home and other prying eyes.

name: Down The Rabbit Hole
description: An interactive exploration tumbling through a trippy Alice in Wonderland themed spiral ending in a mad tea party offering drinks, dance & circus performances and workshops.

name: Dr Le Tawdrie's Flying Circus
description: We are back for more fun and frivolity!

name: Dr Playas EarNose & Throat Clinic
description: Got playa packed into your head holes?  We can help you remove that!

name: Dr. Baron von Realz Esq.Sideshow
description: Announcing – Dr. Baron von Realz Esq. most spectacular Steampunk Sideshow of altered reality and debauchery. Come join our circus of freaks and be a part of the shenanigans of our camp.  Flaming girls, tattoos, body modifications, piercings, carnies, performers, freaks, geeks and other oddities are welcome. We have lots of tasty events a chill space, open bar and our mysterious wheel which we will be happy to strap you to and spin.

name: Dr. Carl's Dept. of Collections
description: Dr. Carl’s big board of stuff is imposing, daunting and a little bit sexy. Pick something from our big board, go out and find that something. Return to us, convince an official that you deserve a semi-fabulous prize…collect a semi-fabulous prize.

name: Draft Punk at the Trash Fence
description: Draft Punk at the Trash Fence. The rumor is true, Draft Punk will be playing at the trash fence this year. Stop by our camp to meet the Daft Punk duo and enjoy a drink, or build your own Bad Decision Bear at our workshop.

name: Dragon Ass Camp
description: Dragon Ass Camp celebrates the wonders of Claude the Dragon, the 22′ fire breathing kinetic sculpture, made from 100% recycled scrap materials.

name: Dragon Camp Armory
description: Build your own hand-crafted armor bikini.

name: Dragon Smelter Coin Operations
description: Come make for yourself a coin medallion out of recycled aluminum when you turn in your crushed cans for Recycle Camp!  Our Dragon Smelter crew is waiting for your participation and to reward you for supporting the recycling/LNT effort at Burning Man with this gift coin medallion made with your own effort from some of your own melted crush cans!!!

name: Dragonfly
description: For all things healing, music, poetry, prophecy, and medicine.

name: DRAPES EVERYWHERE
description: Come join us amongst the drapes. Sit high atop the black pyramid and look out on the playa, dance in our dome, trick on our tramp, or post on the Awesome Board and Wish Wall.

name: Dreamachine: Inward Travel
description: Watch your inner fire burn! With the Dreamachine, a kinetic sculpture designed to induce visions by playing flickering light on the closed eyes of the viewer.

name: Dreamaginatorium, The
description: The Dreamaginatorium is a dinner theater of the absurd, an adventure into the mind, down the spine, and back up into the heart. Come hungry, leave transformed.

name: Duckpond
description: Wanna get Bucked up?  Come to the best local dive bar on the Playa.

name: Dump, The
description: Where the worlds most fabulous musicians and dancers from MarchFourth Marching Band, The Saloon Ensemble, Love-Bomb Go-Go Marching Band, Trashcan Joe, and The Ukeladies are dumped and recycled to endlessly create music from a by-gone era.  Come sing, dance, play our piano, and join-in as we all share in electronic-free acoustic joy!

name: dust & stars
description: dust & stars is all about stepping into other worlds: through portals, creative (self-) reflection, paint and play. cool down in an intergalactic water gun fight, trip out in our nocturnal art space, frame yourself with antlers or a tentacle embrace in our huge metal frames, or join us for a late-night warm-up around our celestial fire pit.

name: Dust Circus
description: Welcome to the world of The Dust Circus – twisted mix of entertainment. Ourmagic show will have very visual and stunning magic and mentalism effectsincluding levitations, transformations, telekinesis, and magicalmanipulations with objects. All of the effects will be happening very closeto our audience, and often right in their hands.For our guests professional dancer will provide simple dance lessons so BRCcitizens will start to enjoy the dance right away instead of trying tomemorize difficult dance

name: Dust Monkeys
description: Come draw and be drawn in the world’s Fantastic Fauxtobooth – and take back with you a one of a kind totem! And share with us your most vivid and inspiring dreams while building on the dreams of others on our Exquisite Corpse mural.

name: DUSTFISH
description: DUSTFISH BELIEVES IN THE POWER AND GLORY AND BEAUTY OF LOVE ! Breath deep, welcome the dust and enjoy the live music and creative performances on our beautiful stages.

name: Dustillery
description: Whiskey and Dust has grown by popularity with the concept of Radical Inclusion – we have become the new, bigger, and better village “Dustillery“. This refers to the creation, vision, growth and metamorphosis of our community while intertwining the concepts of Burning Man to give back more to the community.

name: Dusty Beavers
description: Directly from the Great White North, land of the maple leaf, comes the sugar shack of your dreams. Yes, a sugar shack on the Playa! Maple taffy on snow. Yes, snow on the Playa, in August. We will make it happen. Join us after dark for a taste of sweetly delicious “tire d’érable sur neige.” The Dusty Beavers are an international group: Canadians, French and Americans.

name: Dusty Bumm
description: Trade in your dusty tookus for a warm drink and a cold slap in the face or plow it up with a shotski or three, then try your hand at Giant Beer Pong or relax under thousands of G-Strings!  Face it, out here, there’s no escaping a Dusty Bumm!

name: Dusty Dice
description: Remember the joy of setting up a tent in the backyard and playing board games? Checkers, Monopoly, Life, Parcheesi… We celebrate the joy of play with just a little bit of competition. Our infamous cock-ring toss, an oversized Twister mat, and other super-sized games provide entertainment. Check the events calendar for Liar’s Dice, Brunch Against Humanity, and other events.

name: Dusty Goats
description: Come and get f***ked up like a goat dancing in our dome and showing us your goat golfing skills. Stick around and recover with our yoga sessions, massage and rest your hooves under our huge shade structure.  We have an eclectic group of goats from Vail, New York, San Fran, L.A., Sweden and more!  Come by and have a goat-tastic time!

name: Dusty Justice
description: Have your dirty dusty day in court.  Bring your case to Dusty Justice and let our judge be the decider!

name: Dusty Lady
description: Like fire?  At night play with a 20-foot high fire tornado shaped by glass and air.  Like hammocks?  Drop by for a drink and music at our carpeted hexagon-shaped chill area. Like Twin Peaks?  Explore our  recreation of the cult classic’s Black Lodge.

name: DUSTY LAVEAU'S ENCHANTED EMPORIUM
description: Traveling the sequined road from New Orleans the reincarnation of Marie Laveau has gathered up souls (alive and otherwise) to brave the sparkle pony stampedes, dust storms or the dirty eye of a shirt cocker to engage you in voodoo, magical elixirs, and fortune tellers.  Look behind your soul and in the enchanted mirrors to Infinity and unburden your soiled soul in the lap of the Revered. If you have no sins to confess we will provide them for you.

name: Dusty Lusty
description: Find your dusty lusty playa lover with our matchmaking board: have your picture taken, and if you choose each other, it’s a match! Join us for three sexy downtempo electronica parties for queers and friends to dance, drink mojitos, and make plans for later.

name: Dusty Phoenix
description: Come under our wing.

name: Dusty Playatel
description: DUSTY/Playatel  Hosts a dualing piano bar, the Black Rock Marching Band, and DJ’s nightly. Piano bar from sunset till 11pm, DJ’s from midnight onward. Swing by on Tuesday from 2pm to 5pm for our TUTU TUESDAY party with Festive Rum Drinks on the BabaDECK overlooking BRC. Thursday at 2pm join the Black Rock Kazoo Band rehearsal and march through center camp ending at the Billion Bunny March. Kazoos, marching band hats, and t-shirts will be provided!

name: Dusty Rhino Camp
description: The Dusty Rhino Camp aspires to bring people together through art, fire and electronic music, and to be the best Black Rock public transportation possible!! While people take an “art safari” they listen to great DJ’s and enjoy a 29’ Rhino that shoots fire from its horn.

name: Dusty Swan Public Craic House
description: Stop in for cold draught beer, fine Irish whiskey, hot Irish coffee, wonderful Celtic music, and eclectic Celtic-themed films. Recite a limerick and get a Guinness, try your skill at our Whiskey tasting, and thrill to our music seisiún featuring the playa’s finest musicians!

name: Dusty Taint
description: The Dusty Taint Camp is born in the style of a 1940’s “Negro Juke Joint” featuring music, games and drinking. A nexus where people passing by and coming to the area can join us for the “Sunset Toast” and socialize, drink and get to know their fellow burners in a multi-cultural and sensual adult space following an amazing day on the playa.

name: Dye With Dignity
description: Create your own work of art! We provide all you need to dye your own silk scarf while cooling off with chilled wine or juice.

name: Earth Guardians
description: We inspire, inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply the Green & Leave No Trace principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home. Come, volunteer and participate in our daily yoga, talks about Black Rock and Leave No Trace or just grab a MOOP bag!

name: EAT Metaphysical Trading Post
description: Enter a realm on the playa road where one can exchange a token to take a spin on the Wheel of Fate. The wheel, in turn, will provide you with a unique personal quest from one of the five metaphysical spheres. When your experience has come to an end, you are invited to claim as a reward one of the tokens left by those who came before, exchanging metaphysical experiences and physical items with the people of the caravansary road.

name: Ego trip
description: Where the hottest on the playa come to play! Get pampered at our beauty bar, capture that stunning playa outfit at our photo booth, check out all your good sides in the EgoNOMitron, and dance to our sexy beats. We’ll get you drunk on your own vanity (and our delicious drinks) until everyone looks as good as you do!

name: Electric Gypsy Coffee Oasis
description: In the blink of an eye don’t let it pass you by experience the Electric Gypsy Coffee Oasis! Offering coffee, music, healing, fortune telling, tarot reading, and tea leaf readings, we have something for everyone.

name: Electric Light Charade
description: Come enjoy a tour through interactive lighted art installations that are sure to delight! There will be a range of installations at various times, so be sure to check back throughout the week!

name: EleVant Rising
description: Hungry?  Date night?  Want to enjoy the best meal of your life?  Come by, make reservations, and choose a night to dine with us for a meal you will never forget!

name: Elvis Wedding Chapel 2014
description: The Elvis Wedding Chapel & Mirage Gardens 2014 returns to BRC servicing your nuptial needs! Come on down to the King’s Chapel, primp and prepare in the legendary Bridezilla Lounge with our trained fashion consultants, and let us hitch you up for eternity… or just one dusty week!

name: Elysium
description: Elysium- a place or condition of ideal happiness!Air conditioned lounge/bar with a separate hookah corner to relax out of the heat. If your feeling perky, frolic in our playground! Soar into the sky on our swing, slide into fun, have a friendly game of twister, or bounce around on our over sized balls! No matter what your idealized description of paradise Elysium has something for all!

name: Emergency Services RAMPART Urgent Care
description: RAMPART Urgent Care is the premiere medical care facility in Black Rock City. Humboldt General Hospital operates the facility in partnership with the Black Rock City Emergency Services Department. RAMPART Urgent Care is fully equipped to handle any medical emergency.

name: Emergency Services, Station 3
description: The Black Rock City Emergency Services Department provides fire protection, emergency medical services, and crisis mental health services to the citizens of Black Rock City.

name: Emergency Services, Station 9
description: The Black Rock City Emergency Services Department provides fire protection, emergency medical services, and crisis mental health services to the citizens of Black Rock City.

name: Empress, The
description: Come to The Empress, the last bastion of a failed empire!We’re a group of people from Vancouver and Victoria BC collaborating to create our reinterpretation of a Victorian drawing lounge.  Come enjoy the comforts of a more civilized time.Dressed in their Victorian finest, our gracious hosts and hostesses serve selections from our tea menu along with light snacks. Enjoy the comforts of our tea room including the finest Victorian Burner interior design.

name: en·light·en
description: en·light·en is a 15 ft tall light house that shines outward but invites investigation inward. Is this a warning sign to seek shelter from the storm or a sign to look inward to shine your light outward. en·light·en will offer an opportunity to find light in the storm.

name: Enchante
description: We dashing dandies, radiant sunflowers, mermaids from space Atlantis, quick-witted snark dragons, fire sprites, next door neighbors, charmed serpents and ferocious professionals present unto you all that is proper, seasoned, gorgeous and Enchante. It’s entirely No Fun.

name: Enchanted Booty Forest, The
description: Enchanted Booty Forest, where we worship all things booty. Spawned from the love of the derriere. Take a spin on the Booty Wheel, capture the moment with a Your Booty Here photo, but watch out, you might get caught in Booty Jail! We offer all this and other secret booty events. See your booty there! Listen for the sound of Tim Wilson playing Bootyman -That’s where we will be.

name: Enclave, the
description: The Enclave consists of a bubbly band of brothers, sisters and lovers united by a passion for art, design, engineering, entertainment and a whole lot of miscellanies fodder. The Enclave brings a self-made Playastani charm to the inner ring of Black Rock by celebrating the civically minded gifts we have to offer in a format that intends to suspend and expand our visitor’s expectations.

name: Encounter
description: Encounter is a spiritual encounter that is driven by our guest own personal journey. Our goal is to assisting our guest in finding their own personal journey that leaves them feeling inner peace and a mystical love.

name: End of Line Club
description: We are a camp that is Tron themed. We will be providing original music and equipment and a stage for any DJs that want to sign up and spin through the festival, as well as a Tron Lightcycle art car, and Tron themed gate leading to our dome.

name: Enigma
description: Enigma is the silent roar you may hear if you are here.

name: Enlightenedville
description: Interactive art and support for project PearCloud.

name: EPIC
description: Camp Epic promotes the notion of sharing unique Moments with fellow burners. We go above and beyond what is called for and we push limits.  Our goal is to share the joy of gifting and self expression, to party hard, to facilitate and help others with having fun, and to treat everyone with respect.  Come visit us in one of our community events…. “Give Epic A chance”

name: EPICurious
description: marked by a flag and a night light pole, this simple desc holds a small box containing a powerful force. if you dare flip the activation switch the meaning of life might just reveal itself.

name: Eridu Society
description: An explorer’s club of makers and dreamers. Our members come from and travel through time, space, and several of the better dimensions. We take our name from Eridu, the first city in ancient Sumer, and we gather in Black Rock City to share stories, ideas, art and passion.

name: Espresso Camp
description: Serving HOT NAKED ESPRESSO — no foo-foo froth, mocha, frappa-crappa, soy, latte drinks; just the real stuff. Open when we get up, for a few hours. BYO cup, we don’t have any to go. Stop by, say hi, have some of the last legal high.

name: Eulers Cathedral
description: In a famous legend, In the 18th Century the philosopher Denis Diderot was explaining at great length to Katherine the Great why there was no God. Katherine was upset at this display of atheism and asked the mathematician Leonhard Euler to respond. Euler had combined three mathematical constants to produce a remarkable formula known as Euler’s identity. The formula combined “i”, the imaginary unit, “e”, the base of natural logarithms, and pi. He presented his formula as simple proof that God existed.

name: Everywhere Pavilion
description: Visit with Burning Man-affiliated groups and learn how the Black Rock Arts Foundation, Black Rock Solar, Burners Without Borders, the Burning Man Regional Network, and the Burning Man Project are bringing the playa to the world the other 51 weeks of the year! Check the What Where When for hosted cocktail parties, mixers, lectures, and interactive art activities happening every day, or just stop by at any time to learn more.

name: Express Lot
description: A Caravansary for Burner Express Travelers

name: Eye Trip
description: Eye Trip is a vibrant optical illusion tower with a crowning third eye rotating chair on top. The interior sacred space is finished with psychedelic infinity mirrors & linear phantasm.  The sculpture is adorned with interactive symbolism such as large beads of re-purposed magnetic, a rotating jaguar head/ human skull representing the spirit animal in every human and the human spirit in every animal, the interior infinity mirrors portrays the yearning of the human physicallity to travel beyond into altered s

name: F.A.R.T. Kamp
description: Flatulence Amplification Research Team (FART) Kamp provides interactive workshops, Sultan’s Tomato chill space, Tittyman body painting, Betty’s Boutique clothing exchange, and J’s Theatre movies in public shade structure. Fart into a megaphone or learn to tie a shemagh, make a wig, or learn how to do string art.

name: Faces
description: Isolating subject from environment, Faces takes a deep look into the being under the skin. Within a brief interaction, international photographers JohnsonSarkissian create a safe moment for participants to expose their inner beliefs, desires, and connections in a visual manner.

name: FAFA
description: originally the “Freaking Awesome French & American” has grown into a fabulous family of diverse cultures, ages and styles. Once again this year we will bring to the Playa our installation that sends videos to your friends or yourself into the future – aptly renamed “Message from the Desert” this year!

name: Fallout Shelter
description: Welcome Home and escape the elements in our Playa ready Military style tent while listening to music,  playing playa games in our adult Arcade and have a cool Nuclear Nectar drink at our bar.  We light up your night with chasing lights  and other eye candy and blow your Burner mind with daily activities.  Kicking it up this year with POV Fallout Flights from our Fallout Shelter Survivor Recovery Team (FSSRT)!!!  Come FALLOUT with us!

name: False Profit, Inc.
description: As the most advanced company on the planet, False Profit’s most valuable asset is our brand.  By harnessing the full potential of our top-secret American corporate technology, we will present an environment of delight that is guaranteed to throw the market into flux.

name: FAN
description: When seen from a distance, the face of the FAN will look like a 30′ diameter decorated half circle on the horizon.  As approached, the true shape emerges as the parabolic curve created by the intersection of the linear fan wedges comes into sight.The fan itself is composed of 11 panels, each a 15 foot wedge shape composed of 6″ aluminum C channels, faced in perforated and cut aluminum panels to produce imagery and decoration.  Sensor and camera controlled interactive colored lights in each panel illumin

name: FANDANGO!
description: Sexier than you appear in your most vivid dreams, Scuzzier than a French Quarter gutter on Fat Tuesday. We are your Neighborhood Dive Bar, serving strong cocktails, playing  music with words, all day and all night. Fandango loves you drunk!
hometown: San Luis Obispo, CA, San Francisco, CA, Seattle, WA, Missoula,

name: FauxMirage
description: It’s Real. Fomads and Fauxmiragers Welcome.

name: Feed the Artists
description: Started in 2007 w/ Larry Harvey’s blessing and support, FtA has fed tens of thousands of burners, and actively modeled the concept of creating community through the sharing of meals at BRC and far beyond. You never know when we’ll show up, but when we do, you’ll be treated to some of the finest food ever gifted on the playa!

name: Field of Echoes, The
description: The Field of Echoes is an interactive sound installation that transforms a piece of the open playa into a reverberant space where sound echoes and decays slowly as it would in a large enclosed space such as a cathedral or cavern.  This pocket of altered acoustics is produced by a number of small pillars that rise above the playa’s surface, scattered across an area approximately 80 feet in diameter.

name: Finally, A Relaxing Place to Sit Your Ass Down.
description: Poor traveler!  You’re tired and worn out from trapezing the playa all day (or all night) and you desperately need a spot to just sit your ass down and take a load off.  Well, here’s your chance.  Two oversized Adirondack chairs are available to help you kick back and relax while watching your fellow travelers.  One chair faces East, the other West, so you can enjoy the Sun both coming and going.

name: Fire Conclave Convergence
description: Fire Conclave Convergence is where fire groups who will be performing in the Great Circle check in. Also available for use is The Zone for daytime meetings and workshops as well as the Performance Area for night time fire performances. Reserve one or both at Fire Conclave Convergence Sign-In.

name: Fire In Balance
description: Fire In Balance is an LA based theme camp centered around enhancing the collective experience through the contribution of art and experience. Expanding on the success of Poetic Kinetics 2009 honorarium piece Holding Flame, this year’s Fire in Balance is an installation made up of an inverted fire boxes suspended within a pagoda-like steel structural frame surrounded by a series of fire dishes and fire towers.

name: Fire In Balance
description: Fire has been an intrinsic part of the human experience since the dawn of man. Control of fire is what separated us from the animals. Fire in Balance takes that control and literally turns it upside down, creating an immersive experience for large numbers of participants to witness and interact with the unique phenomenon of inverted fire.  Like moths to the flame, Fire In Balance draws you ever closer to it’s molten, mesmerizing blaze.  Come cozy up in this inviting space, it will leave your heart warm long

name: Firedrop
description: Experience a nonstop celebration of life expressed through fire dancing, samba drums, and general revelry at Firedrop. Come see one of our shows, check out fire toy workshop for the toyless among us, or come take a ride on our Hypergalactic Space Yacht B.R.S.S. Sol Riser.

name: Fireside Circles, The
description: The Fireside Circles are low to the ground circular concrete burn platforms with seating, designed for the citizens of Black Rock City to congregate around a nice fire on the open playa from sunset to sunrise.

name: First Kiss Café
description: Am I in the desert of Nevada or a scene from Casablanca?  With our 2 French Victorian style decorated domes, relaxing couches, and wide selection of teas, it may be hard to tell.

name: Flamingos FTW!
description: We’re crowdsourcing a mutant flamingo flock! Come grab a flamingo from the lagoon and customise it with our craft supplies. While you’re here why not challenge your friends to a spot of Extreme Flamingo Croquet or participate in one of our workshops. Flamingos FTW is a place to chill out and be silly with old friends and new.

name: Flattery Camp
description: Despicable day? Self-worth shrinkage? Bitten by BM blues? Yeah, we got this. Just swing by for your delicious daily dose of Flattery medicine. With sincerity, originality, humor, hospitality and comfort in the shade, we’ll fix your psyche’s flat-tire and have you whistling on your way. Did we mention yet just how fabulously, enticingly, spectacularly gorgeous you are?

name: Flirt Camp
description: Come get your flirt on at Flirt Camp!  A place to relax and let those mid-day Coronas work their magic, except when we are dancing it up!!

name: Floasis
description: Come to Floasis during the day to escape the heat in our air-conditioned speakeasy or play games outside in the carnival. Feel the good vibes, drink unique cocktails, see performances, and get a bit weird.

name: Floristonia
description: Floristonia is back for our 11th year as a welcoming oasis with homegrown hospitality and a soft place to fall. We create a welcoming environment for the nomadic burner to relax, rehydrate and recharge at our crossroads in the desert.

name: Fluid Fortune
description: This camp is about jet-fuel coffee and questionable clairvoyance. We’ll send you off with grounds in your teeth, and a fortune you won’t forget.

name: Flying Falafels
description: Flying Falafels is a camp consists of Israeli And American burners together. We are intending on serving hot “Falafel” balls every day around lunch time with some nice mellow Mediterranean music playing in the background , with a peak event of a “falafel party ” on Friday 2 pm-until the evening.

name: Fool's Melon
description: All that glitters is not melon.  A fool and his melon are soon parted.

name: Forestchild Village
description: A forest oasis for our Desert Tribe! A sanctuary of holistic healing, art, beauty, conscious interaction, and bliss!

name: Forgotten Forest
description: The Forgotten Forest is an interactive sound and light art installation built from life’s forgotten and discarded items.

name: Fractal Presents~Persepolis Gates
description: The gateways ‘open to all’  welcomes those at the crossroads, between the east and west, the real and imagined, the improbable and the realized. Our gates are a welcoming Beacon to all caravans and wayward travelers on the road for Adventure and Greatness, join us as we tell the stories of past and future.

name: Free Photogaphy Zone
description: Come to the Free Photography Zone for your BM portraits and receive your photographic print as your tangible reminder of your BM experience done in a professional photographic studio.  All are encouraged to participate in for many what is a unique photographic experience being photographed seriously and well in a studio setting.

name: Freedom Lounge, The
description: The Freedom Lounge is a mystical day spa for the soul. We have a team that does dreams interpretations, destiny readings, healing through sound and many other things of the soul. Home of the Burning Man organic alignment and spiritual cleansing.

name: FreeForm Family
description: We, as the family of creators, welcome everyone to our studio camp. We help each other to find a path to our inner, pure, original, inventive essence. We synchronize and uplift our inner desire to experiment and realize. We would love you to be our guest and co-create. Any art piece at any time.

name: FreeStyle Palace
description: Playa Talent Incubator. A collaborative music play space and sound stage featuring Live Open Jams and nightly hip hop shows from sunset to about 2:00 am. Our stage and our microphones are open to all comers. Part alchemy and part black magic, FreeStyle Palace is an amalgam of sophisticated and authentic Urban Underground music and culture forged by the heat of the Black Rock Desert and polished by the collective talent of the Burning Man Community.

name: French Maid Brigade
description: Welcome tu zi 12th Annual French Maid Brigade Parade! Be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa. Stop by our camp anytime for official recruitment, or rendezvous with us on Thursday 2:00pm at 3:00 and Esplanade. We dust the filthy, the nasty, the new, the old, the sexy. March through camps, reviving dusty oppression celebrating triumph! Please bring: non-feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, any other useful cleaning equipment, and your worst possible

name: French Manila Air
description: Providing red carpet flight services around the world. Increase your altitude with us.

name: Friendlandia
description: Friendlandia: The Temple of Friendgagement is a place to honor new Friendships in ceremony. Bring your Friends and celebrate your relationship by sharing vows, exchanging Friendship Bracelets, and becoming BFFs (Burner Friends Forever!). Participate by officiating ceremonies, witnessing the proceedings, or getting Friendgaged!

name: Friends of Jerome
description: Welcome all Friends of Jerome, our Dome Sweet Dome.  Please come by for stories, discussions, performances, and dancing with the Stars (Star Fukrs that is), we look forward to having you.

name: Friendzied Serenity
description: A Chill Lounge in the SuburbsCome relax in the shade and try one of the special ¨Kiwi¨ drinks away from the hustle & bustle of the Esplanade

name: Fröccs Bár
description: Fröccs bár – serving your daily froccs portion of wine soda refresher in any of the well known ratios (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fr%C3%B6ccs) 3 every dayChill space – a sculptural shaded area with seating, music, and a light installation at nighttime.

name: Frogma
description: Frogma is the little theme camp that could, where everyone is your friend and neighbor! Hop on over to our lily pads Monday and Wednesday at 5:00pm for BRC’s one and only Hoppy Hour. Serving up ice cold slushy Frogaritas in our dome sweet dome. You’re guaranteed to make a rainbow of connections.

name: Frosty Phoques Iceberg Lounge
description: Hot and cold drinks and fantastic entertainment.

name: Frozen Oasis
description: Frozen Oasis: a mirage rising out of the desert offering frozen drinks in the afternoon to parched travelers of the Caravansary…

name: FTB+C
description: The First Transdimensional Bank + Church announces our merger with the Community Improvement Association. Our information booth will be a nexus for information about what you can do to improve Black Rock City, and serve as the base for new teams of bike escorts. The FTB+C will provide our historic tradition of metafiscal services: check your balance in our KTM, rise up afternoons with our Full Solar Salvation concerts, and dazzle your senses at night with our Light Organ.

name: fuck.balls.(yeah!) BIG BALL DERBY
description: a series of raucous races throughout the week involving any and all willing participants racing around an obstacle course track on kangaroo balls. races will be judged based on style or speed, or both, or neither!  feel free to sparkle your pony before the race with a cocktail or watch from the astroturf viewing section while placing bets.

name: Fucking Flamingos
description: We don’t give a Flamingo Fuck what your safe word is!

name: Fun Yay Fun
description: We don’t just casually observe fun. We vigorously produce fun. Every second of every minute. Come visit or work in the Fun Booth. YAY!

name: Funky Town
description: Day Parties featuring Funk, House, delicious cold cocktails, shade, live glass blowing, big smiles and the best sunrise and sunset views around.  We are Funky Town and we came to dance.

name: FUR
description: A camp of anthropomorphic art enthusiasts and their friends.

name: Fur and Spandex Parlor
description: We are the Fur and Spandex Parlor!  ( I know really original burner atire…)  We are a group of motivated, energetic, beautiful human beings that love to cover ourselves in fur, spandex, and other humans!  So we figured, lets bring it to burning man.  Come by to get face painted, body painted and roll around in fur and spandex.  We will have music and fun waiting for you!  🙂

name: FurBallz Village
description: Cats!Cats!Cats! and Debocceri are joining forces this year to go bigger and bring it for the community at Burningman. Swing by for full-contact bocce ball, kitty porn on the big screen, and sample our village drink “cat ball juice”: come get sprayed!

name: Furniture Car Rally Camp
description: We’re rallying the furniture in your hood’ for Thursday’s cruz through the burbs. Be comfortable. Be mobile

name: Fusion Valley
description: Welcome to Fusion Valley! Stop on by at our Internet Cafe. We’re your basic chill space that has mellow music (FM station 95.7 DJ’s!), phones, public computers & much more under our carpeted shade. Into board games?  So are we!  There is often a Cards A.H. game going on, so stop on by and join in!  At night we have a drive-in theater. Take a load off and say hi to some long time BM staff & burners.

name: Future (The Future)
description: The Future is often comprised of “pipe dreams,” which is any fantastic notion, hope, or story. Some pipe dreams come true, some don’t, but The Future would like to help people remember that pipe dreams of the past have indeed come to pass – and are now commonplace in our present world. Be inspired to keep having the pipe dreams that shape our future – climb Pipe Dream.

name: Future Best Friends
description: Black Rock City enables those from all walks of life and far corners of the globe to come together and meet in the most unpredictable and beautiful ways. Let’s celebrate the intense and profound connections we share with one another. Bring your Future Best Friend (FBF), share the story of how you met on the Playa, and get your Burning Man Best Friend necklaces! You know this is the beginning of something amazing. Recognize it, bitches!

name: G-Spot, The
description: We are the Original G (Oh G) serving BRC since 2001. The G-Spot is a often hard to find and always pleasurable location in the warm (sometimes frigid) wonderful lower region of the Black Rock Desert, deep inside Black Rock City where, you may discover an incredible welcoming environment. “The G-Spot if You Can’t Find Us …You Are Not Coming”!

name: Galactic Jungle
description: GalacticJungle will return to Burning Man for the 4th year! We will be providing a Space & Jungle-themed public lounge, live music from emerging talent and world renowned DJs, and an open bar for all of the Burning Man community.

name: Ganesh Oasis
description: Ganesh Oasis is a lush retreat for dusty desert denizens.  Play tennis on a regulation court.  Noon-5, Tue-Fri, celebrate and beat the heat in the BarWomb in a large, cool desert tent from India.  Beach party Wednesday afternoon!  Interact with the Percolator Top Cosmic Theater or black light pillow fight at night!

name: Garden, The
description: Come play in our Garden under a 40ft Big Top!  Burners from all over are cultivating a beautiful refuge of sweet smelling music, delicious tea parties (crustless sammies – pinkies up – fancy hats on!), spontaneous dance parties, quesadilla groves, coffee rushes, palpable veggies, and sweet shade overhangs

name: Gears and Beers
description: Fixing broken jalopy art cars by day,  partying and participating in gambling over gladiatorial combat by night,  bar is always open,  when we want it to be.

name: Geisha House
description: Geisha House is an air conditioned, velvet and fur lined chill space and shaded outside lounge, open to everyone who seeks comfort and enjoys good company.  We are also home to Cloud 9 mutant vehicle, Midnight coffee bar and Ramen cart.
hometown: New York, Los Angeles and Oakland

name: Gender Blender
description: Boy? Girl? Ze? Unidentified? You decide. Gender Blender is a safe haven for those bending and blending gender, a place to come and explore for those who have always wanted to mix up their gender but have never before, and a spot for those who are curious about gender play and how gender impacts and affects our lives. We are a gender conscious open loving community that runs workshops, theatrics, loves sparkles, drag, and making smoothies in the desert.

name: Genital Portrait Studio
description: At Genital Portrait Studio, our highly skilled photographers offer you the opportunity capture that special side of yourself in the privacy of our playa studio. Your session may include a number of props and positions, and you can walk away with your very own Genital ID card.

name: Geodesia
description: THE TOWER OF TERROR 3!!! A three-story geodesic tower, nearly 50′ high, awaits you and your goons. Come climb to the top for a spectacular view of the madness.

name: Gerlach-Empire shuttle bus
description: We maintain the depot and sell the tickets for the BRC – Gerlach/Empire,NV shuttle.  We are located at Center Camp and halfway to everywhere.

name: Giddy Up
description: Our camp is way far out and nearly impossible to find but if you should make the arduous journey we certainly would have a place for you to sit in the shade and we will talk your ear off about Burningman.

name: Gigsville
description: Gigsville is one of the oldest villages on the Playa (14 or 15 years old, depending on who you ask and how drunk they are). We’re dedicated to fire, fun, and good old fashion jackassery. You’ll find us gathered around the car that’s on fire in the center of camp. No ocelots.
hometown: Los Angeles, San Francisco, and Austin

name: GLAMCOCKS!
description: With love and respect on the Playa and beyond, we are a group of gay friends who invite YOU with open arms into our sexy, loving family through coversation, drinks, and dance for ALL who stumble upon us. See who we are as individuals, know us as the GlamCocks!

name: Glitter and Rust
description: Glitter and Rust will have a Badminton court, a cornhole set, and a photo-op mural. Bring your camera and/or your best game face. We are a multiethnic chill group willing to hang out, have deep philosophical discussions, be your adversary at a game, or just smile and wave as you pass by.

name: Glittercamp
description: Sparkling the Ponies Since 1998!  Because we can!

name: GMBLMZ
description: GMBLMZ is a spinning, 3D maze. It is mounted in two gimbaled rings, 4 meters across.

name: gNarnia
description: Enter through the wardrobe to gNarnia and start your new day with a cleansed face, prepped pores, a bit of pampering and cold brew coffee or sun tea.

name: Gnome Tramps
description: Tired of wandering? Rest your Caravans-weary feet at Gnome Tramps! Find a new travel companion (perhaps with a pointy red hat?), refresh yourself with a tasty Snakebite, bounce on our TRAMPoline, learn the art of Gnome Tramp poetry, or bask in the well-deserved accolades of our Compliment Booth. We may be trampy, but at least we’re cute!

name: Golden Cafe
description: Celebrating its 12th year, the Golden Cafe is your home on the playa for exotic cocktails, home infused liquors, and live music since 2003. Swing by for elegant libations served in real glassware, jam with our house band, and sample strange infusions from our cellars. Donations of liquor and mixers keep the party going, and there may be something new in store this time around…

name: Goodbye Horses
description: Home of the Kernel’s World-Famous Playa PopCart. Would you fuck us? We’d fuck us. Welcome to Goodbye Horses.

name: Grahama's Camp!
description: How long has it been since you’ve visited your Grandma? Come by for costumes, strange events, cheek pinching, cookies, and awkward inquiries. “Why don’t you ever call?”

name: Grandma's Haus
description: Positively heckling the ‘burbs into the sunset.

name: GRAVITY
description: Step into our digital realm of perceptual vastness. Defy the limits of your physical reality in our hoppin’ bounce house and enjoy a refreshing cup of tea in our futuristic Lovitate Lounge.

name: Green Froggy Camp
description: Green Froggy Camp members of AEZ

name: Green Hour, The
description: “The Red Baron is wise; he doesn’t stay up all night dancing and drinking root beer.” We do. The Green Hour offers the coldest root beer on the playa and, at the hour of sunset when the green lamp is on, we feature 1855-recipe organic absinthe to guests with valid ID.

name: Green Tortoise Village
description: Green Tortoise = alternative travel entity. We operate the shuttle service to and from Empire and Gerlach and have a cool camp with shade and a chill area.  We are comprised of great folks from around the world who corroborate and work together to form a Village, and to participate at BRC. Come by if you have a bus problem, to check out our unique sleeper coaches or hop on board in San Francisco!

name: Grey Matter
description: Hey… you… yeah you… you are awesome.

name: Grid City
description: Grid City is an interactive and educational space expressing the relation of self to the universe and the basic geometric breakdown of reality. Find “Love is _______.”  on the touch interface of the central dome and add your highest “truth” to the searchable database to visualize previously invisible thought connections of the “playa mind”!

name: Grrr (2010-2013 different names)
description: Grrr are hearts of gold covered in rust.  Come by and launch dildos from a Ballista, play Giant “Dare” Jenga, ask the Birdhouse to heal your soul, experience proper English tea time with erotica readings, and find our Grrrsect prowling the playa and ask for a ride!

name: GYPSY KITTIES
description: Camp Gypsy Kitties is the alluring awakening of your inner gypsy soul. Stop by and walk the Wheel of Fortune Gypsy booths and within each you may find your gypsy self awakened!

name: Gypsy Nebula
description: Gypsy Nebula, where planets collide and Gypsies dance to the collective beats of the Soular Tribe earth children powered by the sun. We offer readings, sock monkey making, relaxation and refreshments by day and sensory overload by night with plenty of heckling for the passing masses

name: Gypsy Witch Camp
description: Gypsy Witch Camp with  fun, games, homemade salsa chips, free clothes, giant interactive Jenga, and a place to chill.

name: Gypsymonkeys, The
description: Where the wisdom of the gypsies frolics with the mischievousness of the monkeys. Have your fortune read in the morning or make your very own sock monkey and join us for philosophy and tea in the evening.

name: GYST CAMP
description: GYST Camp is for Burners trying to Get Your Shit Together. Come to our lounge for fun, music, games, workshops and most importantly to meet great friends and new family members. Yoga, Improve, Dancing, Art, Motivation, Costumes. We bring our unique talents to the Playa for you! We hope to be your favorite hosts with the mosts – and we guarantee that your burn will be better for visiting our camp!

name: )'(Ooligan Airways
description: )'(Ooligan Airways is back this year, and boy is it going to be the trip of a lifetime.00L1GAN2 experienced heavy turbulence whilst airlifting supplies into war ravaged Turkmenistan.  Going down in a ball of flames (again), the )'(Ooligans find themselves stranded in the desert along the route of the old silk road.

name: )*(Aloha  =  H'Aloha
description: A Playanesian Paradise! Get Lei’d and stay for the  conversation!

name: H2OhYeahhh!
description: Come on by for cool water and a solar powered charge of your electronics!  Ask us for a hands on look at how you can build your own solar power system and power a swamp cooler or evapotron with it.

name: Habitat for Insanity
description: Habitat for Insanity focuses on novel burner technology/ideas and live performances. We encourage radical thinkers and doers to join.

name: Hack-a-Cola
description: Hack-a-Cola will provide a meeting place for residents of Black Rock City to congregate over cold, hand crafted sodas during the hot, sunny days and then warm themselves at night around the bar with a cup of hot chocolate.

name: Hair of the Dog
description: You bring the drinks and music….we’ll supply the drinks and music!  Your friendly neighborhood dive bar and live music venue returns!  Our infamous HOTD stage features daily Open Mic, variety acts, poetry slams, and the latest, greatest, and famous unsigned bands daily and nightly.  Come by and figure out what else HOTD means and get a free drink!

name: Hammer And Cyclery
description: Hammer And Cyclery is a full service (with limited parts from donations at Burning Man) bicycle repair shop with a full complement of tools plunked down on the Playa to help Burners everywhere have the smoothest, sweetest, safest (reddest) week possible on their Burning Man bike. We are open from 10am to 6pm every day.

name: Hammock Hangout
description: We offer a giant 12,000sqft public chill space with 90 hammocks, a bar and karaoke. Relax, sing, have a drink, a snack while racking is a hammock. See http://thehammockhangout.com for details.

name: Hammock Heaven
description: Come rest and relax and meet some new friends in our artful hammock structures.

name: Hamster Camp
description: From the group that brought you SparkleSpaz. Body paints, black-light dance parties, photo booth, mischief, and millions of hamsters.

name: Hang-Out, the
description: Hammock you say?! Check! Shade? Check! In-the-know? Check! Bards, poets, dusty-nymphs, lost souls, found children and your inner child. We also offer dirty-deeds,  innuendos, propositions, desert quests, random libations, and a visual euphoria for that recently opened third eye. There’s more than one way to catch a sparkle pony…let explore what lies beneath those dusty layers!!!

name: HAPi Experience
description: “Our mission is to become a Healing Art Performance installation space encapsulated i the beautiful HAPi Experience lotus flower structure…open to all cultures, empowering new rituals and techniques we can incorporate into our daily lives. This will be achieved through the multiplicity in Healing Art and Performance. gathering a visionary collective combining each medium and discipline together in a traveling mobile dome environment, ensuring all the participants that enter the HAPi Experience, leave with

name: Hapless Genies, The
description: No Description

name: Happy Clap!
description: Happy Clap! wants to spread joy with hi-fives and pat-a-cake style games. Let’s take it back old school and make those hands clap, schoolyard style.

name: Happy Hour
description: Hard day on the playa? Unwind at Happy Hour, where you’ll be greeted by one of a kind refreshing spirits served with smiles! Enjoy our lounge, bar, and gigantic jungle gym! Climb, dance on our Kaleidoshade structure or groove on tallest rotating “exotic dancing” pole! Start your evening with Happy Hour!

name: HARDLY
description: This is hardly the place for Whiskey drinking, Salsa dancing, welding your art car, getting locked in jail, or impersonating Michael Jackson.

name: Harmonic Convergence Camp
description: Drop by the Harmonic Convergence Camp for a coffee and a chat, a massage or a group energy healing…no set hours.We’re also your home for the College Football Tailgate & Viewing Party on Saturday.

name: HATEbar
description: HATEbar is a refuge from the free love, PLUR, hippies, ravers, sparkle-ponies, and shirt-cockers. Come by for shitty whiskey, shitty vodka, shitty beer and the honest truth about how you really look in that pink tutu and body paint.

name: Haus of Toniq
description: Hause of Toniq Returns for it’s second year offering a Shady Oasis for weary Travelers, Burlesque Lessons, and Non Alcoholic Refreshments.

name: Haven of Burgeoning
description: Upon arriving to the center piece walls and a elaborate gate guard the center piece. In the center stands a lone being walking out of a sort of quick sand, quick sand being confusion and doubt. And from that into clarity. The being in the middle is grasping an orb with one hand that glows. The being, having reach inner peace is also glowing from the eyes and body. The other that have not fully risen are much more grey and lifeless and lack more vibrant colors. It’s surrounded by rounded walls and benches to

name: Head Space
description: Stop by for a hammock and share a story, join us in the yurt for a round of spaced-out head games then grab a slice of pizza for the road!

name: Healing Foot Wash Life Truth Love
description: Come have your feet washed in a quiet, safe and loving environment.  You may come back and wash other people’s feet after you’ve had yours washed, all are welcome!

name: Heart of Bok Choy
description: love, laughter, and stir-fry.

name: Heart Phoenix Color Caravan
description: In 2013 Heart Phoenix brought a one-of-a-kind experience to the playa bringing together music, art, mobility, and community. This year the Heart Phoenix crew has even more incredible music and art planned, and lots of fun in store for our playa family.

name: Heart Tribe
description: Heart Tribe is part of a village called Honeysuckle Hood, which embodies the heart through body, mind and spirit. Our main offering to the playa is our Healing Sanctuary, which includes a shaded chill space to relax while you wait for your massage.Our healing modalities include massage, reiki, sound healing, chiropractic and more, so come by during our open hours of 12-6pm for a relaxing healing session.

name: Heart-On!
description: Everyone loves a Heart-On! Multiple Heart-On!s are good!

name: HeartNSoul
description: Break into your own feeling and human connection and come visit HeartNSoul camp.  Our main dome is filled with interactive art and colorful light&sound surprises. Come rest during the day for a stimulating mind and body soul breath. Stay into the night hours to have your sense and spirit turned on like it deserves. Retro soul music hour every dusk and custom leather pieces will accompany you upon departure to take a piece of our heart on your caravan journey.

name: HeeBeeGeeBee Healers
description: HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is a grounded oasis that creates a nurturing environment and provides healing and personal growth services for the HeeBeeGeeBee community and all of Black Rock City. Our community’s intention is for the healing energy we cultivate to spread into the greater world, promoting love, healing and a higher state of being for everyone.

name: Helioz
description: The British Empire’s primary outpost in Black Rock City.  Come for the clocktower, stay for the tea.

name: Hellfire Society
description: Intrested in fire spinning? Here is the place to meet fire performers. We will be hosting workshops daily, come check us out.

name: Hen House, The
description: The Hen House Presents: Speed Dating, Twerk Shops, and a Tang Bang Block Party. Come visit the Hen Den where you might meet the love of your life, learn the greatest dance move, and enjoy tasty tang bangs with new friends.

name: Henna  Hut
description: Henna art in ancient style, African waist beads to rock on the playa, and daily morning yoga to get your mind body connection

name: Heroes & Super Villains
description: Heroes & Super Villains is an exploration of Light & Shadow in individual, group & societal behavior. We offer hospitality for those on their Hero’s Journey & hench men for aspiring Super Villains with visions of taking over the world. Open from noon til sunset, drop in for yoga, our sophisticated slow bar, sexy soulful music, missions, therapy and storytelling. Friday is our epic SOUL BRUNCH with world class DJs & delicious breakfast treats.

name: Hiburnia
description: Hiburnia , a desert dwelling tribe from the ancient island of hibernia manifests the gift of fine Irish whiskey tasting each day an hour before sunset.

name: High Tide
description: Camp High Tide provides an interactive beach experience with a surfing game, silent surf movies, the big pool and shake-your-bootie dance lessons.  Ride the waves with us at Camp High Tide!

name: High-High-Five
description: Everybody loves to trampoline, one problem with our world today –  there are not enough trampolines.  People cannot legally get high easily enough – we want to set out to change this – by encouraging burners to use our trampoline to High-High-Five our 5 big hands.

name: Hippocampus
description: Hippocampus is the place to make your playa memories stick. Find our mobile cafe as the sun rises over Black Rock City for the best coffee on the playa.

name: Hive, The
description: A buzzing mass of madness from the East descends upon the desert, full of burning light and energy. Is the Hive full of honey, or stings? Bathe in our glow, and discover!

name: Hobotopia
description: Attention! All able-bodied berry grabbers, oyster glommers, apple knockers, and spud diggers! Escape the smog-holes of the east and climb aboard the rails of freedom: the world of tomorrow awaits at the end of the line out west in the bright land of Hobotopia.  We gots beans, we gots cold tonic, and we gots sweet melodies. Come shake the dirt off your ass and share your strange tales of railway adventure around the fires of our hobo jungle.

name: Hokey Pokey Oasis
description: Join the conscious arena daily at 12 noon to dance the Hokey Pokey. Dance or watch as we turn ourselves around. All ages welcome. Friends of Bill W. Meeting daily at 5 PM. This is the Oasis to just hang out if you wish.

name: Holi High Camp
description: Holi High Camp brings the madness and color kaleidoscope of the festival of Holi to the boisterous masses of the playa through body-paint blasting cannons.
