name: Home Brew 4A Home Brew
description: A Home Brewers community hub where brewers of the Playa come to meet and share. Enjoy a cold home brewed beer, mead or soda served daily from noon to dark. We have a pool table, games and daily events including our world famous pickle party! Bring your keg and we will refrigerate and tap it.

name: Home Free Dome
description: Home Free Dome is a community of encounter, designed to amplify the transformative cultural forces at play in Black Rock City. We turn spectators into participants, virgins into veterans, and veterans into virtuosos.

name: Home Sweet Dome
description: Home Sweet Dome is a chill space located at the heart of Hushville, with shade in the daytime, lights at night, power to recharge batteries and general merriment.

name: HomeBrauHaus
description: HomeBrauHaus is a collection of scientists, artists, and rabble-rousers who all have a passion for making and drinking beer.  HomeBrauHaus is devoted to upholding the longstanding traditions of beer culture by providing a wide variety of home-brew toBlack Rock City. This will be HomeBrauHaus’s third year on the playa.  Last year we brought out 300 gallons of home-brew and served it all!  This year we plan on bringing just as much beer plus batches of home-brewed cider.

name: Homeless Jangles Halfpipe
description: The overlaying plywood of this mini ramp (halfpipe) is essentially covered in artwork from local artists of central Kentucky. This blanketed canvas is a symbolic representation of the spark of creativity that one undergoes when cruising on a bmx bike or pushing a skateboard. It’s an art form. Just as chords combine to make a lick, maneuvers conjoin to create a symphony of sorts. Ramps, to all shredders: skateboarders, and “pedalers” alike are blank canvasses to which we can express boundless journeys of fre

name: Homepage: Human Powered Internet Camp
description: Our camp is gifting the internet to the good people of BRC while encouraging the principal of communal effort! Take a turn riding our exercise bike router! As long as the pedals are spinning the internet connection keeps working. Come get a sweat on while checking work emails.

name: HomeSlice
description: Drop in for a cheerful “Slice of Home”—Arrakis-style.  Climb the sky-high HomeSlice Tower’s inverted pyramids, warm yourself at the HomeSpice Beacon, upgrade or re-engineer your Playa duds at our Radical Alteration clinics.

name: Homojitoville
description: A mirage appears in Deep Playa. The aroma of fresh icy Homojitos stimulates your hypothalamus. Giant bright puffy flowers belt out groovy dance beats. Leave it to serendipity and the boys of Homojitoville! The Mobile Homojito Dance Bar & Sound Garden of Eden appear randomly, erupting in a fabulous cocktail and dance party, then disappear. Never in the same place twice, this is no mirage. Shake your groove thing where spontaneity rules! Bring your cup we’ll fill it with love!

name: Honeysuckle Hood
description: Honeysuckle Hood is a village of the body, mind and spirit with the intention of awakening the wisdom of the heart.  We are comprised of Heart Tribe, Chakralicious Camp and Camp Mystic.  We offer workshops, a daytime healing sanctuary, performances, dance parties, games, and love.  We are rad.  Come visit and awaken your heart!!

name: HOO Camp
description: Friends telling fortunes and sharing art

name: Hookah Lounge, The
description: Come to the Hookah Lounge and enjoy our flavored tobaccos, coffee, and wide selection of teas. Our Moroccan style lounge serves up shisha filtered through juice and water every night. The plush seating, soft carpeting, and great people make this the ultimate Burning Man chill-out zone. If you have a favorite molasses based tobacco, you are welcome to bring it and share* with others. Karaoke sundown to midnight.

name: Hooker Support Group
description: Hooker Support Group is the headquarters for the art installation Suspension of Disbelief, a large-scale utopia of crocheted hammocks.

name: House Of Skin
description: All your skin care needs!!! Let the lotion rubbings begin!!!

name: House of YES
description: House of YES! is a spontaneous and playful improvisation camp for games, adventures, sparkles, hugs and the kind of laughter that makes playa dust come out your nose.

name: Houston CORE Camp
description: HOUSTON CORE TEAM has developed a great line-up IN CAMP!YEEEEEE-SAW! You heard that right! A Texas sized see-saw that spans 32’! Far more than just a see-saw, it’s the perfect grown-up toy! You up for 14 riders at a time??—though like any see-saw worth its salt, it just takes two!MEDITATION DEATHMATCH. 2 players with EEG’s strapped to their heads to read their brainwaves. “Show us your war faces!” Then we find out who can relax harder.

name: Hua Biao
description: “Hua Biao” is a cylindrical structure, about 16 feet tall, on the top it’s a mythical guardian beast sitting on the cloud. It’s a totem of speech post for the ordinary people in ancient Chinese times going back 4000 years ago outside emperor’s palace. Later on it become the symbol of freedom of speech.

name: Huddleville
description: Your weird, overly-friendly, awkwardly naked, awesome neighbors. Shade, afternoon dance music, garage sales, cold micheladas, facepaint, and friends for days.

name: Hungover Camel Hydration Station
description: A place for camels to rehydrate, hung over or not.

name: Hushville
description: Hushville, an aural oasis in an undulating sea of chaos, is open to any camper who pre-registers and can abide our three simple rules: 1 )No Generators; 2) No Amplified Sound; and 3) Leave No Trace. Because Hushville is a village in Black Rock City, we can’t promise that it will be quiet… just quieter.

name: Hyphaesaurus One
description: Hyphaesaurus One is a 22′ geo dome made from wood and metal that provides refuge and amazement to all playa denizens who dare stumble upon it.

name: I call this one Old Gregg
I NEED AN ADULT VILLAGE
description: I need an adult village: the place for booze and tunes, costumes and playa-fied wear, playground and enchanted forest

name: I'm OK, You're OK Corral
description: I’m OK, You’re OK Corral is back! Stop by and say hello to all the cowgirls and gents. Join our daily playa virgin roundups on our spectacular mutant firetruck called “The Queen”.

name: Ibis Maximus
description: Ibis Maximus is a beautiful sculpture of a bicycle, nearly 10? tall. It is the brainchild and creation of sculptor Nick Taylor of Fort Bragg CA. The main frame is made from steel pipe, 4 inches in diameter with about 1/4 inch wall thickness, heavily manipulated and sculpted and  welded and ground and filed by Nick. The forks, bars, stems and links are also custom made. It weighs over 1,000 pounds; the wheels are 59 inches.  Not recommended for riders under 10? tall.

name: Icy Hands CHILLZONE
description: Chill out with the Icy Hands crew as they defrost between midday mercy missions: share cool stories, images and video of those touched by icy hands under the sizzling playa sun.  Learn how to turn a simple block of ice into smiles, goosebumps and a truly incredible shared experience!

name: IDEATE
description: Innovation camp focused on enabling Burning Man culture in the default world

name: Ignited States Outpost
description: Ignited States Outpost is the residence of the BRC Ski Patrol and host of the KaravanSKIra Lounge (aka The Ski Lodge). All travelers welcome!

name: Illumination Village
description: The Illumination Village is an eclectic gathering of camps, held together by history and shared resources. We don’t require expensive dues from our campers to create a joint vision. Each year it’s a new experiment in radical collaboration to create the cohesive feel for the village, across our many diverse camps. We love the multifaceted variety of environments which result from this approach, and believe that it makes the Illumination Village a unique and delightful place to visit.

name: ILLUMINUS
description: ILLUMINUS is a two-story solar-powered pyramid; a sacred venue for meditation, performance, art, film and music created in the same divine proportions as the pyramids of Giza. Come play with us!

name: IN DUST WE TRUST
description: Story sharing and dress up

name: Inappropirates
description: The inappropirates are… 1) Inappropriate. 2) Pirates.Oh. And we serve coffee.

name: Infinity
description: Welcome to Infinity!Lounge in our shaded CuddleOasis, visit our PillowFight Vortex for some healthy release, get your nails painted and your infinite vibe on with our Beautification Station, or be processed to become a Universal Citizen:  it’s all here!You are invited to our annual 50’s Housewife Party, Wednesday 1-4pm.

name: Infusion Confusion
description: We are a solid, sexy bunch of builders, bakers, educators, crafters, magic-makers, gardeners, cyclists, outdoor thrill-seekers and overall creators. We also like a good motor boat any time of the day.Come get an infused spirit or homebrew to satisfy your curious minds and senses.******************************************************************We hail from OR and CA and would love to hug you and laugh with you.Anyone and everyone can come, be safe, feel good, feel loved, feel sexy and be themselves.

name: Inspiration Moasis
description: Wondering what is the pirate do after they going to sleep (if they ever sleep) and experience the inspiration in the desert. Inspiration Moasis from Israel, Reno and many other exotic places is the place for relax learn and grow.

name: Inspireality Palace
description: Within the grand caravansary of Black Rock City, Inspireality Palace is an inviting structure, a journey of self-discovery, a communal space and a transformational experience.  Two mountainous peaks, draped with hundreds of shiny black rectangles, sparkle from afar.  Weary travelers drawn to the abstract edifice discover one of two entrances disguised in the hard outer shell.  Inward spiraling arches guide travelers through a warmth of feeling created by intense contrasts of scale, materials, illumination a

name: Institute Village, The
description: Do you got it bad, got it bad, got it bad?  Come visit the Institute Village where our overeducated, undermanaged faculty staff will jam so much science in your brains you’ll puke.  Night or day, we’ll just keep pounding it into your skull until you fucking get it.  Yay science!  Don’t miss TUESDAY NIGHT, in the battle of the century, we pit Science vs. Magic (Witchcraft).  It’s ON!

name: Intention Dimension
description: Intention Dimension is a space that encourages living intentionally in all dimensions of life through example, workshops (See WWW Guide), and an inviting atmosphere.  Come join us in our sanctuary focused on sustainability, happy healthy life styles, healing and expansion, and creative expression.

name: Interaction Cafe
description: We create a unique and extremely interactive space where servers can offer any stripe of interaction – body part wrestling, improvised songs & skits, slo motion races, bullfights, spinning games, sensual touch, conversations about edgy & odd topics, (we have hundreds of tantalizing menu items that may be on our individual menus!) – and guests choose which they’d like to indulge in. It can be hard to leave, because you never know what might happen next…

name: Intergalactic Sasquatch Village
description: A funky little Cantina for magical beings to come dance, relax, and get a cool drink.

name: Into the Wild
description: Come experience a different way of life. This year we bring you wild new ways to play Ping Pong, Beach Volley and Badminton. Come to our camp and try out Chained Badminton, Pink Pong or EL wire Beach Volley.

name: Iron Rose
description: …when you’re tired of Techno:  Iron RoseBurn Barrels, Bluegrass and a Big Red Pill.
hometown: Bay Area, Mendocino and all over the world!

name: It's All Made Up
description: It’s All Made Up! (formerly DC not Washington) plays with possibility, transformation, and the Created Life.  We’re always up to something new, and we invite you to come and create it!

name: JaggerBush Central Station
description: Center of operations for JaggerBus(h) pedal powered public transport.

name: Jake's Tent Charcuterie RV Camp
description: Jake’s Charcuterie Camp will cater to your desire for the finest meats, cheeses, and wine on the playa. Our daily happy hours will ensure that you won’t leave hungry or thirsty!  Come join us during the daytime for a swig and a bite.

name: Janky Barge + Catmandu = <3
description: Janky Barge and Catmandu are joining forces this year to bring you all fun you want both around the playa and within the city. Come join us on a ride-a-long for some music and fun with the Janky Barge, or at camp for Catmandu’s Rad & Rude Kitten Play Zone!

name: Jankytown
description: A performance artist village consisting of Cirque du Cliche, Samba Stilt Circus, Ministry of Flow, and Fou Fou Ha, Jankytown presents it’s Orquestra – an otherworldly combination of live music and circus arts throughout the week.  From funk, to samba, to some serious clowning and fire spinning, Jankytown breathes performance art.

name: JaXXXson JunXXXion
description: Sway the day away in our Hammock Cuddle Puddle. Featuring a shaded oasis with 10 hammocks suspended over a pool of stuffed animals. Relax as sexy ambient beats envelope you while you enjoy cold fresh fruit.  Swing in the breeze and rejuvenate your mind, body and soul before heading back out to the playa.

name: Jelly Fields
description: Where jellyfish and geodesics become one!

name: Jellyfish 12000
description: The Jellyfish 12000 invites you to come explore the aquatic alien underground native to ancient Lake Lahotan. Our otherworldly time-traveling family of mutant vessels consists of The Amazing Jellyfish From The Year 12000, Spider Jelly and Jelly Roll.jellyfish 12000 sayhuman be nice to other humanhuman protect nice planethuman go on get funky

name: Jerk Church
description: We gather at our cathedral to Break Bread, Share a Cup, and a Song. Sometimes we have weddings. Sometimes we run a bar. Sometimes we like to sit quietly and contemplate the true nature of the Jerk. All are welcome.

name: JOBI: Coffee, Tea or Me?
description: Offering coffee, tea and more every morning at 7 a.m. until it’s gone. . .

name: Joyism Tree
description: A tall spire holds two horizontal rotating arms which support Calderseque mobile elements which twist and turn in the wind.

name: K-SVERTpres Sacdave's Okie Corral
description: K-SVERT 106.5 FM presents, Sacramento Dave’s Okie Corral. K-SVERT 106.5 FM is Burning Man’s rock alternative. Providing professional radio programing to BRC since 1996. Sacramento Dave’s Okie Corral, is a draft beer garden, hosting draft beer keg parties everyday at 4:20. Rock music, cold draft beer, simulcast ‘live’ on the radio. Bring your own cup, get a cool ID wristband, good everyday, for the entire event. Let K-SVERT106.5 FM be your daily non EDM oasis.

name: Kaleidoscope Collective
description: Share a story, spin a yarn, tell a tale.  We’re all ears.  Kaleidoscope means “the observation of beautiful forms.”  We make beautiful images come to life through the power of stories.

name: Kamp Kaos
description: Kaos brings a human-scale fabric art maze, observation platform, and late night Death Marches back to the playa!

name: Kamp Kimono
description: Love! Kimonos! Weirdness!

name: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye
description: Welcome to Kamp Suckie Fuckaye, home of the Suck ‘n’ Fuck Saloon and the Garnish fire conclave. Please come and carouse with us. Have a drink, a dance, be amazed by fantastic fire performance, acrobatics and aerials and general debauchery.

name: Kanuckistan Sietch
description: For make benefit glourious nation, featuring Old Country Vodka Snorting Bar, 10th annual Xeni Cup street hockey tournament, Desert Fremen. twitter.com/kanuckistan

name: Karma Chickens
description: Karma Chickens are all about sharing knowledge and experience while having fun! In our 25-foot shaded dome we hold drink socials and hold workshops on poi, swing dancing, belly dancing, gray water management, tai chi, play acoustic music and more!

name: KashyyyK
description: The Wookies are coming back from the jungle to bring you beats, booze, and KAVA!! Come lounge with us!

name: Kazbus Harem Pants Belly Dance
description: Come learn American Tribal Belly Dance, hop on our caravan, (led by our mutant vehicle) and flashmob the Esplande with your new dance skills.

name: Kelpie
description: A Kelpie leaps enthusiastically from a brackish pond in the desert, beckoning a challenge to catch or be caught. Unbeknownst to the gleeful water horse, a deeper, darker presence has awoke, and begins to surface a long tentacle. Tension mounts as the water sprite seems not to react to the dangers from below, is it denial or obliviousness, to not see what else is happening in this small pond? Or is it unconcern? Will Kelpie realize in time?

name: Kentucky Fried Camp
description: Bringing a hot breakfast of bourbon, fried baloney sandwiches, and Kentucky hospitality to the playa since 2007. KFC, it’s what’s for breakfast.

name: Khan's Asylum
description: Revenge is a dish best served cold, and so are tasty beverages. Come to Khan’s Asylum daytime oasis, play at our Lego bar, join in for music and dance, tarot readings, and partake in our gifting bazaar.
hometown: San Diego et. al. (although we think of BRC as home)

name: Kidsville
description: Kidsville is THE place for children of all ages! We host a group of diverse families creating a unique space for play and other activities including the Black Rock Scouts program. Families with children 0-17 years of age are welcome to camp with us if they are pre-registered. Registration begins in March and ends when full. Note: Kidsville is NOT a baby-sitting service. All children must be supervised by an adult.

name: Kimchi Camp
description: Kimchi Camp is celebrating our 6th year on the playa. Come by and visit and learn about fermented foods and why they are so good for you!

name: Kin-Dza-Dza!
description: In the remote galaxy of Kin-Dza-Dza lies a desert planet named Pluke. Residents of Pluke have long ago used up all of their water to make fuel. Their harsh world is littered with remnants of advanced but dingy-looking technology. Envisioned in a 1986 USSR film, the KZZ phenomenon is as old as Burning Man itself. Come visit us if you love it, know of it, or are just curious.

name: Kindergarten Kamp
description: Kindergarten Kamp is bringing it’s playground out for your enjoyment – kids of all ages are welcome to enjoy our swings, trampoline, and teeter-totter – and don’t forget to check out the art on the playground.  You will also be able to relax in our Moroccan styled MonkeyHut, where you can smoke some hookah and play swag poker.

name: Kindred
description: Kindred strives to set a space brings sustainable and progressive living through collective efforts to the west coast bass culture. We are interested in sharing our knowledge about renewable energies, sound, permaculture, spirituality, science, flow, and more. We invite those who have interest in these subjects to come and share their knowledge with us. We present Camp Kindred to Burning Man 2014.

name: Kinoetic
description: Camp Kinoetic, organized by the Institute of Noetic Sciences, is the central hub for the largest collective consciousness experiment the world has ever seen. Stop by to see projected visualizations of real-time consciousness data, participate in consciousness experiments, learn from world-class researchers, or just chill, meditate, and hang out in the tension between mind and physicality.

name: Kognitokhan
description: KognitoKhan is a shining beacon in the desert, a towering 22’ effigy standing atop an 8’ tall silver pedestal, with multiple outstretched arms, each one holding a flame pod in a metallic hand. As worshipers gather at the meditation station near the effigy and don wireless headsets, their meditative powers are channeled to cognitive analyzers which convert their brainwaves into control signals, sending fireballs into the sky, slowly at first, building momentum with increasing concentration and finishing in a

name: Kosmik Dust Pedal Pub Theme Camp
description: Look for the Star Tunnel for iced tea, lemonade and cookies or play in our motion activated sound garden.  Chill in the shade of our Kosmik Kafe or “caravan” across the playa on the Pedal pub.

name: Kostume Kult
description: Kostume Kult recreates the glory days of NYC in the 70’s and 80’s by transporting you to the seedy throwback replica of “Times Square BRC”, the crossroads of the world! The Empire State Building and King Kong loom above the NYC skyline while a runway show that blows fashion week out of the dust goes on. The playa provides the grit, we supply the glamour so hop the K Train to costume transformations and a non stop runway show.

name: Kreme Burners
description: Rave de Creme Brulees: Enjoy some cool beats in the afternoon, turning into Dubstep as the evening comes, while tasting the finest French style Creme Brulees on the playa. Show us your best tricks on the trampoline, get a cocktail refill when the bar is open, or just come and chill with us in the dodecagon.

name: KSA Disco Katz
description: Frisky felines who throw furrocious pawties in The gLitter Box. Kitty Costume Drill, Hoop Wars, MaDaquiri Hours (madonna and daquiri’s, duh!), Talent Show, Keep Screwin Around.

name: KultureHaus MIR
description: KultureHaus MIR is a communal theater and music stage, bringing together participants of many playa cultures and crossroads for daily performance and débuts. Play your accordion, make a tutu workshop, recite Pushkin, finally do that ballet recital – this is your theater!

name: #luckylizardsgaminghouse
description: Come and get your green on at the Lucky Lizard’s Gaming House and Trading Post. Open for happy hour Wednesday – Saturday.

name: La Calaca
description: La Calaca is a shamanic bedouin camp. A strange, mystical experience that welcomes all brands of travelers. We’ve got a lot of things brewing in our cauldron for this year. Specifically:• We co-produce TEDxBlackRockCity• The healing dome will be back and in full, energetic force with over 20 different practitioners lined up to ply qi gong, aromatherapy, bodywork, meditation, and much much more• A Burning Man Art project• Our second photo project with Spencer Tunick

name: La Calaca Village
description: La Calaca Village is a community 8 years in the making, housing 2 camps: Pinatas Revenge & Camp La Calaca.

name: LAFer Camp
hometown: Los Angeles. Salt Lake City. Woodland, CA. Kings Beach CA. Lake

name: Lamplighter Chapel
description: Every day at sunset, the Lamplighters go forth to gift the citizens of Black Rock City with Illumination, Navigation, and Celebration. Any and all are welcome to join the ritual procession! Preparations begin at 5:00pm daily throughout the event.

name: Lamplighter Village
description: Home of the infamous Lamplighter Bar, where we host a recruitment party from 3pm – 5pm each day, but are open 22 hours a day. Come stop by and enjoy our shade, grab a drink, and stick around to volunteer to help us light the city.

name: LandSharks
description: The LadSharks are remote controlled, animated El-Wire Sharks that roam the open Playa at night . We play with people in many ways, they chase bikes and art cars, playfully attack swimmers , walkers desert isles…. whatever we come across.We are out to brig smiles to as many as we can. It is all about playing and sharing.

name: Large Harmonic Collider
description: The Large Harmonic Collider is the collision point of universes: an anomaly in spacetime where beings from all origins and dimensions intersect on a common plane. Create music with new friends through our interactive sound dome.

name: Largest Known Hammock, The
description: This giant hammock spans 40 feet and provides multiple groups of weary playa wanderers a suspended space to sprawl out on.

name: Lavender Lounge
description: This is a chill spot in the heat of the day where our guests are given a head massage while laying flat and being misted by lavender water. The Lavender Lounge is a cool inviting safe place for all age groups.

name: Lazy Skool Daze
description: Lazy Skool Daze is an intellectual and artistic haven. We create a welcoming physical and emotional space where playa-mavens can come to teach and learn, to perform and observe, to show and tell. We sing songs from the days of lunchtime and lockers, dance with childish abandon, and share stories of what we’ve learned since youth.In essence, our camp tries to create adult versions of favorite childhood memories, to bring us back to states of wide-eyed wonder and enthusiasm.

name: Le Kafé
description: Le Kafé welcomes you for a cup of fair trade & organic coffee or tea, iced or hot, with an Irish flair or French style. Come relax in a cozy shaded area with comfy futons and eclectic music, favorite board games and great company. Served by authentic and exaggeratedly obnoxious French waiters. Menu extravaganzas will be offered daily, check every morning. Open 11am to 2pm.

name: Lemonade Stand, The
description: Come create art while enjoying an ice cold glass of lemonade!

name: Leopard Martini Lounge
description: Making martinis as dry as the playa since 1998

name: Let It Go
description: Come let it go at our camp. Relax in our flower dome where you will be surrounded by nature’s beauty or come confess it all in our confessional.

name: Let There Be Light
description: Art Installation Mission Statement“Let There Be Light”

name: Let's Go Bananas
description: We will be providing gifts of fresh bananas throughout the week!  Please come join us on Thursday at 9:00pm for a banana extravaganza!

name: Light & Illusion
description: Interactive Total Control Lighting LED wall, Persistence of Vision, Reverspective Cool Neon and LED optical illusion, and many more light-optical illusions at camp site. Tech talks.

name: Light Box
description: At the heart of Burning Man is the people and their spirit, radical self-expression, art and the playa itself. The essence of Light Box is to capture these treasures as photographs. The Light Box is a large, moveable “view camera” which records the beauty, state of happiness, euphoria and freedom in Burning Man! Found in a different playa location each day, the Light Box is an automated device that will record images of whatever passes in front of its all-seeing lens. Stand in front of the Light Box’s view

name: Light Brite
description: Giant lite Brite.  Playagoers will stumble across this giantrendering of their favorite childhood toy that invites them to interactand create spontaneous light sculptures that express their thoughts andideas in the moment.

name: LightSweeper
description: Star in your own 80s-style arcade game! Step into our console and onto the light-up dance floor where you can play fun games like giant Minesweeper! Experience life-size, 8-bit immersion!

name: Liminal Labs Dust Xchange
description: Today’s Silk Road is more cyber than Khyber, a volatile marketplace fueled by virtual goods and digital wallets. What better playa currency than DUSTCOIN? Get in on the ground floor. No mining required. Check exchange rates on our constantly updated LIMDAQ board, then try to haggle us down. (Workshops on the finer points of haggling each day at noon!) Traders bearing biometric DUSTCOIN stamp/tattoos enjoy reserved seating for our spine-tingling fire shows each evening from dusk through dark-thirty.

name: Lip Service
description: BURN THE MAN, SAVE YOUR LIPS!When the harsh playa takes its toll on your soul and lips, come see Lip Service.  We’ve got just what you need… really Bad Advice, soothing Lip Balm, cool beverages, great beats and other debauchery generally included!

name: Liquid Sky
description: Liquid Sky has landed…Hello earthlings! Come and be a mexican for a day. We’ll offer a little corner of mexican galore for you where we celebrate the dead…. Ofrenda 4-6pm Monday-Saturday. Day of the Dead Friday from 7pm, bring your skeleton to dance with the departed.

name: Listen
description: Come to Listen and be heard.

name: Living Theatre, The
description: The Living Theatre brings Judith Malina, as well as other long term members to Black Rock City where they will curate a revolutionary one-week-theatre-festival.www.perfproductions.com

name: Lost & Found
description: We’re advocates for the journey and we embrace those creative and bewildering folks we meet along the way.

name: Lost Boys
description: We are the LOST BOYS and we will never grow up! Come escape time on our Art Car or enjoy Naked Bacon in the morning…you bring the naked, we bring the bacon! Rufio will mix up drinks that are BANGARANG! Learn to fly, learn to fight, learn to crow! Find us past the second star to the right and straight on til morning! )'(

name: Lost Penguin, The
description: What could be more lost than a Penguin in the desert? Drop in to our hospitality oasis where we offer comforts such as shade, couches, wine, lemonade, chocolate, snow cones, friendly people, and live entertainment.  Day or night, get up on stage for asshole theatre, watch some bands, dance to DJs or take a workshop. Join us as we navigate surpirses all week!  Or just sit and we will engage you in conversation as you watch the playa float by.

name: Love It!
description: Take a trip through TV’s steroid fueled golden era by running the Assault course from American Gladiator. Fire a semi-automatic pneumatic tennis ball cannon or test your agility as the contender! 9&K

name: Love Land
description: We welcome and inspire people taking part in the Burning Man Experience. Featuring daily activities, a unique and pampering “City Concierge” in our “Love Spa”, the 3rd annual “Steely Dan Happy Hour”, a “David Bowie Happy Hour” and our 5th Annual Pastie Workshop: bling out your boobs in our cozy beehive dome! Get crafty and create your own sexy pasties, adorn yourself with body paint, enjoy a cocktail, or shake your booty to our honey-licious Dj’s + More!

name: Love Potion Camp
description: Based on art, creativity, whimsy, fun, family, positive vibes , ‘Luurve’ & our famous Love Potion. Our mutant vehicle, the Amphora will be offering up awesome DJ’s, dancing and transport. Open to ALL.

name: Love Puddle
description: A bar and playground open every afternoon that serves the most refreshing punch on the playa, to enjoy before or after playing foursquare or swinging on the swings. Ask nicely and we might give you a Love Puddle or whip out Dildo Jousting.

name: Ludus Symposium
description: Ludus (playful love) Symposium (Meeting for music, drinking and intellectual discussion) is a place to hang out on our friendly deck/bar above the playa and make new friends.

name: M*A*S*H 4207th
description: We’re not Doctors. The least disciplined military unit on the playa. Random security Checkpoints will occur. Terrorists & Loyal Citizens will be labled. Propaganda & commentary provided for the prevention of communism. Nightly viewings of old episodes & movies from the show. Since 1999, your bastion of Democracy in a sea of fifth column communist/socialist/lawless infiltrators and barbarian mutants! Daytime martinis at Rosie’s Bar. Praise the lord and pass the sauce!

name: MacGyvers' Union
description: Every camp has a MacGyver; now the MacGyvers have a union. We provide all MacGyvers with recognition, thanks, tools, training, entertainment, emotional and moral support, chill space away from their home camp, and an official ID card.

name: Magic Pancakes: Intergalactic MFs
description: Camp Magic Pancakes, presented by the Intergalactic Motherfuckers. A group of wizards with the love of all things mischievous wish to bring magical pancakes and the wheel of punishment for all the unsuspecting citizens of Black Rock City.

name: Magic Theater
description: Not for everyone…..for Madmen Only

name: Man's Best Friend, The
description: Strolling across the playa thinking of your other home(s) as you look towards the Man your eyes alight on a mirage…wait, no it IS a giant dog…just when you were missing familiar things and your best 4 legged friend.  You approach and it barks, pants, whines at you.  As you marvel at its size and contemplate how much shade is underneath you realize that ladders rise up the legs.  You climb and emerge onto a platform just below the mouth.  There you sit and gaze out on the playa towards the Man shaded by the

name: Martini Village
description: Come visit Martini Village and enjoy cold refreshments, games, entertainment and much more!!!  Look us up for our scheduled events or just stop by and check out a random happy hour.  Be prepared to be immersed in the 10 principles of the playa.

name: Math Camp @ Group W
description: Math Camp is A Safe Place for Mathematics: A small, social camp, offering a place to drink and derive!  Daily lectures and long-winded impromptu chats on all things Math related.  We are proud Purveyors of Crunchy Snacks, plus we have The Best Friday Morning Sunrise Cocktail Party on the playa (not to mention being home of the fabulous Electric Cupcakes).

name: Mayan Warrior
description: Mayan Warrior is both a camp and a massive moving stage.  After years of collaboration and inspiration, a group of artists, designers, musicians, builders, wanderers, lovers, and festival designers created Mayan Warrior to bring an underground culture from D.F. Mexico to the Playa.We are 70,000 watts of self reliant modern-turbo-bohemia featuring the world’s top DJs.Come join us on the playa and build lifelong friendships over music, dance, bass, and our unique culture.

name: Media Mecca
description: Media Mecca is an on-playa press room.  Our motley band of reporters, marketers, sociologists, technical writers, artists, anthropologists, clowns, film geeks, and rock stars help prepare journalists for the Burning Man experience, and uphold registration and acculturation processes designed to make visiting media-makers’ impact on Black Rock City and its citizens a positive one.

name: Meerkats
description: Home of Gunther and the BoopDown.

name: Mellow Mountain
description: Come horse around on the carousel, swings and stick-ponies.Pause at the cafe tables and lounge for drink service and get a big pneumatic red smooch from the Kissy Fish art car.

name: Menagerie
description: Come to Menagerie day or night.  Playing with the curious creatures you’ll find there is definitely encouraged! A collaboration between Horny Camp and Scotch & Hop, Menagerie features Horn making classes by day with hop-scotch and a scotch bar. By night, the lounge will be active with campers chilling and grooving.
hometown: New York, Reno, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Portland, Bismark

name: Meow Now!
description: Our cat sex cutout, temporary cat-sex tattoos, megaphone ass-yelling, and meowing contests provoke the community to modestly step outside their daily comfort zone into a universe previously unknown to them. Our games and interactive pieces are designed to be tools to allow the community to radically express themselves, as fucking cats!

name: Metal Camp
description: Come by Metal Camp to see metal casting in action!

name: Midnight at the "O"asis
description: Enjoy a Medjool date (or meet a new date!) at Midnight at the “O”asis every evening starting at midnight for two hours. Other date activities each evening Monday – Friday including Date Matching, The Dating Game and more.

name: Midnight Poutine
description: Bonsoir les amis! Monday to Friday, starting at Midnight until we run out of poutine, come and sample Québec’s favourite late night snack at Midnight Poutine. Learn the awesome power of french fries, cheese curds and hot gravy. Embrace the joie de vivre of our bilingual Canadian camp.  Lâche pas la patate!

name: Midnight Ridazz
description: LA bike culture in BRC – DIY repairs, DIY destruction, and DIY F.U.N. with bicycle mechanics, builders, and ridazz. Build it, ride it, break it, fix it.

name: Milk & Honey
description: The mission of Milk & Honey is to nourish those who sleep in the dust. For six years, we’ve built a loving space for interconnection on the Playa. This year we are reborn as Milk & Honey.  We are still exactly us. Smiling faces, kind hearts. Courage and love. Dance moves so tasty you could eat them for dinner.  Faith in dust. Sustenance.

name: Mimosa Sunrise
description: Here comes the sun! Come enjoy the glorious sunrise every morning with a cold mimosa, good vibes and share your journey with a smile and a laugh at Camp Mimosa Sunrise. Don’t be surprised if we find you on the playa at sunrise with a gift for you.

name: MindShark
description: We are MindShark. We are a collective of scientists, engineers and creative souls who come to the playa to educate and entertain. We feature the Synaptic Aquarium, the 32′ Brain rising out of the playa. The fire and light within are driven by models of neural circuitry developed by the Neuroscientists and Software Engineers in our camp. We also enjoy Bocce.

name: MINSTREL CrAMP
description: Feeling the need to blow, beat or stroke on something?   Come to MINSTREL CrAMP and get your creative “musical juices” flowing.Stop in, Listen in , Join in, to some great live acoustic, jamming with our house band “THE BURNING SENSATIONS”.Check the schedule board out front to see what’s happening or sign -up for a slot to perform with your own band (or ours)It’s all good!   Listeners welcome!

name: Miso Horny
description: Miso Horny is a space to explore your silly sexual nature. Come share some hot miso soup and sake during the cold hours. Partake in our full spread of fine herbal aphrodisiacs. Participate in our workshops and body healing sessions. Get silly and sexy with our double decker stripper poles, a hot bowl of soup and a tincture of playfulness.

name: Miso Soup Camp
description: The Miso Soup Camp believes miso soup will replenish lost nutrients of burners on the playa. We are serving our AMAZING miso soup Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday from 9am-12pm.

name: Mission Country Club
description: San Francisco’s Mission district outpost on the playa. 10 Years and going strong!  Beer, cocktails and pretentious coffees served daily.  Monday night we host the 2nd Annual BRC Hip Hop Ball! Come by on Thursday at 4:20 for our 10th Annual Sangria SoundClash Party: dance to Cumbia/Salsa/Merengue while devouring 50+ gallons of Sangria.

name: Mist'R Cool Camp
description: Mist’R Cool Camp Caravansary includes a Bedouin tent with bar, pole dance and aerial acrobatics performances/lessons, The Cool Mist Experience (misting booth experience with pleasant surprises), Cool Vibes (for Goddesses) and Mist’R Cool’s Zipper (zip-line) as well as the Cool Wind Art Car.

name: Mobility Camp/BRCDoA
description: Our focus is making Burning Man accessible and possible for All. We offer wheelchair accessible Art Tours 4 times Daily to the Deep Playa Art and to the major burns as well as some Limited shuttle service and we also provide education and information on how to prepare and survive the Playa environment  and support for those with mobility equipment charging needs.

name: Mobius Heart
description: Trace a path around Mobius Heart and you’ll discover there’s actually only one side, and only one edge. It represents never-ending love, and from dusk ’til dawn brilliant LED’s will trace that path for all to see.

name: Modge Podge
description: Home of The Musical Oasis Dome and Balls in Your Mouth Boba bar.  Create & listen to music in our oasis while sipping an icy boba drink.  Please contact if interested in joining our camp.

name: Mohammeds Mini Martini + Erotica
description: After wandering with your camel searching for that Silk Road and having spent all your shekels at the Souk come by to our Bedouin tent for some of the coldest martinis and hottest erotica(written by you!) on the playa. Whether dressed in your bedouin best or in playa casual, our low tables, pillows and rugs offer a soothing  oasis. Night time we transform into “Midnight at the Moasis” for an eclectic selection of chill DJ’s, belly dancers and more.

name: MOIST!!
description: Come to MOIST!! Get plastered with plaster.

name: Monkey Business- Under new mgmt
description: Camp Monkey Business Under new management- is about inclusivity and not taking ourselves too seriously. We love our camp so much, that we often have a hard time leaving! So, we invite you in! Our Banana Beacon guides us home at night and our soft rock happy hours make you dance with a smile on your face.

name: Monkey Caravan
description: More entertaining than a caravan of monkeys!  Visit the “Dome of Destiny”:  rest your glittery friends at “Sparkle Pony Oasis” while you have an “Urban Mystic” tarot-reading. Having a bike/costume malfunction?  Stop by “Monkey Wrench Station”; trained monkeys will help you fix it or just break it altogether.  Just wanna smell good?  “Pasha Perfumes” will create a custom scent just for you!  Did we mention the Egyptian-themed wedding celebrating the union of Pyro and Coty?  Come share the love!

name: Monks of Funk, The
description: The Monks of Funk are here to guide you to nirvana through music and dance. Join us for one of our scheduled sermons or just drop in to our Dance Church for some meditation, rejuvenation, and/or hip gyration!

name: Moolandia!
description: Have you Herd about Moolandia? It’s where all the Cool Cows go to pasture. Whether you’re in the Mood for posing for a Cow Family Portrait, being stamped with a MOO quality seal, dancing in the Pulsefield, or you just gotta have more Cowbell during our interactive “More Cowbell Hour”, Moolandia has your brand of fun!

name: Moon Cheese
description: Moon Cheese serves celebrated grilled cheese sandwiches with love from 10PM to 2AM in a bright and beaming bastion of savory sustenance amidst the dusty darkness. Dine with us under the stars and stay by the fire for a while, your tired feet propped, your stomach filled, and your heart present as you gaze into the celestial worlds above and into the fire-lit faces of those around you, the true descendants of the heavens and sources of starlight on Earth.

name: MOONDRIVE
description: We are a group of people who enjoy taking things to the next level.

name: Moonrock
description: This year Moonrock merges our magic with the Black Rock City Science Center village. Come see what we’ve built!

name: MOOP Map Headquarters
description: The largest Leave No Trace event in the world. Learn how you make it happen.

name: More Carrot
description: Sure, you could live off protein bars and MREs all week if you really want to, but how about giving your dusty soul a treat? Come by the More Carrot Camp and get yourself something crunchy, cold and crisp! Yes, that stationary bike you see in the distance is equipped with a smoothie blender, so come refresh your morning. We gift fresh vegetables, fruit and smoothies at More Carrot Camp. Tues. – Fri., 8 – 10 a.m.

name: More Cowbell Saloon
description: Sit for a spell and knock off your dusty boots. We have the finest ‘aged daily’ whiskey on the playa and the most rocking tunes you can find this side of the Rockies.

name: Mosaic Lounge
description: A camp inspired by the atheistic and magical vibe of the ancient Arab country of Morocco, built utilizing the principals of sacred geometry and sustainability. Explore all the senses of your body as we take you on a magical journey into Mosaic Lounge: touch, smell, listen, dance, pose, taste, savor and embrace this rite of passage.

name: MOTHERSHIP CAMP
description: Camp Mothership is a place to come for creature comforts, voluntary captivity with rewards and punishments, professional services, and good ol’ people-to-people connectivity!

name: Motropolis
description: The Mo of Motropolis invite you to embark on the quest to explore the meaning of the being Human. Take the Hero’s Journey and enter “The MoLabyrinth of the Divine Self”.

name: Mountain Mayhem
description: Camp Mountain Mayhem provides an inviting, comfortable, interactive daytime atmosphere that is centered around community interaction in the forms of music, engaging conversation, cool refreshments, shaded lounging, dancing, and games (both board and physical). We love creating a space that encourages and promotes a range of interactivity with our shaded circle hammock lounge, slack lines, horse shoes, mini-bike races, connect four, card games, and our team of semi-professional, simi-classy, semi-world-renow

name: Mr. Peepers Closet
description: Need to spruce up your playa attire.We have wedding,prom and casual dresses,hawaiian shirts, tutu’s,tie dyes and lots lots more stuff.  We have body painting too.Let Mr. Peepers help you find your Playa persona. We gladly accept clothing donations.

name: Mt. Infinity
description: Mount Infinity is a 25 foot high climbable mountain. Faces are at varying angles, adorned with several kinds of hand and foot holds to enable participants to climb to the top of the mountain at varying levels of difficulty. Alternatively, there is an inclined path leading to the top. Once at the top, burners can look down into an Infinity Pool*.

name: Mudskippers Urban Decay Cafe
description: Mudskippers Urban Decay Cafe is a predominantly gay, yet straight-friendly jungle oasis on the Playa, serving smoothies in a sit-down cafe, and hosting a number of crafting- and service-oriented events throughout the week.

name: MultiPass
description: If you are travelling with a MultiPass, you know who you are, you interstellar silk road wanderers!  Come on by for some intergalactic caravan interactions and ice cream!

name: Museum of Transportation History
description: Come celebrate the fake history of fake transportation in a fake historical Black Rock City.  Contemplate the future by learning about the fake past–because those who ignore fake history are fake doomed to fake repeat it.  Check out our exhibits, hear fake stories and fake presentations on BRC’s fake transportation fake history, and tell us your own stories of fake transportation fake history from BRC’s fake past.

name: Music Savages
description: We classify Music Savages as a Lounge Camp. This is a hybrid between your traditional Sound Camp and Relaxation Area. By blending hand selected music provided by international talent with art, comedy, comfort, and an intense lack of drama, we create a unique oasis off the beaten path. We prefer to stay out of the limelight – making it a pleasant surprise to stubble upon if you’re exploring without a set destination.

name: Mustache Raunch
description: Imagine riding a giant black furry mustache while your friends laugh and sip iced apple pie moonshine sitting on our front porch. After your ride you decide to climb to the top of our 16 foot tower to check out Black Rock City and enjoy the view.

name: Mutant Machine Town
description: A place where mutant vehicles, bikes and pumps come together.

name: Mycodelic Forest
description: The mycodelic magic of the redwoods awaits you! We’ll be dancing and giving away free hugs 24/7. If your timing is right, our Spirit-Guide has been perfecting her awe inspiring drink concocting to quench your thirst, or our Creator of Happiness may have a story for you! Our family is full of enchantment, each with our own talents to offer, bring your hOOp, your glow and fire toys, your cup, and that smile and we’d love to move with you!

name: Mystikal Misfits, The
description: Everything your parents warned you about.

name: Mystique's Sky Lounge
description: Mystique’s Sky Lounge is an oasis for enjoying ambient electronica grooves and night time libations. Come experience the quiet side of the city from our observation deck with stunning 360 views of the playa, laser illuminated dome and comfy chill space.

name: Mystopia
description: We are a family of friends, partners, cousins, parents, children, gays, straights and every thing in between, a family of different-minded, like-hearted people who bring an oasis to the playa. At Mystopia you can enjoy our gigantic misting tent, French Toast brunch, and Reverse Cowgirl Creamery. Come play with us!

name: N-Toxicade
description: N-Toxicade is about twisting your perception of video games as an art form and how they should be played.  Giving the gift of nostalgia and distorting your favorites one game at a time.  “I haven’t played this game in forever… wait, what’s happening?”

name: Naarsførtown
description: Everything your parents warned you about.

name: Naked Heart
description: Naked Heart is a place of connection and communion that invites women to fully embody their essential feminine selves, and men to honor this powerful feminine. We offer a multitude of experiential workshops

name: Nakked Zebra Bazaar
description: We merchants have created an oasis of treasures and fineries to be shared with the weary playa pilgrim. Travelers will experience a fertile spot in the arid and dry routes of Black Rock City exchanging textiles, ideas and dreams! Come all thirsty Gypsies, and you will find rows of treasures and fulfillment of your mercantile fantasies.

name: Narwhalia
description: Narwhalia is your ocean oasis in the desert.  Swim by for narwhal education, parties, themed social gatherings, our Narwhal parade, dark mystic rituals, and special “mission assignments.”  We’ll protect you from Cthulhu.

name: Nasty's Dive Bar
description: Welcome to Nasty’s Dive Bar, home of the weird and delightfully strange. Cringe if you like it Nasty!

name: Naughty Naked Neti Camp, The
description: Rinse your dusty nose, and renew your playa experience with the ayurvedic technique of neti pots! Irrigate your sinuses and clean out all the stuff that has “accidently” gotten up there…

name: Nectar Village
description: Nectar Village is about you. It is about what you need… to survive, refuel, and revitalize. Mind, body and spirit are all served, and you’ll find the nectar you seek for any of them, in the camps at our oasis. Offerings continuously from 8am to 10pm.

name: Neighbourhood, The
description: We are a Québec/US theme camp! Together we create a communal space that celebrates the childlike mastery of the art of play! So come to The Neighborhood, where it’s Recess all day!

name: No Forks Allowed
description: No Forks Allowed, where spoons DOMINATE! Everything Spoon. Come play!

name: Nocturno Lounge
description: The Nocturno Lounge is a bar and a hookah lounge in the style of a beduin tent.

name: Nom De Plume
description: Come by for yerba mate and a variety teas from around the world. Sit down, relax, listen to some dub music and thrive.

name: North Bay Oasis
description: Is that a mirage I see off in the distance? Yes! It’s the North Bay Oasis, home to travelling North Bay Burners and anyone in need of respite from the desert heat. Come play with us, games of all shapes and sizes. Bring your own or play one of ours! Common Game Hour starts at 3pm each day. Hanker for something sassy? Strip Twister party just after sunset on Tuesday and Thursday night fits the bill.

name: Northwest Mist
description: Providing a soothing Northwest atmosphere to escape the mid-day heat with misting, music and body paint artists. Step through the Northwest Mist portal and transcend the heat of the day for a momentary refreshing encounter.

name: Nose Fish
description: Drop by Nose Fish for a cup of coffee, In the late afternoon, we’ll help you get your EL wire components working. Return at night, to experience our MEZ interactive Video Mirror. Technical advice provided on a variety of topics.

name: Nothing Butt Art
description: We supply the canvas and paint, you supply the cheeks, together, we will create nothing butt art.  Bring a T-shirt and make yourself a souvenir.

name: NoTown
description: Let our bartenders help you shed the oppressive shackles of your pants while enjoying fine Canadian Rye or Scotch whiskey. After getting liquored, head over to “Unflinching Action Hero”, where you do the Burn like an action star! Walk away from a (small) explosion, while a camera records you being too cool to flinch. See your photo post-burn on our website. Hours: Tue – Thu 4 – 6 pm (bar) and 5 – 7 pm (LtS)

name: Nuclear Dream
description: Nuclear Dream, a 25′ unexploded atomic bomb, sticks out of the playa surface. Dropped to a failed detonation, it still radiates with danger. With their city’s long history of nuclear testing, the Las Vegas community has decided they are the best candidates to lead the cleanup effort for this glowing hazard. Their ordnance removal track record so far is not great, but they are confident that this one will go exactly as planned!

name: NUTZ
description: Here comes the sun. Beautiful beats and positive vibrations overflow the Playa at Nutz Sunrise Parties. Get some.
hometown: Los Angeles, San Francisco, New York

name: NYC Container Camp
description: NYC Container Camp is the New York container filled with all the love, joy, art and creativity shipped from the other side of the country! Come get your goods, put your art and bikes together, and sit awhile for our nightly NYC Happy Hour!

name: O fish O
description: 24 hour Diner open at 1/4 too.

name: Oasis 47
description: Art School and Playground – Liberate your inner artist amidst friends.Join us to embellish bronze pendants, learn the secrets of EL wire, Burmese Massage orpartner yoga and more.Take our art car to faraway places, or find us in the dust.

name: Oasis de BURNTOWN
description: Don’t call it a comeback, we been here for years! Cross the Rope Bridge of TERROR! Get yer shopping on in the General Store. Try our new SNUFF Bar and then drop it like it’s HOT on the dance floor with resident DJ’s redBone, Ronzo and HornyCorn. Take that lasting photo by the MOLLYWOOD sign. Marvel at the engineering masterpiece and INTERACTIVE art Lo-Do or relax in the Hammock Oasis! When at Burntown, expect the unexpected! thank you, come again.

name: Oasis of LoDo
description: As the Caravansary Traveler crosses the bleak and glaring desert, they are drawn towards what appears to be date palms by a shimmering pool. Can it be real? Or are the shimmering lights just a Mirage?

name: Oasis of Missed Connections, The
description: The Oasis of Missed Connections stands to commemorate those people we have no way of contacting.  It is a sanctuary in the desert where those connected across time and space can find common exchange, where each traveler who arrives brings memories of those in their wake. At the center of the Oasis lies the Book of Missed Connections, where visitors can pen notes to those with whom they have lost touch over their journey.  This living document allows travelers to connect with their loss, share stories, refle

name: Octopus Garden
description: Come play with us at the Octopus Garden… Swing set, trampolines, art gallery, O MY! … Enjoy some Pussy Punch whilst we airbrush your body to some smooth grooves.… Though we love Pussy, we are not an orgy camp… yet

name: Ocular Cavity Apothecary
description: The Ocular Cavity Apothecary prides itself on helping with the everyday annoyances – gifts include vitamin packets, condoms and tampon kits. “Doctors” will also be onsite and roaming the playa writing “prescriptions” to assist our fellow burners with the recovery of a variety common ailments.

name: OFOSHO
description: We are a spirited group of burners who deep within our souls are artists, creators, constructors, experimenters, poets, photographers, videographers, dancers, musicians, singers, foodies, theorists, geeks, givers, lovers and above all else burners.

name: Oh No You Didn't!
description: Be our guest and get it off your chest at our playa confessional lounge, featuring libelous libations and scornful judgment from our panel of experts.  Commiserate with the best as we help keep your shame in perspective.

name: Ohm Kamp
description: Raging, Art Cars, Good Music, Beautiful People and Raging!

name: OKNOTOK
description: OKNOTOK is a small venue featuring a variety of individual performers, speakers, and activities all week.

name: OMitting Station
description: OMitting Station is a camp to a participatory art project, which is to record burners uttering the sanskrit syllable “Om” and then layer them all together to create one unified Om. We will then have it played from a large sound art car Sunday morning at the ashes of the man.

name: Oontz Pouch
description: “Caravansary is just a longer word for Oontz Pouch”–old Persian proverb. Come visit the Oontz Pouch: playing the hits since 2010!! Oontz oontz oontz!

name: Opulent Temple
description: A space for sacred dance to world class dance music

name: Orphan / Endorphin
description: The Orphanage is a group of three camps, for “loners who don’t want to be totally alone”.   All are welcome, and we attract orphans and virgins from all over the world. The main Orphan / Endorphin camp, features the Hippy Hunger Games, Orphanage Pub, Daddy Warbuck’s Cigar Lounge, Captain Ron’s Fishing Shack & Hoist, Punjab’s Snake scare and snare, Baron Oink’s Latex Vac & Pac, Asp’s Infused Vodka Saloon, Robin’s Nest, and Al Pachinko’s Time Zone Arcade.

name: Otis Spankmore
description: Come for the Spanking; stay for the cookie.

name: Otter
description: Otter is an oasis of love and conscious celebration.  This is the 19th year in a row in which we, the Otter Clan, bring our big love, laughter and fancy pants dancing to Burning Man!

name: Our House Camp
description: A colorful group of creatives who invite you into Our House to play, laugh, dress up, goof off and be yourself. Come hang out in our living room, play games on our lawn and color around with us!

name: Outpost23
description: Outpost23 is a consortium of artists, DJ’s, movers, shakers, hybrid’s and lovers. We’re here to orientate you for the first day of the rest of your life.

name: OverThePantsHandJob (OTPHJ)
description: Its never too late for the most uncomfortable sexual encounter of your life. Join us for OTPHJs, drinks, and dancing

name: Pachamama Portal
description: Pachamama Portal is A Temple of Visionary Art, Sound Healing, Light, Sacred Geometry, Vortex Based Mathematics, Orgone Energy, Solar Power, Ceremony, and Sustainability Consciousness.

name: PaintingWallOfGreenPeaceEvolving
description: Complete interactive painting on supplied canvass using supplied paint and brushes. Fun For All

name: Pair-a-dice
description: Come relax in the Oasis of Pair-a-dice! Sit at the bamboo bar where ice cold drinks and smiles are guaranteed!

name: Pancake Playhouse
description: Pancakes and soft rock: two great tastes that taste great together.

name: Paradigm
description: Paradigm seeks to find creative ways to improve the experiences of burners who are not having the time of their life already. WIth so much expectation and so many people around you having fun, sometimes anxiety and feelings of loneliness can creep in. This year, our mission is to reduce the prevalence of people ending up with a bad experience for some reason on the playa.

name: Paradise Motel
description: Paradise Motel is the most garish of roadside motels; yet the best of the “no-tel” genre, where weary travelers are invited to stop for a snow cone and enjoy some progressive beats while lounging by the “pool”.  This year’s roadside attraction: we’ve recreated the inside of the “I Dream of Jeanie” bottle where folks can chill.  Gifts of unopened bags of ice are appreciated for our snowcone stand open daily.  As always, show your junk to skip to the front!

name: Parasol Mafia
description: The Parasol Mafia is dedicated to helping you energize and sustain your body, soul, heart, and mind. Enjoy our shaded self care station with essentials like sunscreen, earplugs, chilled flavored water, electrolyte drinks, and other sustenance; groove with us at our reggae/ska happy hours; revitalize yourself in our parasol dome with guided workshops; get funky at our night time dance parties; explore and play in our solar garden; Love yourself, it’s an offer you can’t refuse.

name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
description: We heard you missed us so we’re back serving morning Bloody Mary’s and cold Tiki Punch for ages 21 and over (ID required). Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get “leid”. Come party with us for our 6th year & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly.

name: PB/EBOL Sandwich
description: PB and EBOL Sandwich is an interactive camp.  Come and enjoy our Pedal-powered bumper car track, sidle your stilted (or non stilted) self to our High Chair Stilt Bar and relax in the majesty of The Stoop in a friendly open community and a welcoming family for anyone who wants to be part of the fun.

name: Pedal Pies
description: Camp Pedal Pies is a food-experience based camp.  Our goal is to deliver multi-sensory food tastings and deliciously constructed pizza to the beautiful people of Black Rock City.

name: People of Color Camp
description: A gathering space for the melanin enriched.

name: People's Art Congress
description: People’s Art Congress, where the people and the art are one. Home of four interactive art experiences: the Crucifixion Collider and Scope of Death, Ride the Wind (a meditation experience), Virtual Helicopter Ride, and Portrait Colorization of 4′ x 6′ canvases

name: Percussiosphere
description: The percussiosphere is a collabrative space intended for burners to come and unleash their musical capacities and inspirations.  The percussiosphere utilizes recycled, re-purposed and everyday objects and uses them to create a giant interactive instrument.  This is a place to gather, create and inspire.

name: Petersons Pink Pagoda
description: Petersons Pink Pagoda and Movies

name: Petting Zoo
description: 14th Edition of Petting Zoo. Best Bar on the Playa several years running.  We welcome newcomers and hope to share the experiences of the playa all while offering an array of creative cocktails, ice-cold draft beer, imbibing beverages, and our classic and exclusive ‘pussy juice’. Daytime Bar Only. We open same time as Artica (coincidence, I think not, hint hint), Close at sunset.

name: Phage, The
description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth’s living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads — the phage are the needles of life’s tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.

name: Phasmantis Apparatus
description: As you enter our friendly fort you will find a full red round rocking chair that will take you on a up-side-down trip if you choose to do so. You will also a selection of robots that Burners can remote control to fight each other within the safely enclosed BattleBot arena. By hosting tournaments on a daily basis we hope to reach many eager minds and allow the robots and competitors to morph throughout the week. In addition to robots, our camp also features a friendly competition in a game of laser tag. We h

name: Phoenix Sanctum
description: The Phoenix Sanctum arises from the harsh dusty surface of the Deep Playa offering shelter to the weary traveler from the searing rays of the sun.  The underside of the 60-foot wingspan of the mythical flaming bird reveals three comfortable nests suspended above the playa, allowing group of lovers and friends the chance to relax and recharge while gazing up at the luxurious billowing substructure and interacting with the colorful totems that form the main support for the structure.The area directly in

name: Photocracy
description: Stop by for personalized photo shoots and some GIANT games!

name: Pickle Joint
description: Serving brisk, crisp, ice cold pickles and spicy Pickle-tinis at the original playa pickle emporium. Since 2002.

name: Pile Palace
description: Here at the Pile Palace, we provide an unbelievably lavish, Moroccan-themed environment for Burners to pile hard. This is the ultimate Pile habitat. Whether you choose dancing your heart out to our Funktion-One sound, lounging back in one of our pillow pits with a craft cocktail in hand, or taking in the unforgettable view of the Playa at the top of our Pile High Club, we want you and everything about you in a state of complete relaxation. Pile on.

name: Piñata's Revenge
description: Exacting sweet revenge on behalf of crepe-papered martyrs since 2010.

name: Pink Heart
description: Pink Heart is a loving oasis of shade, shelter, hydration (and vegan coconut ice cream if your timing is right). Re-calibrate your body, mind, and spirit in our Pink Lounge.  Connect with fellow travelers on pink fur couches while gulping chilled cucumber water and gazing upon the glorious open Playa.

name: Pink Lightning
description: Lightning fast or lightning fun – this the camp of the Burning Man 50k Ultramarathon. Runners and their friends gather at this pinklicious camp of running, relaxing, cocktails, stretching, and fun for all ultrarunners, 5k runners, and their friends.

name: Pink Mammoth
description: Pink Mammoth is a not for profit house music and creative arts collective based in San Francisco. We strive to create an environment of love and compassion, selflessness and support, health and vitality, that encourages everyone we encounter to shine and thrive.

name: Pixelstad
description: International hub of Art, Music, Performance, Yoga, and Friendship!

name: Planet Earth
description: Black Rock City’s 80s Nightclub on the playa, open every night from 6pm-4am.

name: Planetarium Aquarium!
description: Welcome to the Planetarium Aquarium – where the two frontiers of mankind – space and the deep sea – come together on the playa! Stop in to pass through the medium of the unknown and find nourishing refreshments and surprises.

name: Platypus & the band
description: BLACK ROCK AND ROLL!!! Come play electric guitars, organs, banjos, pianos, sing, speak your mind. The playa wants to hear your beautiful sound. 6PM everyday at 6&F.

name: Playa Bike Repair
description: “Playa Bike Repair” is both a service and a theme camp. ON-Playa: We run a “Bike Lounge,” with a bar, mist, music, shade, and tools. Mechanics drop in. Friendly, nurturing, and supportive, they will gladly help you fix your bike! Last year, we helped over 3000 people fix their bikes! PRE-Playa, we offer bike rentals and transport; your support funds Playa Bike Repair.  Volunteers, mechanics, and new camp members wanted.

name: Playa Choir Camp
description: Playa choir welcomes all burners to come and participate in a fun 4 part harmony of classic gospel and spiritual songs. Rehearsals are Tuesday to Saturday at 11 AM. To listen, Please join us for the Sunday SUNRISE Performance at the Temple, or the Full choir service at 11 AM at our camp. Singers of all skill levels, and persuasions are welcome 🙂 Also looking for Musicians! Contact maids_service@yahoo.com for more information or swing by our camp on the playa!

name: Playa Compass Kiosk for Playa Texting
description: The Playa Compass Kiosk is a hotspot for using the web-based Playa Text service, allowing interested parties to message to each other while on the Playa.  While any mobile phone with a web browser can send and receive messages to other burners, the system is best accessed through the Playa Compass Android App, which can be downloaded either in advance from Google Play, or on the playa from the Kiosk.  The Playa Text message system does not extend beyond the playa.  It is for use while on the playa for one b

name: Playa Glass
description: Every wonder what playa dust is made of? Stop by and use one of ourfresnel lenses to melt playa in to glass you can take home on a wearablependant. We’ll provide the welding goggles and jewelry making stations.You’ll need to find your own playa dust.

name: Playa Info
description: At Playa Info you’ll find:° Oracles who will help answer any questions with theirprofound wisdom, and help you locate just about anything you need within the vast resources of Black Rock City° Directory computers to: register yourself and your camp; find friends’ and theme camps; browse or add events and art; find or offer rideshares; send and view messages° Lost & Found

name: Playa Jazz Cafe
description: Playa Jazz Cafe hosts nightly jazz jam sessions, afternoon educational Jazz Workshops, in a comfortable lounge dome with coffee bar.
hometown: San Francisco, San Jose, Santa Cruz

name: Playa Missed Connections
description: Playa Missed Connections is serendipity’s little helper!  At the Playa Missed Connections kiosk you can search missed connections that have happened on the playa, write your own, or reply to someone else’s and watch it all be displayed.  Our missed connections are the art! All missed connections will become part of an Infinity Archive available online year round. “We love you but we didn’t get to meet you”

name: Playa Name Help
description: PLAYA NAME HELP provides meaningful playa names for Black Rock City citizens. Sign up to name or just show up to name or be named– the playa provides!

name: Playa Surfers
description: SURF THE PLAYA!  PLAYA SURFERS make it possible with motorized surfboards designed for surfing the playa. Come by for a ride or hang out with us in our shaded tiki lounge. We also provide you with TIKI ISLAND! A three level high and 50ft. wide mutant vehicle that literally is a moving oasis/dance floor!

name: PLAYA-DENITY
description: You don’t want to miss this ONE!! Stop by and get a personally customized professional plastic photo Black Rock City identity badge and lanyard. A must for the first time burner or tried and true veterans (we love you!) It’s a helpful way to find your camp and also a great memento of your 2014 Burn

name: PlayAground
description: An interactive Playground will be available 24/7. With a selection of challenging swings including a 12′ Circular spinning swing, the death swing aka tall swing, group therapy swing, saddle swing, ying yang swing, and oh so many more swings. Can you stay on?

name: Playaground
description: Playaground is a play ground on the playa with 2 bowling lanes, a horse shoes (or corn hole) and a mini golf.

name: PlayaNauts
description: We are the PlayaNauts! Explorers of the Playa. We’ve collected interactive games from around the globe.Come try our custom giant Djenga and Volley ball-sized Beirut game or maybe come chill in our 1500sf of shade while you play D-20 and other card and dice-based drinking games (we I.D.) Stop by the Bar to try our Playanaut Punch, and don’t forget to Check out our Event schedule for Party, Tournament and Flash-Bar times.

name: Playasophy Camp
description: Welcome to Playasophy, where the most valuable thing you have to trade are your ideas. Sit around a hookah, enjoy a beverage and share your thoughts with both our members and fellow travellers! Come by in the evenings to enjoy the splendor of the Wonderdome, a fully controllable immersive light display. We hope to see you soon!

name: PlayaWaste Raiders
description: PWR features a visually appealing frontage reminiscent of an apocalyptic wasteland outpost. A return of our grisly street games, including zombie head bowling, pin the knife on the mutant, baby head chunking, radiation aversion therapy, stupid human tricks for stupid prizes and of course, RAIDERBALL!

name: PlayCreate
description: Body painting, games and photos daily. Join us on a play date to create your own body art with our paint or let the camp choose a theme for you if you dare. Take some photos in our photo booth, then play the games in your new skin.

name: Playfully Yours
description: Playfully Yours is a well equipped dungeon play area for beginners to advanced players with focus on the beginners and curious as we provide a variety of toys such as floogers, paddles, feathers, crops, pinwheels, electrical play, and much more for them to experience and use. We offer daily scheduled classes with demonstrations and participation, as well as, individual instruction where we can show you the proper use of the equipment and toys or help in facilitating your play.

name: PlayGround Experience
description: ‘PlayGround’ –  because most good games are dangerous and many are against the law…Older children play vigorous games and must have places especially set aside for them.Come to the PlayGround Experience.  Play is a fundamental need.

name: Plays Well With Others
description: Plays Well With Others offers Burners the Lavender Hand Wash, Recycled Mobiles, and Urban Slippage from Wednesday to Friday from 3:00 to 6:00. We will host a Caravansary cocktail and appetizer party from 6:00 to9:00 on Friday night.

name: PO9
description: We connect you with the world; USPS to the Playa, Playa to any international address, WiFi, and friendly (and not-so-friendly) posties: stand in line, and fill out your form… in triplicate… with crayon.

name: Polaris
description: Polaris of Black Rock City casts shadows of intrigue upon the surface of the playa surrounding it. This mosaic of luminance attracts curious pilgrims, to discover a spectrum of rainbow beams hidden within the structure. Polaris shall demonstrate to the viewer, the ubiquitous influence of light in our everyday lives.

name: Polegasm!
description: Come over to our exclusive facility. We provide the best equipment and instruction there is for creative essence, existential growth, and Polegasms!

name: Poles N' Holes
description: Come learn some pole dancing from Kefff and Fluffer or show off your skills on any one of our ten master shafts. Spectators also welcome to just hang out while enjoying a libation and the show.

name: Pollen Nation
description: BZZ BZZZZZZZZ!  Pollen Nation invites you to and your hive to come play with us!  Unleash the inner bee.

name: Pollination
description: On Playa Wedding Chapel.  Cross pollinate in our full service outdoor chapel; our take, on your beliefs.

name: PolyParadise
description: PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from  ‘2:00 – 10:00’  for the past 15 years.We are a group of Polyamorists seeking to live our dreams, and this camp is one manifestation of that. Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners.Join us in a variety of events – Come in from the sun….take a load off your feet…

name: Pongo Lounge
description: Pongo Lounge is a games oriented, interactive, music based theme camp which offers LED & black light ping-pong, LED foosball, giant Jenga, and board games in a comfortable lounge setting.  Come play a game, have a cocktail, listen or dance to sweet electronic beats and commune with some great folks.

name: Pookah Lounge
description: Pookah Lounge!!!!  Hookah-sake-bacon pairing; ballroom- polka-belly dancing; daytime/late-night Bar and Chill.

name: Porch Times
description: Enjoy southern hospitality as a desert transplant on our front porch.

name: Porn and Donuts
description: Get your daily dose of porn, while enjoying fresh donuts on the Playa!

name: PORTSIDE LOCOS
description: The Portside Locos, a gaggle of middle eastern drummers, will be caravanning from the high mountains of Santa Fe to drum down the sun and drum up some yum. An oasis of rest for desert travelers, pull your caravan over and top off your camel at our hydration station. Enjoy our hospitality with a sunset drum sessions, a good hug in the Hug Shack, and a cool sip of iced water.

name: Possible Project, The
description: Stop by the Possible Project to rehydrate at our PhOasis, and travel theSilk Road in just a few steps around camp.  From Antioch to Xi’an,transport yourself to distant lands in the blink of an eye, and a snap ofan instant photograph, a gift from us to you.

name: Post Nuclear Family
description: `,:.’-,’`.get a byte of bits at PNF online.`,’;.`,:.-;`.mutants are welcome.`,’;.,`”,
hometown: Generally L.A., but S.C., Seattle, and NOLA too

name: Post Office (Center Camp)
description: The Post Office in Center Camp is back and friendlier than ever! We provide postcards and stamps, make deliveries to camps, allow you to settle your disputes in our “Drama Court” and help you with your random, unexpected challenge involving bureaucracies in the default world.  Open 10 AM – 10 PM (and often earlier/later!)

name: Practice Poi/Cotton Candy Camp
description: We’re a fun oasis with cotton candy!!!

name: PRED: Cult of the Wheel
description: Come join us for Porta-Potty-Party confessions! Megaphones provided.

name: Present and Positive
description: Present and Positive is dedicated to helping ourselves and others remain clear, healthy, and positive in our thoughts, words, and actions. We offer a variety of ways to explore greater awareness and positivity in the expansive environment of Burning Man to apply to our habitual lifestyles.

name: Present Camp
description: Be here now.

name: Preservation Society
description: An oasis amidst ephemeral modernity; shelter from progress, efficiency and cruel indifference. As the Kinks aptly put it, “God save little shops, china cups and virginity.”

name: Pretentious Fox
description: A very international and inter-state gathering of pretentious foxes and other eclectic and venerable animals! We provide an essential neighborhood BAR with good MUSIC, visitor bar-top ART, a STAGE with instruments for OPEN-MICS, and several EVENTS including RUSSIAN kitsch night with pel’meni!

name: Pretty Pickle Camp
description: A relaxed outpost on the road to nowhere featuring cold pickle service to passers by in the afternoon. Also offering hand-crafted pickle warmers for the more adventurous among our population to adorn their naked pickles.

name: Primate Playground
description: Circle your ‘vans and get some Monkey Lovin’ at the Primate Playground. We have Sinatra, Spamtinis, Viking Ice Hugs, 80’s Dance, Yoga and other events. OR come chill on our shady luscious astro-grass oasis. Have you found your Sizzleville?

name: Prismaticamp
description: A community of LED light artists. Join us each night at dusk for prismatic reception, followed by mobile community light show on the night Playa.

name: Project Flashlight
description: Project flashlight is about interactive light at a grand scale!The joy of light. Pure, incredibly bright white beams, contrasts with the night sky, scale across the open playa, interaction of beams, light in motion, illuminating the mountains, visible from space.

name: Prometheatrics
description: Bringing the Gift of Fire to Humankind since the Dawn of Time! Come experience the fully immersive Tesseract Mirror Box (Put on the rainbow glasses and be dazzled by an infinity of strobelights!), enjoy edifying Flow Temple workshops during the day; then join us for full-on fantabulous fireshows at dusk and dawn.

name: Pussy Day Spa
description: Come on by and wax philosophical with new and old friends.  We will amuse, entertain, exhilarate, and compliment your shoes.  We are the perfect place for your pussy to visit to relax, refresh, and rejuvenate.

name: Pyschic Taxi
description: Psychic Taxi provides random service, adventures, and comfort for the wide eyed and eager. The Lucky few get tours to kool-town.

name: Que Viva! Camp
description: Migration is Beautiful!  A mix of Carnaval and Mardi Gras, Que Viva!
