(Celebrate Life!) camp will roll with Latino and Cajun music, migration stories, and butterflies, symbols of metamorphosis. Come paint your wings to wear around the playa!  Tell your migration story in our video photo booth!  If you do, you’ll get your BRC “permanant residency” green card.  Check What, Where, When for wing-making times.  No art experience necessary.

name: Queen and Pawn
description: Queen and Pawn is an abstract, organically shaped, and brightly colored interactive sculpture with a visual reference to two chess pieces. Made of composite materials and fiberglass, it is light and durable yet suitable for climbing. Queen (10′ high) and Pawn (8′ high) are a conceptual representation of a new visual form. It’s a search for the roots of form and its basic elements, which can combine to create any complex shape.

name: Quixotes Cabaret Club and Bar
description: Quixotes’ returns  in 2014 to embrace the wonder of cabaret whilst tipping our hat to Caravansary by Borrowing a time travellers box as our venue – The T.A.R.D.IS!. Our gift to the desert is a Cabaret Club and Bar with an open mic Cabaret Stage where you can come and realise your Cabaret fantasies, join us for a tasty cold beverage and enjoy the show either as a performer or expectant traveller just arrived to be awed by our performers.

name: Rack em Up!
description: Bringing pool tables and moonshine to the playa! Stop by and play with our balls!!!

name: Radio Electra
description: Radio Electra 89.9 FM. We put the ROCK in Black Rock City! Offering an eclectic array of music, mayhem commentary and art. Camps, villages, and artists wishing to make radio announcements about events stop in or contact us by email prior to the event. Please feel free to email us or drop off any prerecorded announcements you may have. You can even come in for an interview. We want to hear from you about what you do at Burning Man.

name: Radio Free Burning Man
description: Celebrating our 20th anniversary! Join us on our vast veranda; come inside and be on the radio.  Relax in our Touch Me Now chill space.  RFBM is Burning Man’s original radio station.

name: Rainbow and Tetanus Society, The
description: The Black Rock City Rainbow and Tetanus SocietyThe BRC R.A.T.S. brings you the finest rainbows, and the strongest tetanus inside or outside of the trash fence.

name: Rainbow Jellies
description: The Rainbow Jellies is composed of several neon colored floating jellyfish, with light and cloth tentacles for people to walk through as well as view. Their aquatic nature and the surreal colors contrast the earth tones and blue sky during the day and glow (literally, with LED lighting) during the night, offering both a striking view as well as a tactile experience.

name: Raised by Wolves
description: Raised By Wolves is a transcontinental pack of artists, healers, performers, and builders who are inspired and impassioned by the classic story of feral children and their wolf pack families. Each year we bring our untamed energy to the Black Rock desert through play, performance and art. Our gifts this year include BARmag Cafe, where you can get hot coffee every morning, and Ziza the Roving Tea Truck. We’ll also host a yoga class every morning in our Wolf Den.

name: Random Pants Camp
description: Are you too big for your britches or is your cod-piece not sitting right?  Stop by Random Pants get yourself a new look (on the lower half, at least).  From slacks to gators,  we’ve got you covered.

name: Ranger Headquarters
description: Ranger HQ

name: Ranger Outpost Berlin
description: Ranger Outpost Berlin

name: Ranger Outpost Tokyo
description: Ranger Outpost

name: Rat Camp
description: Seduce and Destroy!(We’re kind of a big deal)

name: Recess
description: A home base for us, a home away from home for you.  Recess is a place where burners can come take a load off, grab a refreshment and grab some shade. Jump the Double Dutch, Slap the Tether Ball, join a healthy game of Wolves and Bunnies, get some tips on Fire Spinning. Ring the bell, it’s time for Recess!

name: Recess-Reunion
description: Calling all Lovers, Rock-stars, Scholars, the Opulent and the Mystics: our belief is that we Share, we Learn; we Learn, we Grow —  we Grow — we Evolve.  Come check out our daily classes, one-of-a-kind art and experiences, our legendary lounge and parties, and this year’s host of TEDxBlackRockCity.

name: Recycle Camp
description: Black Rock City Recycle Camp!!! We are located in Center Camp at 6:00, directly behind the Cafe. Camp is open and ready to accept your cans Monday through Sunday, 9am to 5pm. Bring your clean, separated aluminum cans only. We don’t accept any other recyclables, you must pack them out. And we definitely don’t want your trash. All proceeds from the aluminum are donated to the Gerlach K-12 School in Gerlach, NV. Come join in the fun..!

name: Red Bar
description: Red Bar, an oasis popping out of the desert, red and glowing at night, invites weary travelers to float through our halls to find the inner sanctum of libations and live music at the piano.  Sit down and play, or listen and sing.  Bring your instruments and see what develops.  We are always open and will have daily drink specials, games and entertainment.  Nooks to create art, walls to hang it on.

name: Red Lightning
description: Arrow to EvolutionRed Lightning was born out of a desire to bring balance and healing between the masculine and feminine on Earth as a first step towards a cosmic consciousness.  To learn more about who we are, what we do and what we are bringing to the Playa, visit us at www.redlightning.orgSee you in the Dust!

name: RedRubberTattoo
description: RedRubberTattoo re-envisions your personal topography by using any number of our hundreds of rubber stamp imprints.  You will receive personal attention, careful consultation and professional application.

name: Reincarnation Location
description: Be reborn into the world of the Playa after confession your sins (from the default world), spinning the Wheel of Penance, serving your G, R or NC-17 rated penance – then being reborn by crawling through a 6′ vagina, to then be spanked and given a rebirth certificate.

name: Rejuvenation
description: Rejuvenation open every morning giving away coconut water, vitamins and supplements to fix you up after last night or set you up right for the day to come.

name: Reno Housewives
description: Helping costume BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US — From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered.

name: Reno Nation
description: Reno Nation hopes to bring aspects, of our life in Reno, out to the BRC, as well as bringing back experiences, from the the playa, back home to Reno. Feel free to follow our instagram to see progress and ideas as it all comes together.

name: Retrofrolic
description: Retrofrolic is an adult oriented camp of games with prizes, a fully equipped BDSM dungeon and serving mead. We offer sensual exercises of pain and pleasure with music, massage and masochism.  Certifying cocksuckers is our claim to fame.

name: Reverbia
description: Reverbia- Known as the “Portal of Live Music at Burning Man”, offering Live Music programming 16 hours a day/night including: Live Music Yoga in the Morning, Live Dance Workshops, Song, Dust, Sing (Black Rock City’s popular singer/songwriter showcase and open mic), our Concert in the Shade Series, Black Rock Nights (featuring festival caliber bands), and After hours Jam and Chai.  Come Chill, Vibe, Dance, and Celebrate Live Music on the Playa!  www.facebook.com/Reverbia

name: Reverse Cowgirl Creamery, The
description: Through the technology of freezers and generators, we give ice cold and hot treats to those who need it (and those who just want it). By day, you can see our covered wagon from afar as you come closer to savoring the satisfaction that only a cold popsicle or ice cream treat can give on a hot day. By night, let our fully interactive LED sculpture beckon you closer to hot coffee, tea and tales of the frontier around our comfortable lounge.

name: Revolution Camp
description: The Caravansary of Humanity has come to a crossroads – darkness and destruction, or radical change. Nothing less than Revolution is needed for a better world.

name: RhythmWave
description: RhythmWave theme camp is proud to bring conscious dance and movement to Black Rock City for our 8th straight year. Several times every day, we offer facilitated ecstatic dance (including 5Rhythms, Soul Motion, and Dancing Freedom), contact improv, sitting meditation, drumming, yoga, and more. All on our unique, covered bamboo dance floor!All citizens of Black Rock City are invited and welcome to join in the experience of RhythmWave!

name: Risa
description: RISA is a resort planet, renowned for its breezes, beaches and friendly atmosphere. Our main attraction at RISA during the afternoon is our Snow Cones and Deep Fried Oreo Cookies.  Evening Mutant Vehicle rides on the Mistress Amedee and the Dancing Peacock.

name: Rising Arms, The
description: Your friendly, local, international watering hole and second home on the playa returns for a fifth year. Stop by to wet your whistle, just take care not to trip over folks passed out on the floor. If you want a quiet pint be sure to pop in before sunset, after which it gets slightly raucous.  If you’ve had enough of bars then give a pub a go. Stop by for much libations and games including, new for 2014… Battle Shots.

name: ROASTED
description: Come join us as we play host to evening socials featuring drip coffee and chai tea – ensuring that participants are properly caffeinated before their night-time activities. Our homegrown nonsensical storytelling will surely entertain as we share our unique blend of art with you.

name: Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux
description: Come and enjoy an afternoon cup of Joe, creating your own special Playa blend from our various international beans.  And, if you’d like, join us in roasting your own coffee beans, right on the Playa.
hometown: Ojai, CA, Auburn, CA and Spokane, WA.

name: Rock Star (Camp Rock Star)
description: Camp Rock Star hosts multimedia rock concerts every evening, complete with a magical stage, psychedelic lighting, story-telling video projections, and, of course, incredible musicians and bands. Our goal is to infuse the Playa with the incomparable energy of the live concert experience, and inspire other burners to take the stage.

name: RockStar Orphans
description: RockStar Orphans is a small camp that hails from all over the Western US. We are honored to provide diverse activities to BRC residents this year such as spa treatments, poi and beatboxing seminars, our toe-tapping Electric Loveseat, and tons more fun in the works, so drop by!

name: Rogue Nation Village
description: Rogue Nation Village is the home of several Pacific NW camps, including Seaweed, Kreme Burners and Hooker Support Camp.

name: Romp!
description: Romp! Hammock Haven and Glow Bar features plenty of outdoor hammock options for your lounging needs – shaded by day but furry and warm at night :).  Step inside our cooled tent and enjoy a sea of paisley pillows.  Then each night come glow as our black lights blaze with plenty of (totally random) music and drinks to romp the night away!

name: Root Society
description: Root Society wants you to dance to great music, great DJ’s  and celebrate self expression and the roots of friendships.

name: Rootpile
description: Rootpile themecamp is your place to hear great live Bluegrass music and eat awesome southern BarBQ and is also home to the Rootpile Sybian Dome for the ladies. We are a camp made up of world class acoustic musicians who have performed in over 50 countries with over 100 years of professional performance experience and award winning cooks.

name: Rose Garden
description: Rosaceae

name: Royal Safarians
description: We’re all on a safari and we’re doing it royally! Royal Safarians are on an expedition of edifying expression. We’re blazing a trail through writing and sharing. We’re documenting the journey. Stop by and share your thoughts and experiences on our typewriters. Have some tea. Sit in on a writing seminar. You are royalty! Join the safari!

name: Run Free Camp
description: Run Free is a clean and sober Burning Man camp for folks whose common goal is enlargement of spiritual life through new adventures in being human and living life to the fullest. We are an integrated group: gay, straight, trans, singles and couples.  We are all committed to remaining clean and sober for the duration of the event and maintaining a clean and sober camp space.

name: Russian Roulette
description: Russian Roulette? Why the heck NOTsky?We will turn people in to Russians and turn Russians in to people.Come play with us.

name: S'mores N Amour
description: S’MORES !!! We bring this camping favorite to the playa.   We provide everything for all ages to enjoy this sweet treat. Marshmallows will be roasted! S’MORES at sundown Monday through Thursday!

name: Sacred Cow
description: Desert wanderer! Join the mystical culinary odyssey of the Sacred Cow as we romp through BRC on the Sacred Cow Hajj rooftop restaurant- lounge-mutant vehicle! Catch the Hajj spouting delectable smells down your neighborhood street, or toss fantastically fabricated food stuffs to the land locked participants below: such technological wonders of flavor they have never experienced. Sunset dinner cruise art tours. Late night playa picnics. Moonlit Temple Feasts. We always need kitchen help!

name: Sacred Spaces Village
description: We are a diverse inter-faith spiritual community of artists, activists, and mystics seeking to improve the collective intelligence of humanity. We provide grounded, heart-centered sacred spaces for individuals to heal, learn/teach, create art, make music, and transform themselves and the world. Water the Roots!

name: Sacred Zen Garden
description: Come to the Sacred Zen Garden, a Zen Garden where you can relax , replenish your energy with our fresh squeezed juices and healthy beverages, cool off your burn with our misting System, soothing music and visionary art.

name: Saints and Sinners
description: Saints and Sinners is a collection of peeps- mainly from N. California.  We enjoy conducting sensual workshops for couples and plan a 3rd year of naked body painting in deep playa with formations and photography – called Dust to Dust.  This year will also feature a Stripper Workshop, complete with Stripper Pole.

name: Sake To Me
description: Sake To Me is your neighborhood sake bar! Stop by for a comfortable shady pitstop, some great chilled sake, and test your skills at a giant version of Jenga.

name: Sakenoma
description: Come enjoy live music and a cold Sake all day everyday! From 11am-sunset, and Thursday and Friday night as well!

name: Salon 7  (with Do More Now)
description: Salon 7 is a mixture of artists, yogis, DJ’s and explorers coming together from all over the world. Come join us daily for 10-12 yoga and 6-10 sunset parties with drinks, DJ’s, dancing, shenanigans under our beautiful carpeted shade structure.

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, and interaction with other beings. We invite the Burning Man community to visit our friendly, comfy quadruple Do-Me Domes any time, stop by for a dance at our Funk Royale Cordial, enjoy one of our Healing Faire offering massage, readings, or relationship counseling, and relax to the sounds of Black Rock Chamber Music.  Also, come feed your power hungry devices and fill depleted batteries at our solar charging station!

name: Salty Jacks
description: We are salty, nautical, and play daytime R&B at home base….. and rove in Gracie-Pleasure-Pier by night for the best view of the playa.

name: Scarbutt's Coffee
description: Scarbutt’s Coffee open from 9am -1pm Tuesday – Friday.Come enjoy a hot or Iced coffee.

name: Scatter Landing
description: Go ape shit at Scatter Landing!

name: School of Consensual Kink
description: All the classes you wish were available when you were in school — Black Rock School of Consensual Kink (S.O.C.K.) offers a variety of classes and BDSM tastings by our faculty of trained kinksters. The kink curious of all genders, orientations, and identities (18+) are welcome, see you in class!

name: Scotch & Hop
description: Too long has “hop” been in front of “scotch”! Come and Enjoy some “Scotch” with your hop! A playground for adults featuring, what else but hopscotch, and maybe a couple of other games. A relatively simple child’s game kicked up a notch! Prizes include, Scotch!
hometown: New York, Reno, Portland, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Bismark

name: Scrabble Camp
description: Come play Scrabble on a big board.

name: SEAWEED
description: SEAWEED is a large-scale artistic collaboration ignited by a circle of tenacious spirits in pursuit of a common vision. We like to build big art, let people play with it for a while and then burn it.

name: Secret Gentlemen
description: A place full of secrets for the curious.  A device to help you manifest your dreams, and a device that allows you to see sound.  A warm fire to stand beside at night and a gentlemanly tie to take with you when you go.

name: Secret Passage Camp
description: A small camp dedicated to the secrets we all carry within us, helping share ourselves with each other, with the help of a bit of booze, a place to hangout, a photobooth, and more.

name: Secret Trading Post
description: The Secret Trading Post fosters liberation from the weight of the past. It is a welcoming outpost and non-judgmental space for those who have secrets that they would like to let go. Trade anonymously, trade with a friend or stranger, or share on the walls. Any which way you choose to go, don’t look back.

name: Seeds of Burning Man
description: My art consists of nine 3×6 panels.  Each panel has 18 8×10 photos on each side.  These panels displayed in a 90 degree zig zag pattern suspended on metal poles. The 320 photos, taken from Orange Co. to San Fransisco. At music festivals, anti war rallies, and “Happenings”. Some might say they are pictures of “hippies”, but they are far more than that.  They are all types of people coming together because they share primary principals they felt were important to share and stand for.  Such as music, dance, ar

name: Semper Ardens
description: Semper Ardens ~ Always BurningJoin us for a moment or two & tell us your Burning Man story, We are a chill space to relax and hear tales and adventures from past, present & future Burning Man events.  Join us nightly at sunset for a beverage & share your burn!

name: Sensual Pleasures (The Camp for)
description: The Camp for Sensual Pleasures is dedicated to providing pleasure for women.We offer hair washing and massage by Pope DB, and the well-known Orgasamator Experience is back, enhanced to give women an even more intensely enjoyable experience, all in an environment that’s safe, comfortable & private.

name: Seraphim
description: Seraphim is a collection of friends and dancers who seek to brighten the days of the our playa-mates. Stop by our Luxarium, which provides a place of solace and loveliness complete with sound-responsive LED ceiling or the Compliment Booth, a simple, but powerful, expression of our love for people and for life.

name: SERENDIPITEA
description: SERENDIPITEA, meanwhile let’s have a sip of Tea.

name: Serenity Giant Game Camp
description: Serenity Giant Game Camp is back this year with more games and new events each day. Hang out and enjoy the games you played as a kid. Picture a giant size Connect 4, Jenga, Backgammon  or a Checker Board, you have to walk on and move your pieces. No more searching for people who aren’t embarrassed to play kids games. Check calendar for the events. Watch for the Mutant Vehicle pulling a Giant Connect 4

name: Serenity Now
description: The chillest coffee house on the playa, and the most welcoming burners you’ll ever meet. Serenity Now has coffee in the morning and whiskey at night to keep you burning strong!

name: Sexagon
description: Swing by our singular six-sided living room, climb 20feet to our 60 degrees of BRC  Observation Deck, 20 feet high (seems higher). The Lingerie Lounge staff will hook you up with a new look from our vast trove of sweet wearables that’s sure to please, zip thru the PlayaPilot? bikeway to earn your Official Pilot’s License, and hoopdance extroverts of all levels welcome, we have extra hoops for you.

name: Sextant Camp
description: Sextant Camp is all about high-energy fun. Ascend the Tower above our Dome all the way to the 52’ Crow’s Nest if you dare, but don’t forget to have a drink in Vünderbar, bar in ze sky! Ride the Zip Line to our Tesla Coil towers and walk through the Faraday Tunnel to get under the sparks. For those in need of R&R, crash out in the dome lounge as long as you like and enjoy the pretty lights.

name: Shady Lady Saloon
description: A Western/Burlesque themed camp serving bourbon flights and bourbon inspired cocktails. Come learn about the history of bourbon, our National Spirit! Hang out with our friendly bartenders at our Happy Hour daily at 4pm. After you grab a beverage and learn about the greatest spirit ever made, pick up a hoop or some poi and spin in our play area or grab a seat and just relax.

name: Shady Motherfaffers
description: Get out of the sun! An afternoon shade oasis and lounge with sexy beats, honey bar, and the chillest vibes of the decade.

name: Shady Village
description: Shadyvil evolves again and becomes Shady Village

name: Shamandome Camp
description: Shamandome Camp guides you to FIND YOUR POWER ANIMAL. Our healer shamanistas move you to the first day of the rest of your life, reconnection, transformation.

name: Shangri-Lawless
description: A forgotten paradise to soothe the wary adventurer, or a lawless land of risk & reward? We are both.  A yin and a yang.  An amalgamation of two elements, each playing off the other.  Village now featuring prodigal Wet Dreams and Liminal Spaces!

name: ShangriLa
description: When you enter Burning Man – you are in an earthly paradise of unbelievable possibilities ~ Welcome to ShangriLa! Our international group is looking very much forward to create an ambiance where people can spend the entire day hanging out with daily yoga classes, hand-jobs, bike repair, wine tasting and the Shangri-Lounge. We will be ShangriLa for you and your playa friends!

name: Sharkey's Bar and Lounge
description: The Preferable Party Past the Porta-Potties on the Pre-Playa Plaza Playground!  A Caribbean-style daytime bar and lounge with a wonder daily libation and shaded, lively lounge.  Open when the first drink is poured, and closed after the last is served!
hometown: San Francisco, Los Angeles, Colorado and Europe

name: Shenanstigators
description: Welcome to the Shenanstigator’s Safety Third Playground: Jump, Play and be Safe!

name: Shibumi
description: Shibumi – n. – (shi-boo-mee)1. A rare kind of personal excellence.2. A state of effortless perfection.

name: SHIFT
description: SHIFT… the paradigm and create your new reality.

name: Shiny Donkeys, The
description: The Shiny Donkeys welcome you to join them for yoga and swingset parties.  Here you will be greeted by a plethora of new sweaty burners that may lack playa experience, but make up for it with wicked awesome music and a desire to enrichen your burning experience through laughter and cocktails….but mostly cocktails.

name: ShipFam
description: ShipFam and friends!

name: Shoetopia
description: Welcome to Shoetopia-where anything is possible if you have the right shoes!

name: SHOGYO MUJO
description: Shogyo Mujo is a 30′ high, geodesic, skull which will be 3-D projection mapped on all sides via 4 projectors, and then burned. During the day, it will be a beautiful faceted sculpture, covered in muslin…a blank canvas if you will. By night, the skull becomes a vehicle for experiencing and channeling our visions into the physical world. 360-degree projections animate the skull, symbolizing our hopes, dreams, imagination, and vision – our spiritual connection to the universe that defines us as human beings. N

name: Short Stack & Om Skillet
description: Short Stack & Om Skillet bring you a chill park vibe and gourmet grilled cheese in the desert. Join us around noon daily to lounge on our lawn with sandwich service and some groovy tunes. Tuesday afternoon is the Tutu Tuesday dance party!

name: Shots for Shocks
description: An electrical tasting bar: we shock you with a cattle prod, you get a shot!

name: ShotSki Wanderlust
description: Welcome to Camp ShotSki Wanderlust for a bit of the Sierra’s on the Playa. Ski’s, Boards and of course shots from the bar including a ChairLift for relaxation! Come visit us!

name: Show Us Your Pits
description: Come have your pits appreciated. Stop by for our signature cocktail, The Rye of the Tiger on Tuesday at 6.

name: Shwartown
description: We don’t f@#$ around.  Come join us for kombucha!

name: Siberian Electric Company
description: Vodka Drinks and Radiation Leaks. Come buy and get contaminated in our pre-Putin Soviet era somewhat leaky nuclear reactor.

name: Sidekick Camp
description: Sidekick camp is on the lookout for all would be scamps, scallywags, and rapscallion who are on the search for adventure. Come grab a helpful cohort to aid in your journey or hang out and get certified as a bonafide sidekick yourself!

name: Sideshow!
description: Caravan of Freaks and Oddities- at Illumination Village offers amazing acts and baffling exhibits the weird and wondrous in the tradition of the classic American sideshow. It’s ALL ON THE INSIDE!

name: Silicon Village
description: Visit Silicon Village for a Caravansary experience! Zip down our Zip Line, cool down in our misting booth and shade structures, witness aerial acrobatics and live stage acts. Hang out in our Bedouin bar, have your fortune read, get airbrush heart tattoos, cookies and spankings, stay hydrated with coffee, tea and honey water, be inspired by our lazer dome, art and happy hugs! We love to meet new people! We’ll be hosting a special Thursday night tour of Silicon Village!

name: Silk Route Shoe Shine Stand
description: The Silk Route Shoe Shine Stand is the perfect respite for the travel weary, the adventurous, the dusty and the persnickety. A ludicrous exercise in futility perhaps? Or maybe simply a meditation on just letting go? Everything is temporary on the playa, everything is beautiful, even if just for a few seconds until the dust blows up again and hides once more that oh-so perfect shine.

name: Silly Nerdy Activities Playground
description: Camp SNAP (Silly Nerdy Activity Playground) will house a giant game zone with board games to life sized game. We want to help you start your morning with a SNAP and will be gifting the Playa with coffee and tea every morning Monday through Sunday 8am-11am. The shaded lounges would stay open during all the daylight hours. I promise I will make the open game space available 24hours to the Playa and host soccer/futbol MWF at 10am.

name: Silt Harbor
description: Engage in life-changing conversation, join our morning yoga class or come along on our hippy fishing tours around the playa in the Lady of Lahontan and Playa Predator mutant vehicles…  Be on the look-out for our pirate raids as we seek to radically include you in our p’arrrlor discussions…

name: Sin City
description: Sin City is a place where freedom of expression is embraced  and “What happens in Sin City stays in Sin City.” There is always something happening and there are many things to see and do at the Party Naked Tiki Bar, BRC Airbrush, Sin City Day Spa, Sin City Costume Exchange, Sin City Art Center, Sin City Volleyball, photo opportunities and much more.

name: Sin City Art Center
description: Come by any time to enjoy our collection of Burner Art created by camp members and local Burners. See what creative minds have made for you to enjoy. Please, be respectful of the artists that have contributed to create this display and do not vandalize or steal from the art center.  Thank you.

name: Sin City Costume Exchange
description: Donations of gently used costumes are welcome starting Monday. Come browse our selection of playa costumes that we’ve been collecting starting on Wednesday. Let our girls make you over and leave with a fun new costume for the playa and you can even pay it forward when you donate a gently used costume that no longer suits you. Come early for the best selection.

name: Sin City Day Spa
description: Have a mini “MIRACLE SHOWER” and learn how you can “shower” on playa with two glasses of water and feel squeaky clean. All you need to do is bring your own towel. Other services include foot massage/moisturizing, sun screen or aloe vera application, manicures and more. Come by and check for hours of operation and full services list.

name: Sin City Volleyball Rec Center
description: The Sin City Volleyball Rec Center is where you can go to get your game on. Our enclosed volleyball court is perfect for games of volleyball, badminton, disk soccer, hooping and more. Check out our matches or come enjoy free play time with friends.

name: Sitting Is My Favorite
description: Come have a seat with Camp Sitting Is My Favorite and enjoy an ice cold adult beverage. The rules are simple, don’t get up unless for the bathroom or to get yourself or another a drink; you’ll be surprised by all the fun that comes to you when you stay in one place for more than a second.

name: SizzleVille
description: Stop on by for that extra Sizzle!! Revel in your Dusty Bumm while taking a slapshot or 3, immerse yourself in the Nocturno Lounge with some hooka love & a Moscow Mule, feel at home while you get to know your fellow South Bay burners, or just monkey around at the Primate Playground.  Official kickoff spot of the Busty Bacon Brigade!  We’re here to cook you up some goodtimes!! )'(

name: SK8 KAMP
description: Every city needs a Skatepark.  We’re bringing the one for Black Rock City.  Come shred or cheer on shredders as they risk their lives.

name: Skinny Kitty Teahouse
description: Skinny Kitty Teahouse serves tea 24 hours a day all week long. We offer a refuge from the hustle and bustle: shade, shelter, couches, a piano, performance space for spontaneous use and the company of several unfortunately emaciated felines.

name: Slumberdome Piano Lounge
description: Slumberdome Piano Lounge is a calm and quiet escape where the dusty traveler can relax and enjoy the music of our beautiful Wurlitzer piano. Whether to come and play, or come and listen, all are invited within the comfortable and serene environment of the Slumderdome. Featuring calm and subdued lighting and bedecked in beautiful fabrics, we hope to provide a resplendent respite from the elements. Daily 10am yoga classes. Join us every sunset for a Slumbered Aum session!

name: Slutgarden
description: Cum suck down our Slut juice, wrap your body in our love and pound your hips to the rhythms of the playa.

name: Snow Koan Solar
description: Snow Koan Solar hosts a daily snow cone cocktail party in the mid-afternoon.  We also have a roving hot dog cart that gifts protein-based snacks to hungry Burners.

name: Snowflake Village
description: Snowflake Village is like the bazaar of your dreams. Our smaller camps come from all over the world, to cluster together and give you all sorts of unique personal interactions!

name: Sofa King... medium_Style
description: We are Sofa King medium_Style, coming from the Basscouch and NEXUS crews. You know us, you love us….come and join us for the best medium_Style sound camp on The Playa.hedd_sound will be providing you a with a high fidelity audio experience and the unbelievable line-up that we have planned is gonna leave you never wanting to go back to the default world.

name: Solnishko
description: Solnishko – russian word for baby-sun. We are an eclectic group of Bay Area touchy-feelers, international russian affectionados and uncategorizable veteran burners. We will offer space for self-reflection and contact, rest and challenge, olfactory and body stimulation and facilitate sensory and sensible connections. We will recreate the life-giving atmosphere of the Sun in our cozy dome, beverages and snacks, in unapologetic soul mating rituals

name: Soul Garden
description: The Soul Garden is a collective of wholesome individuals passionate about creativity, free expression of individuality, and nourishing the body and soul. Come unearth your inner spirit vegetable as the vegetable shaman helps guide you through the mystical garden to achieve horticultural enlightenment. Our Carrot Dome is also perfect for vegging out, laying high, laying low, or getting down in funkytown…so lettuce turnip the beet!

name: Soul Seat
description: Soul Seat consists of an interactive sculpture suspended from a 24 foot tall armature which defines a contemplative, centered and grounded gathering place. Three fins of graceful curves, representing Body, Mind and Spirit rise from the desert like waves; they meet at their apex in a delicate point, the point at which the ego dissolves. Integrated platforms and seating encourage the body to rest and the mind to meditate. Participants are encouraged to write down their reflections and inspirations for others

name: Soular Tribe
description: A camp of sustainable earth children powered by the Sun.

name: Sound Garden
description: Enjoy the soothing, angsty sounds of 90s grunge metal.

name: Souqazaar
description: Souqazaar is an unexpected mini oasis on the traveler’s path to the Caravansary offering respite from the desert heat with a cup of chilled wine and perfectly aged cheese from a can in our tastefully appointed Boozesouqa.  And for the traveler in need, we present the Souqazaar Bazaar – ART that doubles as a SWAG Exchange.

name: South Bay HardCORE
description: South Bay/Silicon Valley Regional Camp – Drop by our regional Happy Hour, find out how to connect to other South Bay Burners the other 51 weeks of the year.  Hear all about our Souk marketplace, and how you can participate!  In Sizzleville.

name: Space Cowboys
description: The Space Cowboys are opening the stargates to our very own Rocket Ranch this year. Step out of the cold vacuum of space and kick up your moonboots in the Supernova Saloon, or float up to the Bolide Brothel for some high altitude decadence. Don’t worry, you’ll still find us out on the range wranglin’ all those dirty breaks you love.

name: Space Jam
description: Situated within the BC Village, Space Jam is a camp dedicated to the awesomeness of space. It will feature a space station complete with landing pads and a light show and you won’t be able to leave without attempting to pin the mustache on Chris Hadfield (not the real life version unfortunately).

name: Space Virgins
description: 2014 marks the 20th anniversary of the Space Virgins at Burning Man! Come to our daily day time happy hour to gather, drink, and dance.

name: Spacebubble
description: Exploderate your brainmeats in Space Station Prog V, the most haughty psychedelic battleship to ever be loosed upon the galaxy.

name: Spaced Scientists’ Caravanserai
description: The Herbal Meds Station will enhance Travelers’ well being and libido; the Mammogram Station will provide “medical support” for travelers. Philosophize with travelers and adventurers as to the nature of inner and outer space in the Meditation Center.

name: Spaghetti Taco Camp
description: From the scorching sands of the Rio Puerco, We are a mixed-foods camp celebrating the paradox of tacos and spaghetti in one bite.  Come for the Ass-impressions and Hydration Station, stay for the Interactive Hurt Art Gallery, Steampunke Apothecary, Massage, Bagels and Boogies, and Thursday’s Spaghetti Taco Dinner at 6:48 pm.  We also provide Fortune Telling, Belly Dance, Drumming, Virgin Coaching and impromptu rituals.  DJs spin music for all occasions in our Lounge and we welcome guerilla chefs.

name: Spank Bank
description: Welcome to Spank Bank, your interactive and sensual playa spanking experience! We’ll warm your behinds while also cooling you down with a refreshing cocktail or drink served in our commemorative cups which turn as pink as your bottom once we pour a cold drink into them! Come on by for a hint of pain and a whole lot of pleasure!

name: Spank of America
description: Black Rock City’s finest bank.Get your bottom robotically spanked on our ATM (Ass Thwacking Machine).Enjoy the mist system, Bottom Bar, bank/spank satire art and videos. Mark your hometown on our “world o spank” world map.

name: Spank the Monkey Bar
description: Wet your whistle at the Spank the Monkey Lounge, enjoy virgin burner shots, playa friendly poontang (aka the playa screwdriver) as well as other refreshing beverages.  They come with free harassment from our assortment of monkey clad bartenders, we’ll try not to throw poo.

name: Spanky's Village (and wine bar)
description: The infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars.  Your heart may belong to the Man… but your ASS belongs to Spanky’s!

name: Sparkle Camels Costume Bazaar
description: Forgot your costumes or want to update your playa look?  Stop by Sparkle Camels Costume Bazaar.  We’ll be open from 12-6 daily for your costuming pleasure.

name: Sparkle Love Oasis
description: Sparkle Love Oasis ~ We invite you to relax in our oasis lounge where you will be served nutritive drinks, be entertained, and enjoy our unique family of trouble makers, introverts, extroverts, dancers, artists, and unicorns. This is a magical space to explore your boundaries gently by having fun at our Booty Appreciation Station, taking fun topless pics with our BOOBIES sign, and showing off your dance moves at one of our shadow dance parties.

name: Sparkle Pony Corral
description: Every camp has a sparkle pony- brings 60 costumes – forgets H2O.  Sometimes you need a break!  Bring your sparkle pony to our corral 1-6pm daily. We’ll stroke their ego & give them sustenance while your camp gets some peace & quiet. Sparkle ponies will be re-hydrated, showered w/ compliments & ready to re-enter your camp after a visit to our mental health clinic.

name: Speakcheasy
description: We are an eclectic group of Oklahoma and California Burners who wanted to be the Grapes of Wrath, but there was a copyright infringement and we went with Speakcheasy! Come and get some cheesy snack, Sangria, conversation and shade during the day.  We would have to have you!  Figure out the camp password and get something FUN to forever cherish!

name: Special Places Pelvic Spa
description: An oasis in the desert since 2004, Home of the Special Places Pelvic Spa for Women. and the Home of the World Famous Morning Coffee Enema.

name: Spice N Vice
description: Visit our shaded daytime tent oasis to enjoy middle and far east treats and cold and hot beverages.  Our ‘Desert 2 Desert’ Tent is hosted by Burners from Asia, Middle East, India, United States and beyond.  Share your Travel Stories with us.

name: Spice Trippers
description: Can you handle the hot? Drink your BURN experience at Spice Trippers – BYOC

name: SPIN ART CAMP 8-YEAR, REINVENTED!
description: SPIN ART CAMP – Remember Spin Art?  We built a giant 4-foot diameter machine to create your own masterpiece with. Bring a T-shirt or just take off what you are wearing and join the fun!

name: Spin Cycle
description: SpinCycle is home for hoopers on the playa.  You never know what you’re going to find at SpinCycle, accept you can be pretty sure that you will find a man’s-man in women’s underwear hooping.  This year we’re giving the playa  exactly what we know it wants most: Grant’s balls popping out of fancies on the dance floor while he tries to do that hand stand trick.

name: Spirit Dream
description: 11 is the number for revelation.  It is also the number of years we have joined all of you on the playa.  What will be revealed in our midst this year?  Join us for greater revelation of your original design, your flow, your purity of essence.  Whether you need water, espresso, love, spirit, release, transformation or transition, it will be revealed to you.

name: Squashdance
description: a place to squash and be squashed.

name: Squirrel Army
description: The United Squirrel Army lives by the Ten Principles, as counted on our furry paws and sharpened claws. We are a communal effort of radically self-reliant squirrel.

name: St. Petersburg
description: St. Petersburg is the village comprised of Skybar/Panda Lounge, The Space Between, and Pam the Albino Mastadon art car (P.A.M. for short). Come by and hang out with the Peters you know and love and enjoy the space beats you’ve come to expect.

name: St. Squishy's
description: St. Squishy’s Summer Camp for Wayward Children helps kids of all ages unlock the joy of good ol’ summer camp fun! Come play on our helicopter swing, cool down in our ball-pit bar, and tell ghost stories around the S’mores campfire!

name: Stag Camp 8
description: Stag Camp continues celebrating radical self-reliance though offering our spirit of social inclusiveness mixed with personal responsibility. We offer a large group shade, a warm stove to gather around at night, music, a happening neighborhood bar, and friendship.

name: STAMP IT! CAMP
description: Create Burning Man Souvenirs. Bring your favorite shirt/hat & stamp them with The Man logo theme and/or phrases like I’m Burnt!

name: Stands Of Chime
description: The art installation will have the look of a pagoda. As you approach it you will see a simple 4 sided hut made of steel. It stands 10′ at the peak of its roof and is about 12′ wide. What you will notice first is that the walls are made of large suspended steel chimes. They will range in size from 6″ to 12″ in diameter an up to 4′ long.  With a simple breeze the pagoda will come to life as an enormous wind chime . As you enter into this amazing pagoda of tones you can take a seat in the epicenter of sound. T

name: Star of Shamash
description: The Star of Shamash is the symbol for the Babylonian Sun God, Shamash, which was likely a part of the caravansary across ancient Mesopotamia. It is 8′ diameter and colorfully lit with LEDs for night-time sun worshipping. It was also built to honor Anat Shamash for her 20th anniversary of attending Burning Man!

name: Star Star
description: Star Star – Live Music – Movement, Dance, Yoga classes daily.  Lively shows and aerial performance throughout burn week on our gorgeous rustic stage with full daytime shade.  Kick one back and come shake your business at the Star Star Roadhouse!

name: StarBarf
description: Across the space/time continuum, through galactic upheaval and hiccups, we have evolved to this messy existence. Colliding and reforging, StarBarf weaves workshops, discussions, and movement into our shared vision of community. We strive to connect with beautiful and messy humanity; the humbling scales in which we exist; and the unbounded possibilities that we, as StarBarf, realize… You are StarBarf, too.

name: Stardust Lounge Casino & Spa
description: Go all-in at the Stardust Lounge Casino and Spa! Double down on some dirty martinis and dirtier games of chance and skill at the Casino, get your playa wedding on at the Chapel, then clean up and cool off with rejuvenating treatments at the Spa.

name: Starfist and Starlight Oasis
description: We serve the playa for the enjoyment of the last remaining light of the day at our Starlight Oasis and with Go Postal!, our independent message delivery service, at your service. Our oasis provides tea for the thirsty, coffee for the strained, and other refreshments for the adventurous. Need to get a message across the playa? We are always at your service. With our roots spanning across the world, we welcome you to our nourishing den.

name: Stargazers Anonymous
description: Stargazers Anonymous provides a safe space for people in all phases of consciousness. A deep playa reverie for wayward travellers, weary playa surfers and strung out desert shamans. Come and gaze at the stars, safe from bright lights and stray art cars.

name: StarWay
description: With ideas around travelers navigating the Silk Roads, StarWay plays on the ideas of star navigation and journeys.

name: Steam Bath Project, The
description: The Steam Bath Project makes the mundane magical! The simple act of “cleansing” becomes part of an age-old  ritual tradition embracing the possibility of transformation. We invite you into the geodesic dome where you can relax on the wooden benches as boiling water produces steam with negative ions that fill the space. Negative ions are known to create an overall feeling of wellness, similar to the air after a summer thunderstorm.

name: Stoop, The
description: The Chris Himle Memorial Stoop is a community gathering place, much like the apartment stoops in your own town. The 16 foot tall wooden structure consists of a set of stairs and a front porch, serving as a place where art car parties develop in the middle of the night, loved ones can reunite after a long day roaming the playa, community members will erect story-telling tables, and people can sit and relax and meet new friends, taking in the view of the city and contemplating the meaning of life.

name: STRANGELOVE
description: Mile High Bar waits to serve you at its new wide-body crash site!  Let our committed cabin crew take you to new heights on a Jet Age fantasy of sound and hospitality – two flights daily!

name: Street Life: Hip Hop on the Playa
description: Picture Big Bird swigging a 40 while listening to Public Enemy. Street Life is bringing the story and soul of Hip-Hop to the Playa with the levity and neighborhood feel of Sesame Street. Come dance your way down memory lane, as we combine the nostalgia we feel for Sesame Street with the urban swag, bounce, and flavor of the Hip-Hop we love.

name: Struts & Bolts
description: The Bangingest Lounge on (?) Street

name: Sugar Bitch
description: SugarBitch Camp hereby declares that you look delicious. You’d look better still if you kneeled down at our altar of low-carbohydrate eating so our Sugar Bitch Priests and Priestesses could feed you fresh strawberries swimming in cream and slap a temp sugar skull tattoo on your fine body.

name: Summer Camp
description: Welcome to Summer Camp! We invite you to enjoy Summer Camp as an adult while still letting your inner child play.  Enjoy our arts and crafts, drinking games, campfire stories, non-drinking games, lessons from an Eagle Scout and earn uniquely fun merit badges! Feel free to hang out in our bar, chill out tent, shaded hammocks, campfire circle or rooftop lounge. Our camp counselors are experts at having fun and showing you a good time, so stop by and enjoy!

name: Sun Guardians
description: Yoga | Art | Spirit: generating the spark of self from the light within.

name: Sunrise Saloon
description: The Sunrise Saloon is a sunny place for shady people located on the far eastern hinterland of the deep playa. This watering hole is home to gunslingers and bandoleras alike who come for the sunrise and stay for the whiskey.

name: Sunset Trip, The
description: The Sunset trip is the home base of 4 Los Angeles based camps: Camp Charlie, The Dirty Beetles, Transmorphagon, and the Tasty Noodles. Stop by in the afternoon for craft beer from the Noodle Craft Beer Bar and come back at night for the Capital Reckers Main Stage for live music and DJs. We’ll also be featuring a red carpet, walk of shame, the unicorn branding station, electric swing set, giant light bright, post card photo station, and more.

name: Super Friends Synaesthesia
description: Billowing white fabric surrounds our waterless pillow pools where the tired burner can take an afternoon nap. Learn new skills at one of our daytime workshops or groove to some tunes. SuperFriends Synaesthesia is also the home base for the artists and crew of Inspireality Palace, a deep-playa, large-scale art piece.My hand is holding your hand, but we’re such Super Friends, you feel my hand on your heart. Or in your brain.

name: Supreme Ultimate, The
description: The Way that can be spoken is not the eternal Way… In the ancient Chinese Taoist philosophy, the Yin-Yang symbol represents the duality of the essence and substance from which the myriad things come – light/dark, masculine/feminine, sun/moon, good/evil, active/passive…  For us as individuals, sometimes our yin is rising and yang setting, and then again, sometimes yang is rising and our yin is setting… it’s all one big cycle of rising and setting, rising and setting.  How are things going for you just no

name: Suspended Animation
description: Experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage and BDSM rides, workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties. We also rove the playa and build impromptu bondage sculpture!

name: SwagMart
description: SwagMart is an Oasis of creativity located in the Heart of Black Rock City. We provide FREE unusual materials to create SwagNecklaces, Earrings and note worthy embellishments for your Playa wear. Evening Branding sessions with Todd Andrews amazing Burning Man & Burning Woman branding for your Boots, Hats, Belts etc. Costume appreciation trophy’s andspecial Swag for costume.Stop by for a creative positive experience and meet Burners from all over the Planet.

name: Swamp Fuckits
description: Rag tag group of New Orleans architects, lovers, dancers, djs, cooks, artists and friends- expert at bringing our laissez les bons temps rouler attitudes from the swamp to the desert.  Come meet us!

name: Sweaty  Betty's
description: Friendly neighborhood misting Parlor and Spa, stop in and experience an overall cooling sensation from head to foot as you stroll through the mist (is that vanilla?) and watch the smiles emerge while body temperatures drop,  Got crunchy hair / boring nails / feeling a bit beat…  You may qualify for an emergency hair wash, nail painting; perhaps there is an opening in the massage room…Stop in and chill.  Open 11:00 to 4:00, Volunteer opportunities. Tea.

name: Swing City
description: Swing City brings the Original Muscle Beach from Santa Monica California to Black Rock City.  Come play!

name: Swish Embassy, The
description: Theme Night parties, breathtaking costumes, amazing music, and a rockin’ (new) bar will be the hallmarks of BRC’s new Den of Divine Decadence. We welcome divas of all genders, orientations, and experience – just be fabulous, bay-bee!

name: Symposia
description: A re-imagination of the traditional Greek ‘drinking party’. Drink wine and debate with others on how to make a difference in the world.

name: @Tempters
description: Croconaut gives you a way how to stay in touch with your friends and see where they are. Visit our camp for advice (and charge your cell phone there) or install the app in advance from the website (when available — we’re busy working on it!)

name: Tahoe Twisted
description: Part Tahoe, mostly Twisted.
hometown: Tahoe, The Bay Area, and Beyond

name: Tangoed Up In Blues
description: Discover what it’s like to hold a partner in your arms and move to the music.  Tango. Blues Dance.  Join us in re-popularizing partner dance in America.

name: taos synergy
description: a peaceful oasis in an exciting world

name: Tarwater
description: Tarwater, home of the Rat Taxi, returns with The Tarry Night Bowl, the Ladder Toss game and the inaptly named Corn Hole game.   You can pick out clothes at Lady S’ Boutique where you don’t have to do anything in exchange.  The Labyrinth and the Light Garden will be lit for your nocturnal wanderings.  Be on the lookout for books.

name: Tasty Noodles
description: Stop by Tasty Noodles in the afternoon Tuesday through Friday for beer, dancing, and shade. Bounce on our trampoline, swing on our swing set, and paint a picture in the Noodle Doodle Dome!

name: Tazii
description: Providing that Ali Baba chill vibe since 2001.

name: TC://404 Village Not Found
description: Keep Burning Man Potentially Fatal.

name: Tea House
description: 1000 Year of Tea Ceremony

name: Tea-Rex
description: Tea-Rex! So soothing in the desert heat- and childishly fun! Sun tea, dinosaurs, and virgin burners abound!

name: Techno Tiki
description: Techno Tiki is a relaxed island vibe by day and dance party by night.  A surf shack at the edge of the galaxy.

name: Tectonic and Friends
description: Come bask in the shade of our fire spewing volcano, or dance to our ground-shaking beats while we serve you a tec n’ tonic.  Don’t forget to bring us your playa virgins to sacrifice to the volcano gods!

name: Temple O'Flying Spaghetti Monster
description: We are a comfortable neighborhood pub with a rockin’ attitude. In honor of his noodley goodness the Friendly Fire Bar will administer ice cold libations and groovin’ tunes for your mind, body and spirit. Take a ride 4 stories up in the Sky Lounge and view the Playa with a much higher perspective. The Flying Spaghetti Monster welcomes all, so stop by and be touched by his Noodly Appendage.

name: Temple of Anointment
description: Bring your playa ravaged hides to the Temple of Anointment for some much needed organic moisturizing care and UV protection made with the same ingredients as you are. Don’t leave with out a tube or two of Don’t Burn, Man! organic sunscreen, for future use and a memento of this year in Black Rock Desert.

name: Temple of Grace, The
description: The Temple of Grace is intended to be a spiritual and sacred space for memorials, reflection, celebration, and to commemorate life transitions. It is a special work of art given to the community; it is a spiritual refuge where thousands gather, each to engage with it in his or her own way. The community comes to write their memorials and place tokens of their transitions, and it is burned at the end of the festival in a tradition of releasing them by fire.

name: Tender Heckles Porch
description: Whoops, You dropped your smile. Come on over here to Tender Heckles Porch to find it again. We’re waiting for you here on our cozy couches to heckle you…tenderly. Come on over sweet cheeks.

name: Tennis Camp
description: The glory days of playing tennis on the Playa are back! Show up in your proper tennis whites to play a set and stick around for the country club soirees.

name: Tequila Stop
description: A beautiful shelter where you can zip fancy tequila or take a body shot. To chill or not to chill?

name: Termination Dust Hole
description: A collective of bands and fire dancers escape from the Arctic to fill your Hole by cramming it with live music, fire performances, Flunky Ball, and erotic sock puppets.  Come chafe away the techNO at Termination Dust Hole.

name: Theme Camp Theme Camp
description: A different theme every day with activities and tasty libations to match

name: Things That Swing
description: Including but never limited to: swings! hammocks! pendulums! people! We’re hosting events on dome construction and social grooming (adults only), and we welcome you to step under our shade any time of day or enjoy our camp fire at night.

name: This Camp is Bullshit
description: Bullshit! is the new awesome and this camp is full of it!  We are hosting Salsa Dance workshops/parties throughout the week; also stop by anytime to turn your bike into a raging bull so that you can stampede with us through the streets of Black Rock city during the 4th annual Running of the Bulls, plus Asshole Karaoke, Wheel of Consequences, Bullshit Games and much more.  So check the playa schedule, because This Camp is Bullshit!

name: Thumper
description: A sound camp for things that go THUMP in the night.  A stimulating communal dance party where intimacy isn’t sacrificed for sound.

name: Thunder Gumbo
description: Thunder Gumbo is a Brooklyn based art collective and underground event production crew founded in 2009 to combine elements from as many musical and cultural scenes across Brooklyn as possible. Our central project involves taking a decommissioned US army truck and building a multi-platform abstract art piece that evokes a dialog about the relationship between the evolution of civilization and the passage of time.

name: Time Colony
description: A time travel agency and resource center for the temporally dislocated. Come enjoy games, drinks, and performances from the past, present and future!

name: Time Continuium
description: Imagine 13 circled  spots leading to the advancement of time through the sun’s position. This progression of time keeps moving forward constantly connecting our inner  souls and fears..

name: Time Ninja Syndicate
description: The nexus of time has opened and heroes from throughout the ages have gathered together for great justice.Come share your experiences as a time traveler or get some tips from the pros on how to keep the time line intact. Join us for our time travel party on Thursday from 4-10pm! Where we’ll travel to a different time period every hour.

name: Tissue and a Plan
description: Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don’t know what to go do next? Camp Tissue and a Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear plan and a clean tissue. ‘Cause all you really need is a tissue and a plan..

name: Titicaca
description: Join these high mountain dwellers in their desert caravan.  Sit a spell in our open shade and enjoy the Middle Eastern Bazaar environment.

name: TITTIES N PANCAKES LOW FILL RANCH
description: If you’d like to learn a DUTTCH or practice a LATCH, come on by the RANCH and train with the best. After that, hang at the PATCH for delicious pancakes. a workshop, handcrafted necklaces, BUNCHES of titties, and/or random performances of a slightly epic nature. RATS RATCH!!

name: ToneAge - Karavantastique!
description: ToneAge – Karavantastique! returns for its lucky number 7th year on the playa and welcomes young and old, Virgin or Burnior Citizen to come by for a cup of coffee in the morning, music (and shade!) in the afternoon, fire after sunset, and our Oasis party WED night! We are a bunch of SFer’s, Denverites, Vancouverians, and SoCalistas – and wherever you are from, you’re welcome!

name: Tooth & Claw
description: Tooth & Claw! We are purveyors of goods and services so rare on the sun-baked playa that our offerings will seem nigh-mystical to our desert brethren. And a simple spin of our Heal Wheel is the only price to pay! Like the shop that dispenses wonders unseen in the world before disappearing, so too will Tooth & Claw give our desert family the chance to experience wonders they may only dream of while gathered for the annual conclave. Find us!

name: Totem Wolf!!!
description: Once again we scour the absolute blackened foulest depths of the darkest  vicious hollows to dredge from within the most brutal undeniable might what is all things Metal! Join us again to raise fist and fury, scream rage and power, hold court on high while we celebrate the immensity, the strength, the beauty of the most powerful musical culture ever created!! \m/

name: Totenkitten
description: Totenkitten is a fascist demagoguery devoted to crushing all opposition and imposing our will on the masses; initially conceived as a reaction to the decadent weakness of other organizations, Totenkitten quickly took on a life of its own.

name: Trader Shady's
description: Looking for the perfect pair of shades to go with that costume?  Or maybe you forgot, lost, ate, misplaced, broke yours… Come on over to Trader Shady’s sunglass exchange camp to swap stories and sunnies on your way out to the playa fun.

name: Tranquility Bass
description: A group of nomads coming together to offer a tranquil place for peace and dunkaroos. WAIT A MINUTE, DUNKAROOS AREN’T PEACEFUL.

name: Transcendence Tribe
description: The 5 point star of home. Representing all aspects of life, art, spirituality, and joy!

name: Transmorphagon
description: TRANSMORPHAGON – Within the Sunset Trip Village, TGon will bring you the best of House & Live music, and an appropriate dose of fun!  Come hang under the Transporter, and be transported to a more inclusive and fun world!

name: Trashistan
description: The Witch’s Hat returns, along with some special surprises. Pleasant or not? You be the judge.
hometown: Various hick towns of the earth

name: Treehouse, The
description: Ever have a treehouse when you were a kid?  Come play at The Treehouse and join us for a drink at the cards against humanity bar, a game of charades (with costumes!) or an improv class.

name: Tribal Thunder Drum Camp
description: We make and play our drums and gongs; We welcome all Burners, old and new alike, to bring their own drums, or use ours, and dance to the drum beat of life. There’s No Wrong Way to Drum!

name: Tribes That May Be
description: Tribes That May Be is a two-fold project. It features a subtle physical artifact in the form of a small steamer trunk that seemingly fell off a trade caravan ages ago and an interactive, ethereal piece accessible via mobile device that challenges the participant to consider the Ten Principles of Burning Man in a different light via an exploration of its history and a possible future. The chest acts as a landmark to tie the two pieces, the real and the imaginary, together.

name: Trifucta
description: This is the public page for camp Trifucta at Burning Man! Like this page to stay up to date with event’s and projects we are producing. We are a large community of friends looking to give back to our community through art and music )'(

name: Trillium
description: TRILLIUM is an interactive rolling ball kinetic sculpture.   It is a celebration of the beauty that can be found in human designed mechanisms and structures and is inspired by a flower that is nature’s celebration of the number 3.  Constructed from tubular metal and plywood,  this piece is 16 feet tall and towers above like a giant mechanized flower.   Participants young or old can turn a hand operated crank to power a mechanism that lifts large balls to the top where gravity take over and they roll down th

name: Triptych
description: We’re about triangles, music, art, family, and fun.  Stop by Tuesday for our open bar, fire spinning, and music; Wednesday for a variety of workshops; and any time you need a comfortable place to chill in the midst of your playa adventures.

name: Tropical Treehouse
description: A verdant home alive with the warmth of aloha!  Castaways welcomed to paddle up to the tiki lights and toast the night with a Mai Thai.

name: True Reflections Palace
description: See yourself as you are, reflected in all your sparkly glory, in these amazing true image mirrors.

name: TSUNAMI CAMP
description: A welcome respite along the dusty silk route featuring Playa Fashion Makeovers, Live Music, Snow Cones, Wordsmithing, advice, and sweet satisfaction.

name: Twilight Spaghetti Theatre
description: This is your chance to show off your under-appreciated talents on our custom built stage for a spaghetti dinner! Terrible face/tramp stamp painting, hairy lap dances, drunk yoga, and constant heckling are also our specialties.

name: Twin Freaks
description: Welcome to Twin Freaks!  Enter our Freaky world of doppelgangers, mystery, talking logs, strange artifacts, and the best damn cup of coffee on the Playa.  The owls are not what they seem…

name: Two Lanterns
description: Best weddings on the playa, Unofficial Playa Civil Unions (including rings/certificate), Black Rock Temporary Divorce, Annulments, legal weddings by prior arrangement.  Be sure to experience our interactive elwire sculpture!

name: Two-Stroke Transit
description: Got questions about your two-stroke engine? Maybe you just like to rev up your engine and make a lot of noise?  Come on down to Two-Stroke Transit to talk to us. While here, you can find out how to prevent playa damage from dripping oil while improving your engine’s performance.

name: U See Me
description: “Uplifting Soul Massages” – a powerful healing process that assists in connecting to our Authentic Self.  This process releases old stuck energies of fear, sadness and resentments and creates space for Self-love as well as a loving bond between the participants.
hometown: Los Angeles and New York City

name: UFO Response Team
description: UFO Response Team will be the one stop shop to report UFO/Alien sightings in Black Rock City!

name: Uhuru
description: Uhuru has the voodoo for what you do. Join us to explore curiosity, wonder, and adventure.

name: Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves
description: O illustrious merchants of the flesh and pillagers of the wealth of man. Our glorious master, Uli Baba, he who is magnificent and just, he who rules with the wisdom of Solomon and the might of Saladin, commands your presence at his slave auctions, belly dance competition & workshops.  http://www.meetup.com/Uli-Babas/

name: Ultimate Celebration
description: The end is nigh! Eschatological salons (readings, discussion and dialectic) commence at 2pm Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and Friday. Come prepared to probe the transcendental depths of End Times concepts in variety of cultural, religious and literary disciplines, from the four horsemen of the apocalypse, to Ragnarök, to Elliot’s Wasteland, to visions of a technological singularity. Sip the ambrosia of the Twilight of the Gods (the official libation of our Ultimate Celebration) while you contemplate your ow

name: Universe University
description: Universe University, contemporary classroom/carnival. Complete with playground, rec center, cafeteria, and lounge. Come back to your roots.. and win some prizes too!

name: Unnecessarily High Five
description: The slap of skin. The crack of flesh. The bang of bodies. What better way to celebrate your amusement, joy, or just plain agreement then the abrupt collision of two hands. The high five… or in our case, unnecessarily high five. Come by and try your luck at the Unnecessarily High Five. Can you hit our highest five? We’re waiting for someone who can. Bring friends, bring your robot helper, bring a trampoline and fling yourself into the history books.

name: V-Spot
description: The V-SPoT is Burning Man’s official Volunteer Headquarters in Black Rock City. Where different projects come to seek Volunteers and where Burners come to find out how to help. Our friendly Volunteer Experts are here to answer your questions and help you find your “special place” on the Playa.

name: Vagabonds & Tagalongs
description: As vagabonds and tagalongs, we strive to attract, include, and discover all the other vagabonds and tag-alongs out there. We come from all corners of the US and even Australia, brought together by our love for radical expression and inclusion, with a little help from the wonderful world wide web.

name: Valhalla
description: Valhalla is a new camp built by veteran burners from several camps. We want to provide a nighttime community space, and a seed for a particular flavor of communal adventure and questing.

name: Validation-Station
description: At the Valuation-Station it’s not your parking ticket that get’s valuated but you, awesome you! You make Burningman great and the Valuation-Station crew want to make sure you know.

name: Vamp Camp
description: Vamp Camp. We only come out at night! (Unless we wake up early.)Vamp juice, burn barrel, music and Vamp Stamp if deserving!No Schedules, no commitments. If you are here, you are on time.Find us on facebook

name: Vegan Nightmare Camp
description: An interactive environment to discuss sustainable farming, healthy diets, local food sourcing and global views on the future of meat production advantages & disadvantages.  It’s also a fun place with the “Wheel O Meat” and lively discussions and drinks.

name: VIDA
description: A camp focus Spreading Burning Man Culture throughout Latin America.

name: Videogasm
description: Nightly video projection on our two big screens. Body painting, airbrushing and spray paint art every afternoon in our dome. Come by and cool off in our mister!  Record a message for your “Former Virgin” then watch it later on our screens. Play Playa Jeopardy on Wednesday Night. Live Rocky Horror Picture Show on Friday Night. Contact us if you have an original video you’d like to show. Located in Snowflake Village.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience
description: If you are hot, thirsty, and decaffeinated while on the playa then come to VICE for refreshing, hand-made Vietnamese Iced Coffee, afternoons from 2 to 4pm.  Learn to walk on Stilts, dance with Flags, or create Perler Bead keepsakes at one of our interactive workshops at VICE – a friendly, diverse camp who wants to see YOU in line for coffee!
hometown: Many – Bay Area, LA Area, Albuquerque, Washington DC, Seattle,

name: Vines Without Borders
description: Vines Without Borders is a global wine bar and lounge inviting guests and offering wines from around the world. Each night starting at sunset a different wine region will be celebrated in our cool LED illuminated venue furnished with vintage couches and chairs and a long back-lit bar.

name: Virgin Hooper Camp
description: Are you in awe of the hottie hoopers on the Playa? Come by Virgin Hooper Camp and we will teach you how to hula hoop. We can teach anyone in 10 minutes or less!

name: Vision Tree, The
description: The Vision Tree is a project that symbolizes people sharing the best of who they are through the creation of a 50′ tree.  The tree is hollow to allow people to climb up inside it’s 35′ trunk to gain a better vision of their surroundings.

name: Visual Orchestra
description: The Visual Orchestra is meant to delight kids of all ages. It is a combination of light, sound and motion. It is the next in a series of multimedia art and technology presentations by Greg Ames.

name: Voice of the Man, The
description: The Voice of the Man allows the user to rest and listen to the Voice of the Man radio station (BMIR) through the use of a beauty salon chair.

name: Voodoo Shooting Gallery
description: Exercise your demons – shoot voodoo dolls and shrunken heads to win glow cups emblazoned with Voodoo 2013 camp logo. Hosted by the best collection of French voodoo priestesses and their zombie slaves to cheer and award you prizes and treats.

name: Voted Best Camp
description: Skateboarding and rock and roll drenched in whiskey. Come to the camp that singlehandedly defends BRC against constant dubstep onslaughts. Aint no fuckin’ accident we’re Voted Best Camp.

name: Vulcantown
description: Come to Vulcantown and experience flow in all of it’s glory. We will be playing constantly and invite everyone to come join in the fun.

name: VW Bus Camp
description: VW Bus Caravaners, stop and camp with the VW Bus Caravansary at Black Rock City. Stay and participate with us at the great Burning Man Caravansary, before continuing on your paths across the wilderness of Nevada and places beyond, VW Bus Camp, where camaraderie and the spirit of Burning Man has lived on now for 17 Burns.

name: Walkover
description: We Will Stamp You! Come on by and have a good time. Small camp to come chill and relax get stamped and heckle people, various shenanigans and vulgar mouths will take place here.

name: Wanderer's Camp
description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, Gin/Tonic, and Hot Dogs,  Come by every afternoon for our playa hot dog feed, have a gin/tonic and enjoy the shade, great company and music.

name: Wanderer's Sanctum
description: Weary travelers, come rest in the confines of the Wanderer’s Sanctum.  A shelter from the elements, may it provide you with a place for rest, meditation, and rejuvenation.

name: Want It!
description: If you Want It! but can’t find it here, then we’re probably Nawt It.

name: Warp Zone
description: Warp Zone, purveyors of Aggressive Hospitality since 2010, are delighted to return home to Black Rock City for another beautiful year. Come warm up in the wee hours with tea next to the Hexaheart fire, or stop by during the day for an afternoon workshop, or just to say hi!

name: Wasabi Kisses
description: The Wasabi Kisses theme camp seeks to create a space were sexuality and gender identity are respected and where queer, trans*, genderqueer, and gender variant folks can get their kink on with a focus on consent, safer spaces, and queer/trans* visibility.

name: We Are All Stars
description: We Are All Stars is a 25’x25′ canopy of glowing ping-pong balls that interacts visually with people under it.

name: Well Made Mistakes
description: Join us atop Stoop’s Stoop to catch a desert sunset, or grab the megaphone and heckle our neighbors – just watch your bottom when you catch the zip-line back down. We’re back again for another round of mistakes!

name: WeScream
description: Crank, Crank, Crank.  Camp WeScream invites the community to participate NOW in the creation of ice cream using 3 modern 6 quart wooden ice cream makers. We will ask the community to Scream for their ice cream and then crank away.

name: Wet Dreams
description: A forgotten paradise to soothe the weary adventurer, or a lawless land of risk & reward? We are both.  A yin and a yang.  An amalgamation of two elements, each playing off the other.  Village now featuring prodigal Wet Dreams and Liminal Spaces!

name: Wetspot
description: The WetSpot Bar & Faceplant Lounge: Welcome to the best place on the playa to enjoy a home crafted beer while relaxing in our unique lounge. WetSpot is about making new friends in an open to all setting while engaging in musings around one of our favorite pastimes: brewing beer. Our crew includes homebrewers and non-homebrewers alike and provides an inviting atmosphere to sample and learn about the art and science of brewing beer as well as just having fun.

name: What Would Duck Tape Do?
description: Helping our community members keep their cargo in good repair! We will instruct and assist people on useful playa fixes using duct tape in innovative and creative ways to repair, strengthen and create!

name: What Would You Do For A Pickle?
description: Have you ever experienced the juicy perfection of eating a pickle on the playa? Come visit us so we can ask What Would You Do For a Pickle?

name: When Life Gives You Lemons...
description: Revive and refresh your body and mind with fresh squeezed lemonade, swings, shaded hammocks and juicy beats.

name: Where is the Dojo
description: The Dojo is the place of the way, here, there and everywhere…finders, seekers, we are the way.

name: Where's My Pants? Camp
description: Where’s My Pants? Camp is the best camp EVAR!  Come in your pants and play with our burningman lego set, sit on our double-decker couch, and let’s celebrate how AWESOME everything is!  If you lost your pants (it happens!), we’ll find a pair for you.

name: Whisker Biscuit
description: Calling all aerialists, we’ll be bringing it with a giant tripod for silk and lyra performances, workshops and skill shares.  Take a load off in the shade of our circus tent or climb up to the high bar on top of our school bus for spectacular views of the playa and the performers.

name: Whiskey and Dust
description: Simply put, we are a Whiskey camp with a small habitual yoga problem. Join our always popular shaded bar stocked with the many flavors of alluring liquids. Enjoy the conversation, events, aerial acrobatic performances, vinyl music and various workshops (Yoga, Juggling, Dancing, Hooping, etc.) throughout the week. Continuing with our previous theme, we hope to continue to bring more new and creative concepts to the community.

name: White Ocean
description: With massive steel rising from the playa, we are hosting some of our favorite friends from around the globe for you, our family and friends.

name: White Trash Superstars
description: Were your friendly Neighborhood dive bar. We have no set schedule so If the bar stools are down and/or musics on, come join us for a drink or some shine if we haven’t already drank it all.   Bring your own cup to pimp out, and enjoy the shade on comfy couches and have fun playing a variety of bar games.

name: WhoofARTed?! & Get the F*%$ Out!
description: Come to Camp WhoofARTed?! (It was me!) and Get The F*%$ Out! for fun, libations, food, libations, frolicking, libations, bacon, libations, games, libations, art, libations, and general merriment (and libations)! Visit our Hydration Station and spend time in our chill living room – the perfect place to enjoy some shade, friends, dust, and, of course, libations! Look for our bacon and bloody mary events, random late-night foods, photos, and more!

name: WickedLand
description: This is the place where fairy-tale world is turned upside-down and awaits for you to jump in! We welcome burners for participation in familiar stories slipped from the pages of familiar chilhood books that meet adult world. Are you still a Virgin? Come to WICKEDLAND and trust yourself into gentle hands of expierienced burner for a day or a week, or… maybe a lifetime? Are you an old-timer BM-champ? Then help a newcomers and Adopt-A-Virgin here!

name: Wiener Zoo
description: Wiener Zoo! Where neighbors and friends can stop by for a  hotdog or some cocktail weenies. Daily from 3-6.

name: wind travelers perch, the
description: This is a place of rest for travelers weary from the desert winds and sun. You can pause, relax, trade stories and ideas with your fellow travelers or just play in the shade. Climb high and sway like the desert winds, rest from the sun while basking in the love and company of those around you. Regain your strength here to go back and give yourself once more to the people and the desert.

name: Winner Winner Chicken Dinner
description: Everyone’s a winner; you get chicken dinner. Want some wings and beer? You can find them here!

name: Wish Maker
description: Come visit us at Wish Maker!  From 3pm-6pm daily.  We provide you with burnable articles and the tools to fashion your own meaningful tribute or object of devotion.  Our talented table dwellers will help you create something that is worthy of its meaning to you, friend.  Our wishing ribbons will be available always for your wishes leave them on our wall and we will deliver to the temple for you at sunrise on Sunday before the burn.  Please join us!

name: Wish U Were Here Camp
description: we wish you were here to join us in our photo project; come by any time for your pic.

name: WMICC Organic Fruit & Veggie Bar
description: WMICC brings nearly one ton of delicious organic produce to the people of Black Rock City. Come for the juicy goodness and stay for the delightful experience.

name: Womp Camp
description: Womp Camp is a group of fun loving Canadian and International Burners dedicated to fun, shenanigans, laughter, great music, sustainability, and community. A headquarters for a mobile fun squad and a community experience that will extend far beyond the Playa, come say hi 🙂

name: Wonder Camp
description: Wonder Camp is a place where you can bring your broken project, mutant vehicle, heart, etc……or we will come to you! Complete mobile repair for the broken Burner.

name: Wrongtown & [Phil in the Blank]
description: So Wrong. Sooo Phil.

name: Wyrm's Clutch, The
description: The Wyrm’s Clutch is an intimate and comfortable rest stop for travelers to relax in the shade and await the hatching of dragons. This covered dome is furnished with benches and offers an excellent vantage of a dragon’s nest.
